1121322211121213221111331233.content:
Max and Wally looked at May incredulously, at first thinking that the brunette was joking. But than it dawned on them that one thing that she took absolutely seriously was food, so she was telling the truth. The two young boys looked horrified at this revelation, to which May just rolled her eyes.

“What can I say? I’m a glutton through and through!” She smacked her belly hard, making the two boys on top stumble on her flesh. “Growing up, I always heard people talk about me behind my back about how was as big as a Wailord or a Snorlax. They were trying to make me feel bad, but instead it made me determined. I don’t want to be as big as a Wailord, I wanna be so big I could eat one!”

“B-b-But May, you gave up on eating Pokémon remember?” Max stuttered, doing the calculations of what a Wailord consuming May would look like. An average Wailord was five times her current height, so the only way she could even think about eating one whole is if she was one hundred feet tall or higher! That’s bigger than the Pokémon Center they were in! Wally looked at Max with a confused look.

“W-what are you talking about, Max? Your sister eats Pokémon all the t-time. I got my Ralts by wrestling it away from her.” Wally interjected, surprised that Max didn’t know about his sister’s diet. Max opened his eyes wide and looked back at May.

“Is...is that true?” Max asked slowly.

May bit her lower lip. She knew the secret would have to come out someday, she just was hoping it wouldn’t have to be today. “I’m sorry Max, but Wally’s right. I still eat Pokémon, and I absolutely love it too much to ever stop.” May petted Max’s head, trying to bring out gently while still being honest. “And I’m not the only one, too. There’s a whole city outside that window that doesn't see anything wrong with it, so you guys are the outcasts here. I know you love Pokémon for your reasons, lil’ brother, and I love them because they make me big and fat taste amazing.”

Max sniffled, trying to not cry. He felt betrayed that May would lie to him about eating Pokémon, and that she would never see the magical creatures he called his friends as anything more than walking food, but at the end of the day...she was still his big sister. He had to love her no matter how their views in things differ, and at her size they was no stopping here from getting what she wanted.

“Okay, May.” Max said, hugging May’s nearly naked bosom. His hands were almost entirely engulfed by the squishy, pale flesh as he squeezed tight. “Just...don’t eat our Pokémon, okay.”

May smiled and wrapped her arms around him and Wally into a hug, squeezing the two hard into her chest. “No promises, lil’ bro. No promises…”



After the three took their time to relax and rest in their room at the Pokémon Center, they all decided that they should take the time to see the sights Rustboro had to offer. The architecture was so different and unique compared to the rest of Hoenn, get it still felt old and classic. Like Alice said, most of the population walking about on the streets were fat girls like her. Some of them fully dressed, others showing off as much as May. Some her size, and some much bigger.

A girl at a street corner was hawking fliers to pedestrians about how the Devon Corparation was hiring heavier women to test their newest breakthroughs in medicine. It looked a little sketchy, but it paid well and guaranteed no harm would come of it. They're was also numerous restaurants and bistros, chock full of women busy glutting themselves. The Pokémon School was still half open, although half of it had already been converted into that Live Pokemon restaurant that Alice was taking about, to which May locked her lips while May hid behind her.

Of course, May was reminded that she was a Pokémon Trainer when she heard about Roxxanne’s Rock Type Gym. Alice said something about her being incredibly small compared to her, which she kinda wanted to see to believe. Of course, that would mean Pokémon battling, and she would much rather go and stuff her face. She wasn't going to become as big as a Wailord by waiting, however, so in the, she chose...

112132222.content:
Even though May had already used up all of her Pokémon Supplies on the way to Oldale, she didn’t seem to particularly care about it. Before Max could even point it out, he was already being dragged along by his big sister as she waddled her way towards Route 102.

Route 102 was known as where many Pokémon Trainers liked to catch Pokémon, but since May was out if Pokeballs, that wasn't In her agenda. And even if she did restock back in town, the Pokemon were, in her opinion, too weak and dumb to be on her team. She wanted Rare, strong, cool Pokémon! Not another Zigzagoon that bred like wildfire.

“At least I got my shiny Ralts!” May exclaimned as she richer into her purse to grab it’s ball, along with a chocolate bar. “I bet this lil’ guy will win me tons of cash!”

Just than, a young trainer around Max’s age sprung out from the bushes like a madman, and landed his way too cool sneakers on the path in front of May. “I challenge you to a Pokémon battle!” The aspiring lad pointed up his index finger dramatically as triumphant fanfare played in the background of his mind. May and Max looked at, from their perspective, the quite possibly deranged child for a few solid minutes, dead air filling the void between them.

“...k” May acknowledged the boy’s request after a such an awkward silence “Go Ralts!” She threw the Pokeball she was carrying in her right hand right into the face of the opposing trainer, who was still pointing his finger at her up until that point. As the boy cried out in pain and landed onto the dirt ground, out came Jeff the Ralts from his Pokeball, confused.

“Wait, did I just come out of a Pokeball?” Jeff questioned himself as he looked around. He gazed up and saw May’s intimidating and dominating figure look over his frail body. “Aw man...and I really liked being free.”

“Go Zigzagoon!” The young boy, still on the ground and struggling to get back up, called out his Pokémon as he threw it’s Pokeball into the air. The Zigzagoon in question materialized in front of the psychic Pokémon and greeted him with a cheerful and polite smile.

“Hello! My name’s Hobbes, my master’s name is Calvin, and I’m gonna pound you untill you faint from exhaustion!” The Zigzagoon called Hobbes relayed what was going to happen to Jeff as if he had called customer service for help on his computer.

“Aww man, today is just not my day…” Jeff lamented.

“Ralts, use Confusion!” May bellowed, not liking how her Pokémon was conversing with the enemy instead of hitting it. Jeff sighed and obeyed his new master. The psychic attack was launched, making the Zigzagoon grimace.

“Zigzagoon!” The Pokemon Trainer named Calvin had finally gotten off the ground. “Use Tackle!” Hobbes the Zigzagoon heard his master, but did not perform it. The effects of the confusion made his vision blurry and his head a throbbing ache. After looking around, he finally found a target that looked vaguely like the blue of the shiny Ralts. Without thinking he charged head forward into the target, which happened to be the light blue shorts of his master.

“Gah!” Calvin screamed as his own Pokémon hit him right on his groin. He collapsed once again onto the ground, this time with both of his hands placed on his crotch in an attempt to nurse it back to health. Meanwhile, Hobbes the Zigzagoon awaited his master for further instructions, but it never came.

“...cool! I won the battle, and I don’t even have to anything!” May cried out in joy. “Max, go raid that dork for some cash, and give me one of those bags! I think I just earned myself a victory meal~.”

12.content:
You have chosen to take a peek at the stories that focus on the core games of the Pokémon Franchise. Did you ever wanted to see Lyra from Gold & Silver slowly swell in weight as she journey across Johto? Or see how Lucas from Diamond & Pearl deals with his every day life battling Pokémon trainers and avoiding getting squished by the female ones? Then this is the choice for you.

Although I would personally prefer it if the story started at the beginning of the game, I will allow starting in media res. I will also allow extreme leniency with the game’s canon, like Cynthia being the Mom to Lucas, or a protagonist from another game makes a cameo appearance.
12.title: Core Games Stories

121.content: Which character would you like to follow?
121.title: Red & Blue

1211.content:
This is not a world where little boys to grow up in. If Arceus had not been captured and forced into slavery, it would have made sure that no innocent, pure, loving child would ever have to go through such a horrible life, and they would all live in the Hall of Origin with the Legendaries.

But sadly, this is not the case, and every suffering boys in the world can attest to that.

Many years ago, the Pokemon World was a happy and fun place where Pokemon and humans lived in harmony and worked together to better each other’s lives. Than one day, a viral outbreak changed everything. Nobody knows where it came from, when it started, or even what it is called. But it exists. The female humans of the world were the only ones affected by the virus, and the effects were immediate.

What once were kind, timid women turned into viscous, vile monsters who only care about themselves. They became incredibly strong, and soon found out that they could become even stronger and more beautiful by gaining weight. They became the essence of Gluttony and Greed, and the world payed for it.

Now, the world is a former shell of it’s lush green past. Entire forests have been bulldozed to make way for food processing factories and restaurants. Species of Pokémon have been eaten into extinction. The sky is filled with smoke from the factory exhaust, and the Male humans of the world have been reduced to playthings, slaves, pets and snacks.

And it is in the former humble village of Pallet, now a medium sized city, that we find little nine year old Red Firestone on the eve of his tenth birthday. He sat with his legs crossed on his bed, twiddling with his thumbs as he dreaded what tomorrow will bring. His mother was eight feet tall and weighed seven and a half hundred pounds. She did not treat Red as her son like a mother should, but rather her servant. From a very early age, he was forced to make all of her meals, and was often the subject to many a squashing by her big, naked booty.

But even though Red was nine, he knew that life with his horrible mother was still better than going out alone on a Pokemon Journey. Although Pokemon are much more valued for the meat they carry, Pokemon battling is still around, although it is now far more brutal. Every child at the age of ten is required by law to go on a Pokemon Journey or suffer serious jail time. If you are a girl, you can keep your winnings. But if you are a boy, than all the winnings will transfer back to your parents.

Red considered praying to one of the Legendary Pokemon, but decided against it; they were already too troubled serving their new masters, the Pokemon Champions. That was Red’s only hope; to beat the elite four and the Kanto Champion. Nobody knows who she is, or even if it is a she at all! But they all obey her will, for she has at her disposal two of the most powerful Pokemon of all time, Mew and Mewtwo.

If Red can become the Pokemon Champion of Kanto, the Mew Duo would be his, and there could be a chance at fixing this broken world. He made promises to himself that he would never become evil or power hungry as champion; he would love all his Pokemon and treat them with respect and love. Than, he will take on the next region’s league, and not stop until he becomes the master of them all!

But until than, Red sat in his bedroom, his bags packed and ready to go, with a battered Pokeball left from the late Professor Oak as a starter Pokemon. Before all of this, they were already rare, now, the Pokemon in Red’s Pokeball was the last of its kind. He has been raising it for years, and wads the only ray of sunshine in the young human’s life.

Inside the Pokeball was...
1211.title: A World Set On Fire

122.content: Which character will the story follow?
122.title: Gold & Silver

1222.content:
The tranquil morning in New Bark Town is interrupted by a loud commotion coming from Professor Elm’s lab.

“C’mon, old man! Just give me a Pokémon!” Lyra pouts, her arms crossed as she sits on the scrawny Pokémon professor’s chest, looking down at him.

How is it possible for a teenage girl to pin down a grown man with such ease? Well, that’s simple: in this world, for some reason, the more fat or muscle you gain, the taller and stronger you become. Sure, Lyra isn’t nearly as huge as her mother, who’s a veritable mountain of a woman... but Lyra wasn’t anything to sneeze at, either, being about 210 pounds at 5’11”, giving her a somewhat curvy, jiggly form. She definitely has the genes to rock this size, with large but still perky breasts, a soft but toned little potbelly, and the part she’s most proud of; her flawless, pear-shaped booty, which her shorts could barely contain. Her thick thighs straddle his torso, and her weight on his chest is making it quite difficult for Elm to breathe.

“Young lady, please, get off of me,” Professor Elm groans beneath her. This certainly isn’t the first time he’s had to deal with her annoying nonsense, but as she was getting larger and larger over the years, she was getting more difficult to deal with. “You are being extremely childish.”

“Childish? YOU’RE the one being childish!” She retorts, angrily. “You have all these cool Pokémon stuffed in this boring lab, and you can’t even spare a single one for a gal in need?”

“I have told you this a thousand times! You need to capture your OWN Pokémon!” The professor replies, his frustration obvious.

“How am I supposed to capture a Pokémon without a starter, dumbass?”

“I HAVE provided you with a starter Pokémon. You ate it!” He shivers as he remembered the fate of that poor Rattata...

“Yeah, because it was a stupid Pokémon. Seriously, a Rattata? Those things aren’t good for anything more than a light snack!” She huffs, rolling her eyes. “Well, I’m not getting off of you until you give me a super rare, super strong, super adorable Pokémon! I want to go on an adventure!”

Elm was about to retort again… but suddenly, he freezes. “Wait... YOU want to go on an adventure?” Elm almost can’t believe it. Most kids went off on an adventure the day they turned 10, but Lyra was a young woman at this point and yet she still lived with her mother, watching TV and eating junk food. Elm had been almost certain she didn’t have the ambition to go off on her own, and was just going to freeload for her entire life. “Are you saying that, if I give you a Pokémon, you’ll… leave New Bark?”

Lyra considers it, scratching her chin. “Uhh… sure. This town is super fuckin’ boring, anyway,” she eventually decides. “I’ve just been sticking around for the free food. But sure, I guess it could be fun to just wander around Johto.”

“Well, why didn’t you just say so?” Elm asks, a big smile suddenly dawning on his face. If Lyra goes off on an adventure, the professor will never have to deal with her again! “I would be, uh, happy to support your adventuring prospects! In fact, I have three very rare, very powerful Pokémon for you to choose from!”

Lyra raises an eyebrow, incredulous. “Really? You’re not just going to give me another Rattata, right?”

“No, not at all! These three are such rare Pokémon, you’ll never find them anywhere else!” He insists.

She considers it. “Alright. Show me what you’ve got,” she said, climbing off of the professor and standing up. Elm sits up, gasping for fresh air. “But they better not be disappointing, or I’ll be sitting on your face, next!” Elm shudders as he stands up, brushes himself off, and shakily walks over to a big, incubating machine. He clicks it open, and grabbed the three Pokéballs set inside. He had been telling the truth when he said these Pokémon were EXTREMELY rare, but parting with one would be more than worth it to get this bitch out of his hair for good.

He opens the three Pokéballs, and Lyra stares in awe as the Pokémon within were released onto the table before her. Soon, a Chikorita, a Cyndaquil, and a Totodile are looking curiously at her. “Oh. My. Arceus.” She gasps. “These three are absolutely ADORABLE!” She suddenly wraps all three of them in her arms, crushing the air out of them as he hugs them tightly against her flabby gut, squealing in excitement. “I could just eat them up!”

“Uh, p-please, don’t.” Elm nervously raises a finger. “Like I said, they are very rare…”

“It’s a figure of speech, dumbass,” she rolls her eyes, eventually dropping the now dizzy Pokémon back onto the metallic table. Her chubby body jiggles as she leans over, examining each Pokémon closely. The Chikorita was cute, but didn’t look all that strong. The Cyndaquil looked really strong, but wasn’t as cute as the other two. Meanwhile, the Totodile seemed to fit right in between ‘cute’ and ‘powerful.’ It was almost difficult to pick one!
1222.title: Lyra

choices: Lyra Is Given A Going Away Feast
Lyra Is Just There To Say Goodbye
12222.content:
The dizzy Cyndaquil watched in terror and apprehension as the chubby human that squeezed the air out of his lungs before picked him up again. Lyra smiled at the cute Pokemon struggling in her pudgy hands. He wasn't as cute as the other two, but in the end, she decided on the strong one, only because it would win her more battles, and in turn more prize money.

“Hello there, lil’ cutie~” Lyra greeted the fidgety Pokemon. “D’ya know what day it is today? It's the best day of your damn life, that’s what! From now on, you're gonna be my Pokemon, got it? Your gonna win me lots of money and get me out of this crap-sack town for good.”

“Eh, Lyra?” Professor Elm interjected. “Maybe don't swear so much in front of the Pokemon. It’s still very young and-”

“Shut the fuck up, old man!” Lyra snarled. “I’ll talk to my damn Pokemon any way I fucking please! It’s not like it can speak English anyway,” Lyra turned back to HER Cyndaquil, “Isn't that right little guy~”

The poor Pokemon curled up his body in Lyra’s grip. He nodded quickly as his whole body shivered in fear. He actually did mind, but this women seemed so volatile and explosive that was he was afraid of bringing her wrath.

“Awww~. Are you cold? You’re shaking like crazy.” Lyra cooed, mistaking her Pokemon’s shivers of fear for shivers of chill. “Oh, I know where to put you!”

Without any warning, Lyra suddenly brought the little Cyndaquil to her chest and plunged him in between the valley of her bouncy, perky cleavage. The frightened Pokemon struggled against his new trainer’s vice grip, but the flesh around him was too firm for him to get a hold on. All he ended up doing was give Lyra a massage.

“Mmmm...see! The bastard already loves me!” Lyra moaned in pleasure as Cyndaquil continued to rub up against her breasts.

“W-well!” Professor Elm stuttered at the display he was watching. “That is a very unorthodox way of holding a Pokemon, but if he...l-likes it I can’t complain.” He made his way to the other side of his laboratory. “If you are done acquainting yourself with your new Pokemon, your Pokedex, badge case, and free complementary Pokeballs are waiting here for you.”

With Cyndaquil hidden away from the outside world, Lyra made her way towards her trainer supplies, with Elm watching in slight disgust as her boobs wobbled from the small Pokemon trapped inside.

“Thanks, old man, but I don’t think I’ll be needing those silly Pokeballs.” She said as she set the shrunken Pokeballs back down on the table. “In fact, I don’t think I’ll need this either!” Lyra picked up her Cyndaquil’s Pokeball, and smashed it down at the base of her feet.

“My little Cyndaquil would never ever leave me, that is if he knows what good for him ~.” Lyra explained cheerily, scaring the poor Pokemon in her breasts once again. Professor Elm watched the chubby trainer leave his Pokemon Laboratory with her Pokemon trapped inside her mammaries. He wondered how on Earth she thought she was going to catch any Pokemon without any Pokeballs.

What he didn’t know was that Lyra wasn't planning on catching much Pokemon at all. At least, not in Pokeballs…

“C’mon, lil’ guy! Were gonna see my mom before I go. You’ll love her, she’s just like me, but bigger!” Lyra patted her breasts affectionately as she made her way to her house near the Laboratory. Lyra’s description of her mother once gain sent shivers down his back. Bigger than her? She was already huge to him! And there were people bigger than her? He dreaded meeting this woman, but Lyra was ecstatic.

Eventually, Lyra made her way to her childhood home. She walked through the front yard, opened the front door, and shouted at the top of her lungs, “MOM! I'M HOME!” So loud that Cyndaquil’s eardrums rang even though her voice was muffled through breast fat.

The house shook as Lyra’s mother made her way out of the kitchen. Professor Elm was not exaggerating when he said that she was a mountain of a women. She was 9’7’’, her head almost scraping against the ceiling, and 845 lbs, four times as much as Lyra weighed. Since she rarely ever led the house except to get groceries, she was stark nude with her massive, yoga ball breasts wobbled two and fro atop her wrecking ball stomach. Lyra, however, was completely unfazed, having grown used to her mother’s nudism.

“Hi there, sweetie!” Lyra’s mother opened her puffy arms wide, and Lyra happily ran up and jumped into her massive mother’s embrace. Although she was notable smaller than her mother, the two were never fazed by the size difference between them. “So you got, your new Pokemon? Where is the lil’ shit, let me see him!” Lyra’s mom asked impatiently. She was so excited that her darling baby was gonna go on a Pokemon journey.

“Sure mom! Come on on out Cyndaquil!” Lyra stopped hugging her mother for a moment to fish out the little Pokemon trapped in her breasts. Cyndaquil’s world was full of bright light as he was brought out from the dark depths of his master’s mammaries, only for his field of vision to clear up and show an even more massive women looking down at him.

"Oh my Arceus he' fucking adorable!" Lyra's mother exclaimed as she set her comparisonly puny daughter down so she could hug her new Pokemon instead. Like before with Lyra, her hug squeezed out the air from his lungs, but this time, his whole body was squashed and smothered by the motherly figure's pale titflesh. He also learned where Lyra got her vocabulary.
12222.title: Cyndaquil

choices: She just leaves this boring town
She goes to pester Ethan first
122221.content:
The poor little Cyndaquil had always dreamed about the day he’d be given to a trainer. He had expected to be given to one of the adorable, young aspiring trainers in town, so they could go on their Pokémon adventure, growing up together and getting stronger over the years, beating gym leaders and maybe one day working up to the elite four! All his hopes were dashed from his mind, though, when he was picked up by what he assumed must’ve been the biggest, foulest, most abhorrent young woman in the world. The day he’s been dreaming about was turning out to be the worst day of his short life… and, as if just to rub salt into his wounds, now he’s learning that there’s another woman so huge and foul, she makes Lyra look like a professional athlete!

To put it into perspective, not only was the woman taller than a Zekrom, she was also almost FIFTY times heavier than him. He didn’t even know humans could get this large! He was shivering in fear as the woman roughly manhandled him, worried she might just accidentally squish him with the slightest touch. This was the first time he’s seen a human without their clothes on, and it wasn’t a pretty sight. Her massive, flabby rolls jiggled with her every movement, and the Cyndaquil felt smothered as he was pressed up against her huge, saggy tits. Eventually, the mountainous woman hands him back to Lyra. Lyra stuffs him back in her cleavage, but this time she let's his head poke out from between her tits.

“Well, I can’t let my precious little fatass go off on an adventure on an empty stomach!” The larger woman smiled before walking deeper into the house, wagging a finger to gesture Lyra to follow. “C’mon, c’mon. I just stocked the pantry, so you can just eat all you want, sweetie!” The Cyndaquil's eyes widened when he laid eyes on the ‘pantry’. This room was huge! It probably took up about a third of the house! Everywhere he looked, there was thousands of snacks, junk food, and other assorted meals lining countless shelves. The only food items they seemed to lack was fruit, vegetables, or anything else remotely healthy. How did they even afford all this?

Immediately upon strolling in, Lyra was like a kid in a candy shop. She immediately filled her big, chubby arms with as much junk food as she could carry, walking to the dining room, cooking some of it instantly in their seemingly magical oven, before dumping it on the table and going back for more. By the time she sat down to eat, her ‘feast’ looked like it was over 20,000 calories total! The Cyndaquil felt like he was getting bad cholesterol just looking at it! She wasn’t really planning on eating all this at once, was she? She certainly didn’t seem daunted by the size of her meal, instead just licking her lips as she dug in.

The Cyndaquil watched in awe and horror as she started devouring her feast at a seemingly impossible speed! She was capable of easing swallowing an entire hamburger in a single gulp, and tearing through over a half dozen donuts in a matter of seconds. She was stuffing her face full like a pig, bits of food dirtying her face as she sloppily devoured her meals. It was a disgusting display, but it was like a car accident; Cyndaquil just couldn’t look away. “So what are you going to name this lil’ guy?” Lyra’s mother asked, glancing down at the little fire-type.

“Hm?” She said, pausing chomping down on a slice of pizza to glance up at the huge woman. “I didn’t even know you were supposed to give these things names.” It occurred to her that she didn’t really know much about Pokémon, other than the fact that they tasted good.

“Oh, yes, you have to give him a name! He’s your first Pokémon!” She insists with a smile. “It’ll be sentimental.”

“Hmm…” She taps her chin, looking down at the nervous little Cyndaquil. She decided to just name him the first thing that came to mind when he looked at him. “How about… Snack? Do you like that name, lil’ guy?” The Cyndaquil quickly shook its head 'no'. “Well, too bad! Your name’s Snack now, pal!” She laughed an obnoxious, hyena-like cackle, as if she had just told the funniest joke of all time, before returning to her meal.

Within seconds, she had already eating enough to stuff any normal person to the brim, and yet she was still going, undeterred. Eventually, she had completely cleared the table, leaving nothing but crumbs. Unleashing a thunderous burp, she leaned back in her chair, contentedly patting her big, round, full gut. Snack glanced down, seeing that her belly was now even bigger than he was! He shivered when he realized he could hear her belly gurgle and churn as it quickly processed the food inside. Now that she was full, she stood up from her chair, her round belly bouncing slightly at she walked.

Soon, she was standing at the front door, her purse slung over her shoulder as she was ready to take on the world. Her mother stood there, a sentimental smile on her face. “So… guess this is it, then. You ready to head out?”

“Yup!” Lyra smiled, before teasing her. “I’ll be glad to finally get out of this dump.”

“Oh? My household is a dump, huh?” Her mother smirked. “Come to think of it, shouldn’t you have gone on a Pokémon adventure when you were ten? Yet eight years later and you’ve still been bumming around on the couch like some freeloading fatass, taking advantage of the kindness of your dear old mother…”

“Oh, fuck you!” Lyra shouted, and Snack's eyes widened as Lyra gave her own mother the finger.

“Fuck you too, you little brat!” Her mother retorted, flipping her the bird right back. They were quiet for a moment, and Snack was worried they’d get into a fight or something. However, instead, they both burst out laughing! Apparently, this was all just a game to them. Lyra’s mother hugged her daughter close again, planting a big, slobbery kiss on her cheek. “Love you, sweetheart! Have fun on your adventure! Stay safe out there!”

“I love you too, mom,” she smiled, wrapping her arms around her mother’s huge neck and hugging her back. Eventually, Lyra set off, hearing her mother slam the door behind her.

As she stood at the exit of the town she’s lived in all her life, she looked back and hesitated. Did she have any other unfinished business here, by any chance? Who knew how long it’d be be before she ever came back? Hmm… well, she didn’t really know anyone here except her mother and the professor, and she’d already dealt with them both. Most people seemed to avoid her, except… aha! Come to think of it, she did know this one kid named Ethan. He was an annoying little wannabe trainer, and she was tempted to go to his house and rub it in his face that her new Pokémon was way cooler than his lame little Marill. Maybe she could even drag him along on her adventure.
122221.title: Lyra Is Given A Going Away Feast

1222212.content:
New Bark Town was not a city of many sights, yet it was known throughout the Johto Region for being the least populated settlement in the area. There was literally only a population of under a hundred in the small, quiet hamlet. And besides being the home of the national Pokemon Laboratory, that was it. That was all the town had.


Because of the towns minuscule populace, there was a record only two kids in the town: Lyra, and a small, nine year old boy called Ethan, coming up on ten. Like most kids in the world, he wants to become a Pokemon Trainer, eager to go out with his trusty Marill into a brave new world of adventure. Unlike Lyra, He shows a lot of sympathy towards Pokémon, usually helping and befriending them, which is how he caught his Marill.

Lyra hated the little brat.

But she loved bullying him. The small child was an easy target, gullible and naive. Ethan used to have two Pokemon, a cute little Furret he got from his late father as a birthday gift. She dropped it into her cavernous maw when he refused to give her his bag lunch. The way he just stood there mortified and than went screaming all the way back home…

“‘Sigh’, good times…” Lyra reminisced as she rubbed her gut, still digesting her huge feast from before. Her body was quick to absorb the calories from the massive meal and turn it into more pudge on her frame. It won’t be long until an extra five pounds were added to her weight.

Soon, Lyra snapped out of her daydream and started to trot to one of the only other house in town, Ethan’s. Besides her mom, Ethan was the only the only thing that would keep her coming back to New Bark. She wanted to be rid of this town for good, but he was just to fun to laugh at to leave forever.

Unless…

“Snack!” Lyra addressed the Pokemon wedged in her breasts. “You and I are gonna get ourselves a travelling buddy!”

Lyra violently swung open the gate to the Gold Household, a well decorated little house with flowering plants running up the side of the walls. Snack peered over the top of his trainer’s titflesh to enjoy the view, but Lyra was pushed him roughly back down as she pounded on the front door.

“Ethan? Could you get that, please?” An older woman's voice rang throughout the house inside. “I think I have a headache…”

“Sure, Mom!” An enthusiastic, young boy’s voice answered in response. Lyra smirked as she heard the pitter patter of sneakers rushing down the stairs. The door opened to reveal Ethan Gold, wearing his trademark red jacket and cap.

The friendly smile that was on Ethan’s face melted away as he saw Lyra, the town bully, outside of the doorway. Nevertheless, he tried to keep up a smile and a welcoming persona towards her, like his father had taught him. “H-hey Lyra, what’s up?”

“What’s Up, little shit, is this!” Lyra pulled Snack out from between her breasts and held him in front of the little kid’s face. “I’ve got my own Pokemon now, because I’m finally leaving this Arceus forsaken town and go on my Pokemon Journey!”

“Any you’re coming with me!” Lyra pointed a fat finger at Ethan. The nine year old stood there for a moment, slowly coming to terms with what was just said to him.

“...what?”

Lyra gave an exaggerated sigh and plopped Snack back in his ‘home’. “Arceus, do I have to spell it out to ya? You and I are gonna go on my Pokemon Journey, right now!”

“Uhhh...Mom?!” Ethan yelled back into the house, nervous if Lyra was actually being serious or not. “Lyra is here and she says-”

“Not now, honey. Mommy’s trying to sleep…” Was the response he got. He turned back to Lyra, who was eyeing the boy hungrily.

“Well, you heard her. NOW MOVE YOUR ASS!” Lyra grabbed Ethan’s arm and practically tore it out of his socket as she dragged him away from his home with speed you would not expect from someone her size.

“Cynda-quil?” Snack cried as the tight blubber around him suddenly began to shake and up and down violently as Lyra ran. He gripped the sides of her breasts as she began to sweat, making the surface around him slippery.

“Lyra! Please. Stop!” Ethan begged as he struggled to keep pace with the larger girl. “I'm not ready to go on a Pokemon Journey! I’m nine!”

“And I’m eighteen!” Lyra shot back as they passed the laboratory. “But that’s not stopping me. Is it!?”

Professor Elm form inside his workplace briefly heard little Ethan from two houses down outside. He chuckled “Little scamp must be having a ball out there. I’m glad he’s having fun, and even more that the town bitch is gone.” He took a casual sip from his cup of tea. “He’ll be much more happy now that she’s gone from his life.”

“Oww! Lyra stop pulling my arm it hurts!” Ethan whined as Lyra dragged him from the only place he has ever known. They had made it pass the town’s border, and were officially on the Pokemon Route.

“Suck it up! Come on, isn't this what you wanted? To go on a Pokemon Journey and make friends with all the Pokemon and all that stupid crap?” Lyra said as she finally slowed down for the child behind.

“Yeah, but now with some meanie like you!” Ethan said, finally pulling his arm away from her grip. “You eat Pokemon! You make fun of and you go out of your way to hurt others! There's no way I’m going with you!”

Lyra, for once, was actually caught off guard by Ethan’s retort. She stood silent, stunned at the boy talking back to her. Snack peeked out from his trainer's chest and smiled. Maybe this was what she needed. Maybe she just needed someone to take a stand to her behavior for her to-

“What did you just say to me you little bitch?”

Oh no.

Lyra stomped towards Ethan as he realized as he realized that he was in for a world of hurt. “W-wait, Lyra! Let me explain! I didn't mean-”

Ethan’s pleas for mercy were cut off as Lyra bumped her heavy stomach into his torso, sending him to the ground with a thud. He rubbed his eyes as the dust around picked up from the impact, but when he opened the, all eh could see was Lyra’s jean shorts hovering over him.

“Ethan, Ethan, Ethan…” Lyra feigned disappointment. “That is no way to talk to your travelling buddy. It appears that your gonna have to learn your lesson the hard way.”

Before his mouth could even open to protest, Ethan’s head was buried under Lyra’s well endowed backside as the chubby trainer sat on his face. He struggled under her and attempted to push her off, but her weight was too much for his frail body to handle. He kicked and flailed his legs, but only ended up giving Lyra a massage, well needed after the feast she had.

“Mmmm, yeah keep doing that twerp. I might just forgive ya if you can last two minutes.”
1222212.title: She goes to pester Ethan first

choices: She heads to Route 30 to train Snack
She just lounges around the house
12222122.content:
She cackled as she felt his struggles slowly slow to a crawl as he weakened. At this rate, he might actually run out of air down there before the 2 minutes were up. That thought was absolutely hilarious to her! Lyra had never actually killed anyone before, though she would certainly have zero compunctions about doing so someday. Hell, she licked her lips as she fantasized about the day she was big enough to be able to swallow brats this size whole, just like her mother could.

She was distracted from that thought by a little blue figure approaching from down the route. She looked out and squinted, only to realize it was Ethan’s marill, a pissed-off look on its face as it ran towards them as fast its little legs could carry it. She laughed at the sight. “Hey, look. If it isn’t your little-” Before she could finish that sentence, the marill leaped through the air towards her, flipping around in mid-air and smacking her across the cheek with its tail! Somehow, the pathetic marill’s attack hurt like hell, leaving a bruise on her cheek and knocking her off of Ethan. “Ow! Shit! What the fuck?”

The marill kept badgering her, each of its attacks feeling like getting punched by a tiny fist. “Ow! Ow! Ow! Get away from me!” She tried to grab the marill, but it was too small, and moved too fast for the chubby woman to keep up. “Ethan! Call off your little pet, or it’s lunch meat!”

“No! I hate you!” Ethan shouted, weakly sitting up. “Get her, Marill!”

Lyra glanced at him angrily, fire in her eyes… only for the marill to jump up and hit her on the cheek again. “Ow! Damn it!” Suddenly, she remembered that she had a Pokémon, too. “Snack, what are you waiting for? Get out there and get that thing!” The little Cyndaquil in between her tits had been disoriented by all the movement, but at her command, she jumped out and faced the marill, fearing being punished himself if he disobeyed. What followed was quite possibly the lamest Pokémon battle ever. They were both only level 5, so they could only use Tackle on each other over and over again.

Eventually, though, Snack won, being slightly faster and stronger than the marill was. With a whimper, the water-type collapsed onto the ground, bruised and incapacitated.

Snack grew to LV. 6!


With a snarl, Lyra walked over and lifted the whimpering marill up in the air. “Always hated this fuckin’ thing. Lamest Pokémon ever,” she said. “I know how to put it to good use, though…” She was already sort of full… but she had a point to make. So, Ethan and Snack could only watch in horror as Lyra lifted the marill up over her big, waiting mouth… and dropped it inside! Only its tail was sticking out, which she happily slurped up like a noodle.

The marill disappeared between Lyra’s lips easily; all that was left was to gulp the small Pokémon down her throat. Just as she was about to do so, though, Ethan jumped up and ran at her, shoving his hands in her mouth! “Nooooo!” He cried, grabbing it by the tail and trying to pull the marill free. Lyra grimaced, but continued swallowing the marill, pulling the boy’s hands down into her throat with it. He was whimpering, hanging on to the marill for dear life, even as his arms were pulled shoulder-deep into Lyra’s throat. He couldn’t compete with the strength of her throat’s muscles, and Ethan eventually lost his grip on the Pokémon, feeling the marill sink deeper. “Marilll!”

Now that the marill had been fully sent to her belly, Lyra pushed Ethan back, tugging his arms from her throat and knocking him to the ground. There, he curled up in a ball, sobbing and bemoaning the fate of his currently digesting Pokémon. She let out a belch as she patted her round, gurgling belly, feeling even fuller than before. “I warned you to call of your Pokémon, twerp! Damn thing just almost knocked a tooth out…” She cackled. “Oh, c’mon, crybaby. It was just a Pokémon. Not even a good one. We can just get you another one.”

Still, Ethan just lied there, crying and refusing to move. He was reacting as if his whole life had just been destroyed right in front of him. “Oh, Arceus. Seriously? I was nice enough to bring you along on my first adventure, and this is how you repay me? How selfish…” She called Snack to come nestle up in her cleavage again as she waited for Ethan to get up. Eventually, though, she grew impatient. “Ugh! C’mon, crybaby. I’m not going to wait around here all day.” With that, she straight-up picked the boy up in her arms, and continued down the route. She rolled her eyes as Ethan’s tears wet her overalls. “Ugh. Crybaby.”

She knew the route to Cherrygrove city well. Her mother used to send her down here sometimes to get groceries, as there weren’t any stores in New Bark. Eventually, Ethan had calmed down a bit, so she set him down and let him follow along after her. He was silent for the rest of the trip, staring at the ground as he walked, his eyes red. “Mm, mm! Your little pet’s really wriggling in there!” She taunted him, patting her belly and enjoying the struggles of the marill inside. With a sob, he clasped his hands over his ears, determined not to hear her.

Eventually, they made it to the entrance of Cherrygrove city. By now, the marill has stopped moving, becoming indistinguishable from all the other digesting piles of meat in Lyra’s belly. As they approach the town, Lyra spots an old man standing by the entrance, who seems to be staring shamelessly as her tits and belly. “What are you looking at, you old pervert?”

He seemed a little taken aback, but smiles as he steps forward forward. “My apologies, young lady. You simply reminded me of my dear, departed wife,” he says, staring longingly at Lyra’s round belly. “She was over a thousand pounds, you know, and taller than most of the buildings in Cherrygrove. Arceus, how I miss her…”

“Um, okay, weirdo,” Lyra growls. “Can you get out of my way, please?”

“Oh, uh, actually… I am here to provide tours of the town to rookie trainers,” he says. “You are rookie trainers, correct?”

She glances over at Ethan. He was still miserable, but apparently, the old man didn’t have good enough vision to notice his tears. “Uh, yep. Just takin’ my brother here along on our first Pokémon adventure. Isn’t that right, bro?” She smiled, quickly coming up with a lie, and wrapping her arm around Ethan’s shoulder. “But we don’t need no damn tour. Just point us to the hotel around here, and we’ll be set.”

“Actually, there… are no hotels in Cherrygrove,” the old man explains. “Most trainers set up camp outside of town for the nights.”

“Camping? Fuck that!” She groans. She can’t go camping! She needs a proper bed to sleep in. “There has to be somewhere to stay in this dump…”

The old man is quiet for a moment. “... well, I do have an open guest room available,” he offers, “but only to those who take my tour.”

She stares at him, incredulous, before rolling her eyes with a sigh. “Ugh. Fine, old man. Give us your damn tour…”

What follows was probably the most boring tour of all time. Not only did he spout out a bunch of shit she already knew, he constantly looked for opportunities to ogle her chubby form. Eventually, though, they made it to his humble house. “Come in, come in! Make yourself at home!” He said, gesturing them in. He hadn’t been lying about his wife; the doorway and the furniture was all absolutely huge, obviously made for a woman twice Lyra’s size, and the ceiling was 11 feet up. The bed in the guest bedroom was more her size, though. “Oh! One more thing. My wife would’ve wanted you to have these…”

Lyra raised a brow as he handed her a big pair of shoes. “Uh… what are these?”

“Running shoes! They’re useful if you’re planning on gaining weight. With them on, no matter how big you get, you’ll still be able to run just as quickly, without getting tired!” He happily explained.

“Uh… thanks,” she said, before gesturing from him to go away. Ethan went over and crashed on the bed, obviously too miserable to want to go anywhere the rest of the day. Lyra glanced out the window, seeing it was about 7 pm. The sun would be setting in an hour, and she didn’t want to be out on the routes after dark. Still, maybe she could get some training in before she goes to bed...
12222122.title: Ethan Calls Out His Marril

choices: Oh yeah, the old man said something about a pantry...
122221222.content:
Suddenly, Lyra heard the old man calling her from another part of the house. “Excuse me, young lady!?” He cried. “Could you please come in here for a moment?!”

Lyra rolled her eyes and gave a long sigh. She reluctantly followed the sound of the old man;s voice and came upon the room he was in: the basement.

“Ugh! I did not sign up for this when I took your lame ass tour, old perv!” Lyra called down as she stomped down the stairs. “Whatever you want better be...worth...it…”

“Lyra stopped in the middle of her sentence as she came to the bottom of the stairwell, staring at the contents of the basement. Snack, still riding along in his master’s cleavage, dropped his jaw at the sight of what lies underneath the old man’s house.

It was a pantry.

A giant pantry.

A HUMONGOUS Pantry!

Lyra felt like she had died and gone into food heaven as she slowly walked through the basement. It was wider than the house above was, and filled to the brim with literally all kinds of foods. Canned goods, dry food, packaged meals, snacks, candy bars! The old man was not kidding when he said his wife towered over Cherrygrove; A Snorlax couldn't finish half of what was inside!

“Impressive, isn't it?” The old man suddenly appeared behind Lyra, who gave a yelp of surprise and a smack against the old man’s face in response.

“Sorry, sorry…” The old man apologized. “Anyway, i called you down here for something important. This may sound silly, but I actually have a business trip in Goldenrod City to attend to, And I was on my way to lock up the house when the two of you arrived.”

“What!?” Lyra shouted. “Nuh uh! No way are you kicking us out just because your memory is shit!”

“Relax, young lady.” The old man raised his arms in defense casually. “I'm not kicking you out. Quite the contrary, I’m letting you stay here while I‘m gone!”

Lyra’s rage had subsided, and was soon replaced with shock and surprise. She took another look around the basement, making sure the food was till they're and not some hallucination her mind brewed up.

“You...you mean…” Lyra started off carefully. “ALL of this food…?!”

“That’s right, it’s for you, your brother and your Pokemon.” The old man grinned. Lyra was a little bit put off when he included Ethan and Snack, but that didn't stop her from giving the perverted old man a bear hug that squeezed the air out of his lungs.

“Oh Arceus, yes!” Lyra hopped on her two feet, giving the old man a good view of her bouncing, shiny cleavage. He gave a dirty smile, believing that this and this alone would make up for a sizable dent in his food supply when he came back.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Lyra, Ethan, and Snack watch the old man leave the house, and than soon Cherrygrove City. Lyra gave a triumphant grin and slammed the door shut, happy to be rid of the old perv. She took a look at Ethan, still silent and miserable, but not as much as he was before. He just moped around the living room without making a sound.

Lyra frowned at the little twerp attitude. She finally decided that enough was enough and walked up to Ethan with a snarl. “Alright ya little brat, listen to me. You being down in the dumps is making me annoyed as hell, so stop it!”

“Leave me alone…” Ethan mumbled under his breath, still torn up over the death of his best friend.

“Aw, is this still about your wimpy little Marill?” Lyra put her hands on her wide hips. “Come on, It was just a Pokemon! You can just get another one!”

“But there won’t ever be ‘another one’!” Ethan clenched his fists and raised his head definitely at Lyra. “There's never gonna be another Pokemon like my Marill!”

“Oh my Arceus you are so pretentious…” Lyra moaned. “I’m guessing you skinny Mom and dead Dad didn't give you ‘the talk’ yet, huh?”

“...talk?” Ethan echoed, not understanding what Lyra was getting at. “What are you talking about?”

Lyra gave an evil smirk at the poor boy. “Ohoho! This is gonna be fun.” She grabbed Ethan by his arm and sat him down on the couch. She than proceeded to sit down next to him, her weight making the furniture creak, her flabby thigh spilling into his lap.

“Here Snack, you’ll want to be sitting down too.” Lyra fished her Cyndaquil out from her breasts and sat him down next to her and Ethan. The poor Pokemon was squished between the little boy’s knee and his master’s bubble butt.

“Did you ever think about where meat comes from, brat?” Lyra asked with a smug smile on her face. Ethan widened his eyes and shook his head. He had always thought that meat just...came from the store like everything else.

“It comes from Pokemon, dumbass.” Lyra rolled her eyes.


“What!? No they don’t!” Ethan crossed his arms across his chest stubbornly. There was no way that was true. Lyra was just lying to him to see if he would get a reaction.

“Oh for the love of…” Lyra grabbed a frozen burger patty packet from her pocket, who had taken it from the pantry downstairs in plans to microwave it for a short snack. “Read this!”

Ethan grimaced, but slowly took the frozen patty packet from Lyra’s pudgy hand. He began to read the writing on the plastic casing. He stopped, however, when he came across a sentence that shook him to his very core.

“100%...T-t-tauros meat!?” Ethan gasped.

“Yep!” Lyra smiled. “And the eggs that your Mom buys at the store to make you breakfast?”

“No!” Ethan wailed. “It’s not true!” He closed his eyes and shut them hard, not wanting to cry in front of Lyra, who would only make fun of him for it. Snack felt sorry for the nine year old Ethan. He went through as similar kind of reaction when he found out as well, and knew exactly what was going on in his head. With a grunt, he popped out from between the tight space he was in, and climbed up onto Ethan’s lap to comfort him.

“Listen, brat-...’sigh’, Ethan.” Lyra sighed. “As much fun it is to see you like this, just...just look down.”

Ethan reluctant parted his moist eyelids, and was greeted to the sight of Lyra’s Pokemon hugging his abdomen, trying to cheer him up.

“Snack still likes you even though you eat Pokemon. He’s dumb as shit, but he knows that you eat Pokemon, and he’s still hugging you.” Lyra offered, being almost kind to the boy.

“Everyone eats Pokemon, Ethan. We need meat to live, right? I eat meat, Professor Elm eats meat, your mom eats meat, YOU eat meat. Hell, if we didn't eat Pokemon, than they will! It’s not all daffodils and roses out in the real world kid. But that doesn't mean your a bad guy. Your just hungry.”

After Lyra finished her speech, Ethan and Snack were looking up at her in shock. Did she really just say that? Ethan didn't think she had the capacity to say anything more than taunts and insults.

“...I’m still mad at you for taking me from my home and eating Marill.” He reminded.

Lyra shrugged her shoulders. “Fair enough. But what can I say, a gal gets hungry~.” She smacked her belly affectionately, watching how it jiggled for a few seconds afterwards. “But can we at leasts say that we tolerate each other?”

Ethan closed his eyes and held Snack tight. Lyra was far, FAR away from ever being considered her friend. But he would be lying if he said that he hadn't learned something important from her. If she hadn't basically kidnapped him and drag him across to Cherrygrove, he would have still have Marill, but also not get such a life shaking revelation. His mom was...a frail thing, she would have never told him. Maybe Arceus had a plan in store for the two of them.

“Okay.” Ethan finally relented with a small smile. “Were surviving together.”

“That’s the spirit!” Lyra smacked Ethan on his back, making him double over, forcing Snack to hop off from his lap. She definitely did not know her own strength.

“So…” Ethan moaned as he rubbed his back. “What now?”

1222212223.content:
Lyra was quite a bit pudgier than most. Hell, she was the second largest person back in New Bark Town, rivaled only by her own mother. Still, she’s always wanted to be even bigger; to a be a true mountain of a woman, just like her mother was! She shuddered, exciting by the thought of towering over people to such an extent. Unfortunately, her mother refused to let her eat as much food as she wanted until she started helping pay for the groceries, and she was far too lazy to get any sort of job, so for the past few years, her weight has constantly hovered at around 200 pounds. But no more! She was striking out on her own, now, and she was dedicated to being the biggest and best she could be!

She left Ethan alone for now, heading down into the basement and grabbing more big armfuls of food. After metabolizing her huge feast during her trek down the route here, her belly had shrunken to about half the size, so there was definitely room to fit more stuff in there before calling it a day. She shoves it all into one of those weird magical ovens, cooking it to perfection instantly. She licked her lips in anticipation as she spread it out on the table. This meal would only be half of the size of her lunch, but it would still be enough to stuff her again. “Hey, runt! It’s dinner time!”

Ethan walked out, only to stare in awe at the dining room table. On Lyra’s side, there was an assortment of every kind of food he could imagine, emanating the perfect mix of delicious smells that could make anybody’s mouth water. On his side… there was a single bowl of mac and cheese. He sighed, wishing more than ever that he was back home with his mother, though he didn’t have the energy to defy Lyra again tonight. “Uh… thanks, Lyra,” he said, sitting down across from her.

He started slowly taking bites of his ‘dinner’... but soon, though, he was distracted by the sight of Lyra chowing down! He glanced up just in time to see her shove an entire donut down her throat, before reaching for another. He was instantly almost memorized by how quickly she tore through her buffet-sized feast. It was like a car accident; he just couldn’t look away. One by one, food disappears easily down her stretchy throat, and she hardly even takes the time to swallow one thing before eagerly stuffing another thing in her mouth. He stared in awe as he realized he could visibly see her belly getting bigger and rounder with every passing second.

After only fifteen minutes, it was all gone. She leaned back in her chair and unleashed a loud, triumphant belch, having easily devoured a feast fit for ten people. Her belly was back to its maximum size again, and she patted and rubbed it while it got to work on digesting her meal. “Mmm, mmm! That was damn good!” She sighed in relaxation, before opening her eyes and glancing at the boy. “Hm? You didn’t even try a bite? Your dinner’s probably cold by now…” As if woken from a trance, he looked down, only to realize she was right. Looks like he was going to bed hungry tonight.

Lyra watched television for another half hour, toying with and rubbing her gut as she laughed at stupid game shows. Eventually, though, she decided to call it a day. They only had one bed, so Ethan ended up getting cuddled like a teddy bear by the massive, slumbering young woman. It was a little weird, but he had to admit, her warm, plush, pillowy body was actually quite comfortable. Besides, even in her sleep, her grip was like a vice, so it’s not like there’d be any way for him to escape anyway. With that, he just gave up, falling asleep to the noise of Lyra’s belly gurgling as it processed her meal…

The next morning, Lyra woke and giggled at the sight of Ethan sleeping peacefully in her arms. She gently let him go and snuck out of the room, immediately heading to the scale to see her new weight. Her height increased to 6 feet and her BMI increased by 0.5, meaning she had gained about 10 pounds. She was practically jumping up and down with excitement! Two inches in one day? At this rate, she’d be 7’ in no time at all! Of course, once you’re over 7 feet tall, getting any bigger became exponentially more and more difficult. In order to gain weight at this rate, she needed to completely stuff her belly; thus, when she gets bigger and her belly’s capacity increases, she wonders how she’ll find enough food to fill it up. She’ll cross that bridge when she comes to it, though. All she wanted to focus on now was getting to that 7 foot benchmark…

Despite that thought, she has a surprisingly light breakfast. She didn’t want to spoil her appetite, after all, in anticipation for what she had planned. She roused Snack from her slumber. “C’mon, Snack. It’s time to finally start trainin’ ya!” She smiled, lifting the sleepy Cyndaquil up and stuffing him partway into her cleavage again. She left Ethan to get some rest as she walked down to Route 30, eager to explore the new route for the first time. She had a bit of a decision to make, though. At first, she figured she’d just devour every single Pokemon she defeated… but maybe, before she started filling her belly, she should try to catch one? It’d be nice to have a second little snack around, and it'd be nice to have a well-rounded team for the trials to come. She could also find a new Pokemon for Ethan, to replace that lame marill he had. Not to be nice or anything! Just so the little brat would stop moping all the time.

12222122233.content:
Lyra finally came to the conclusion that without any Pokemon, Ethan technically couldn't qualify as a Pokemon Trainer. And if he wasn't a Trainer, than he wasn't on his journey. And if he wasn't on his journey...people will start to question why he’s hanging around her. As little as Pokemon training she does know, she is aware that, unless you are a trainer, you can’t travel the region, even accompanied by someone else. It’s considered too dangerous.

Plus, if Ethan had a Pokemon, she essentially had two Snacks to send off into battles for prize money and food! Sure, technically it would be his, but Lyra has so much control over the boy it might as well be hers.

With a smile, Lyra patted Snack on the head and set out into the tall grass, on the hunt for a strong, rare, and cute Pokemon to catch.

Unfortunately, there was about as much strong, rare, and cute Pokemon in Route 30 as there was humans in New Bark Town. Yes, the Johto path was teeming with Pokemon wildlife, but they were all so...terrible. Rattata, Caterpie, Pidgey, none of them were worthy enough to be Ethan’s Pokemon.

As such, all the Pokemon that Lyra deemed weak and or just stupid looking, was mainly used as a means for Snack to gain more experience, making him stronger, and than, after they faint, are sent into Lyra’s awaiting maw, making her stomach rounder. By the first hour in of this grinding technique, Snack had leveled up to LV. 10, and Lyra’s belly was as back at maximum capacity.

Lyra took the time to take a break, tired from watching Snack fight all those Pokemon for her and than eating the same Pokemon later. She sat down at the base of a tree and leaned back, sighing. It didn't look like there was any rare Pokemon on Route 30 at all, just the run of the mill shit you find rummaging through your garbage.

“I guess this morning hasn't been a total loss…” Lyra lamented as she gave her body a once over. Right now, her stomach was bulging with the struggling Pokemon inside. She bit her lip as they punched her stomach wall. It was probably some poor Rattata trying to inflict some damage on her, but all it amounted to was an internal massage.

Lyra shifted her focus from her massive belly to other parts of her body. All she could soon think about was how soon the struggling Pokemon inside her stomach would be nothing but goop and meat, ready to be processed into more fat to add onto her body. She cupped her breasts and fantasized how much they would soon grow. Sure, compared to her mother she was practically flat chested, but what would she look like by the end of her journey? Her boobs could be the size of her own house...or even bigger…

Snack hopped up on the top of Lyra’s curvy buttocks, distracting her attention from her chest to her ample backside. She smiled as the tiny Cyndaquil tried to stand on top of his master’s butt flesh, only to slip and fall back down on his feet. She briefly wondered if he would like to be stuffed inside her butcheeks for a change, rather than her boobs. She kept herself clean enough, and Snack seems content resting there…

Suddenly, Lyra saw something out of the corner of her eye. It was a Pokemon, about ten feet away, picking berries from a nearby bush, not noticing the massive human who had about a dozen of it’s brethren inside her belly.

Lyra leaned forward, squinting a little bit to get a closer view of the Pokemon blissfully eating away, only to find the Pokemon that she had spent so much time looking for! It was a orange, weasel-sea otter fusion with a yellow collar around his neck that resembled a swimming ring you would wear to keep from drowning. It had cream colored spots above each eye along with two blue fins on his arms.

It was without a doubt rare, Lyra wondered if it was even from a different region all together. It was cute, so cute it gave the Chikorita back at the Laboratory a run for its money. But was it strong…?

Only one way to find out.

“Snack! Get off your lazy ass as go beat up that adorable Pokemon!” Lyra slapped her booty, shaking the fire type off of her rear end. Snack grunted and reluctantly ran up to the orange Pokemon picking fruit. He had been battling Pokemon all morning, and yes, he was much stronger, but he was just so tired and out of breath. He was hoping he would have some more time for rest, but apparently Lyra had other plans.

Snack stopped running up to the Pokemon and got into an aggressive stance, signalling that the battle has started. However, the Pokemon was totally oblivious to the Cyndaquil, still munching on some well deserved breakfast.

Snack sighed and got out of his aggressive stance and simply slapped a berry out of the Pokemon’s paw. The rare Pokemon looked askance at his barren paw and turned to Snack with a frown on his face. In an instant, a Water Gun was flared from his mouth, directly aimed at Snack. Being a fire-type and already on HP, Snack took a one hit knockout and was sent into the air by the force of the attack, and down right back into Lyra’s bouncy breasts.

“...huh.” Lyra noted, genuinely impressed. “Strong AND a good aim. Welp, I’ve decided, you're gonna be my brat’s Pokemon.” She sat up and began to walk over to the Pokemon in the hopes of catching it. Of course, she didn't have any Pokeballs to capture it with, and it wasn't weakened in the slightest. But Lyra had thought up of another way of catching Pokemon alive…

Soon, the small Pokemon was caught in the massive human’s shadow, her form looming over him intimately. The rare Pokemon looked up and blinked at the big creature, before smiling and waiving it’s cute little paw at her. “Bui~. Buizel!”

So that’s what it’s name was, a Buizel. Definitely not one with Lyra had ever heard before. But that did not matter now. What mattered was getting ii back to the old man’s house in Cherrygrove.

But how?

122221222333.content:
Usually, she just took what she wanted through sheer brute force, but she was going to have to adjust her tactics for this one. She knew from getting slapped by that marill that Pokémon attacks, regardless of how weak they were, could hurt. She still had the bruises!

Unlike that marill, though, this buizel didn’t seem all that eager to attack her. In fact, he seemed downright friendly! She guesses he doesn’t notice the occasional imprints of small pawprints bulging against the side of her gut, as over a dozen tiny Pokémon squirm within. A buizel this stupid should be very easy to trick! Maybe she could try acting… nice, for a change?

She mustered a warm, friendly smile, as she bent over to face the little buizel. “Aww! Hey there, little guy! Well, aren’t you just the cutest thing I ever did see?” She said, slowly and gently reaching a hand forward to pat the buizel on the head, causing the buizel to cutely giggle. “Oh, did that mean little cyndaquil bully you? Oh, you poor thing!”

She moved her chubby hand to scratch the side of its neck, and it let out a little purr, closing its eyes and leanings its head into her hands. It seemed to enjoy her company, obviously not suspecting a thing.

Apparently, it really liked having the fur of its neck around that little ring scratched. It must be uncomfortable to have that thing wrapped around its neck all the time. Soon, she had it wrapped around her finger, to the point that it started whimpering when she pulled her hand away.

“You know, I have a surprise I wanted to give to a very special Pokémon, just like you!” The buizel tilted its head for a moment, confused, but then started jumping up and down in excitement. “Go on, close your eyes. Don’t want to spoil the surprise, do you? No peeking!” She giggled and wagged a finger, and the buizel relented, cutely covering its eyes with its paws while shivering with anticipation.

With a smug smirk, she turned around and bent over. At the same time, the buizel is unable to take the suspense anymore, and peeks through its paws… only to be confused by the sight of Lyra’s massive booty looming over it! Before it could react, she leaped up into the air, and landed right on-top of the buizel full-force, smashing it against the ground with her butt! The young woman was over three times heavier than the little buizel, and she slammed all that weight down on it at once!

She let out a sadistic laugh as she ground her butt down on the helpless buizel, before lifting herself again to survey the damage. The buizel definitely seemed to be stunned, but she could tell it was down but not out. With a snort, she turned around, and slammed her butt down on the buizel again! She squished the buizel with her booty over and over again until it was half-conscious, with little spirals for eyes.

Lyra cackled triumphantly, lifting the limp buizel up into the air by the scruff of its neck. What did she even need Snack for, when Pokémon were already this easy for her to catch? Now all she needed to do was think of a fun way to transport the buizel back to town… and she thinks she has a few ideas.

Snack sure seemed to think her booty was comfy… so maybe it’d be the perfect place for the buizel to ‘rest’ a while. She was free-buffing like always, so when she pulled the back of her tight jean shorts down, the full might and splendor of her big, jiggling booty was revealed to it. Her rump was quite possibly Lyra’s proudest possession… but the buizel didn’t seem to appreciate it as much, wriggling against her grip as she brought it closer.

The buizel let out a little yelp as, with a single moment, she shoved it right into her crack! Her big, soft, pillowy booty cheeks jiggled a bit as the small Pokémon wrestled between them, but eventually settled around the buizel, smothering it in all that squishy, sweaty flesh. With a hyena-like cackle, she pulled her shorts back up, dooming the buizel to her crack. It squirms as much as it can between her cheeks, but all it accomplished is giving her a pleasant massage.

With that, Lyra started walking down the route back to Cherrygrove, excitement fluttering in her chest as she considered the morning’s accomplishment. Obviously, the buizel must not be native to Johto, since she’s never seen it on the national Pokedex. It must be considered super rare and exotic around here! And now, it was right where it belonged...

The buizel’s struggles were desperate, but not nearly as desperate as all the Pokémon in her big, round beach ball of a belly now that digestion’s really started to kick in. She sighed at the sensation, rubbing and patting her bulging gut. This must be the most satisfying meal she’s had… well, in her entire life! Sure, stuffing herself with food from the pantry was fun, but nothing compares to lively, squirming meals.

Back in New Bark, she was able to have the occasional Pokémon as a snack, but not very often. Sometimes, she’d come across a rattata sorting through her garbage, or manage to snatch a pidgey that wasn’t paying any attention… but they were just that. Light snacks. The most filling meal she had before now was Ethan’s furrets. But now? Mmm! She could feel each and every little movement the dozen Pokémon inside of her made as her powerful stomach gurgled them all up. This is exactly what she had in mind when she went on this adventure! She hoped she could have a meal like this every day…

┄┄┄


“What do you MEAN you can’t heal my Pokémon?”

Lyra was standing at the counter of the Pokémon center, yelling loudly and generally making a scene. The scrawny Nurse Joy at the counter had a frown on her face, feeling small in the face of the much larger young woman. “We’re sorry, but our machines only work if the Pokémon are in their Pokéballs,” she nervously confesses. “If you want, the Pokémart next door sells potions…”

“Ugh! You’re so USELESS!” Lyra shouts, slamming her fist down on the table. “What’s the point of a Pokémon center if they can’t even heal my fucking Pokémon?” The young woman was upset, but even moreso when she noticed the nurse start buzzing for security. “Oh, no you don’t! Don’t you dare call security on me!”

Two bulky security guards walked in stoically. Since size doesn’t just increase when you gain weight, but also muscle, the guards were even taller than Lyra was, and were able to easily overpower her. “Hey! Let go of me!” She says, wriggling futilely in their grips as they dragged her out of the store, and tossed her unceremoniously in the grass. Lyra coughed and sputtered as she pulled herself to her feet, indignantly. “When I come back here, I’m gonna be 20 feet tall, you hear me? And then you’ll all be sorry!”

She stood there in front of the Pokémon center for a while, stewing in her anger, before deciding it wasn’t worth her time. “Fuck it!” She growled, stomping loudly back to the old man’s house. She always liked the feeling of overpowering little weaklings, but she absolutely hated being overpowered herself.

Thus, she walked into the house in an absolutely sour mood. Ethan was sat on the couch watching TV, and glanced at her when she walked in, only to blush and avert his gaze when she pulled the back of her shorts down. To his surprise, Lyra tossed a small, half-conscious buizel into his lap! “There! There’s your stupid Pokémon! Happy?” She growled.

She was too excited upon seeing the buizel to be put off by her aggression. He immediately lifted the water-type up in his hands, inspecting it with excitement in his eyes. “Oh my Arceus! These things are supposed to live all the way over in Sinnoh! How did you get this?” He smiled. Of course he would immediately know the natural origins of a buizel. Little nerd.

“I’m just the best damn trainer in the world. That’s all there is to it,” she shrugged, before bumping him off the couch. “Now, buzz off! I need some alone time.” Sensing how angry she was, Ethan hurried to his room, eager to escape her wrath. Now that he’s out of her hair, she sits bitterly on the couch, still pissed off.

If the Pokémon centers weren’t going to help her, she was going to need to get her hands on some potions. But how? She certainly didn’t have any money. Hell, Lyra’s never worked an honest day in her life. But if she was going to make it as a Pokémon trainer, she needed to make some dough somehow...

1222212223332.content:
Lyra rationalized that the Old Man had to have some money hanging around the house, or at least something remotely valuable. He had enough money to support a wife that was literally bigger than all the other buildings in Cherrygrove, enough to fill the underground shelter underneath his house with food, so his must have something of value lying around.

Lyra plucked Snack from out of her cleavage and tossed the unconscious Cyndaquil onto the couch unceremoniously. “What? Still out cold? Ugh, your so useless...well, at least not as useless as that bitch Nurse Joy.”

Lyra got her ample ass off of the couch and decided to take a more in detail look at the house the old man had left her. From the outside the house looked very impressive. It was built with crimson bricks with tall, wide windows to accommodate for the old man’s late wife. What kind of job could even come close to support all of this?

The Old Man’s house came was equipped with a top of the line kitchen, complete with fancy cookware and high end appliances. It was, naturally, the first room Lyra thought to check for valuables. Unfortunately, as expensive as most of the stuff in the room was, Lyra seriously doubted if the Poke Mart would accept stainless steel coffee makers from Kalos.

The bathroom had nothing in it as well, and only served to aggravate Lyra as she got stuck in the doorway coming in and out. It was the only room in the house that was built for someone around the old man’s height, meaning Lyra was a tad too wide for the door to accommodate.


Finally, Lyra checked the master bedroom, figuring that it had to have at least something inside. Opening the door, Lyra was initially taken aback. Above the absolutely gargantuan sized bed, there was an almost life sized portrait of the Old Man’s wife. She was HUGE. Her chest looked like two overgrown Wailmers on top of a stomach that even a Snorlax would call big. Her wide hips were leaning on the side of the house, while her big butt had smashed unforgiving into a grove behind her.

Lyra stared up in awe at the picture of the huge women that was before her. Even though it was only a fake, she felt like the real deal was looming over her, her head brushing the already tall ceiling. “Someday,” Lyra muttered under her breath “I’m gonna be bigger than you.”

Soon, Lyra was tearing apart the Old Man’s room in search of anything of value. She violently pulled out the drawers of the dressers and dumped the contents onto the floor below her. Nothing but comically oversized clothes, apparently having been grown out of, what with all the holes and stretch marks on everything. Lyra had a brief vision of what the Old Man’s wife looked liked in clothes. Nipples pushed out against the tight fabric, her cleavage exploding out of rip in the front, panties struggling against her massive butt and thighs…

It only served to fuel Lyra search even more.

“Come on! That old perv has to have something lying around! He’s gotta rich!” Lyra said as she got on her hands and knees to crawl under the massive bed. As luck would have it, there was a little, grey box hidden underneath the bed frame, just when Lyra was about to give up. Eagerly, she snatched the box with her greedy hands and emerged with it in her arms.

“Locked, huh?” Lyra fiddled with the gold painted padlock with a smirk. “That never stopped me before.” She sometimes forgot that the more fat you are in this world, the stronger you are as well. She gripped hard on the padlock and pulled with all her might, managing to snap it open.

“All right! Let’s see what we have here…” Lyra cheered triumphantly, lifting off the cover of the box to reveal...

Ten Million Pokedollars.

Lyra swore she almost had a heart attack as her fingers went numb and the box dropped to the floor with the paper bills tumbling out.

Lyra was silent for a moment before she shook her head and recounted the money inside. No doubt about it, there was a total of ten FUCKING million pokedollars inside that tint little grey box. This was amazing! She could do whatever she wanted! She could buy a house in Goldenrod and live the rest of her days in lazy bliss and-!

Wait...no.

She didn't want to stop her Pokemon Journey just yet! She had practically just started. Lyra patted her still full belly, the Pokemon inside now reduced to unprocessed nutrients. She still remembers how good it felt to have them all squirm inside of her, the looks of terror on their faces as she swallowed them up. She couldn’t give that up, at least not yet.

Lyra decided to keep the money a secret, for now. The brat didn't need to know that hse was loaded now, he would only want to mooch off of her! And as a professional moocher, Lyra knows all about this. She stuffed as much money as she could in her pockets and a little between the fabric of her overalls and her breasts. However, at the bottom of the box when all the money was lifted from its possession, there lied something strange.

It was a rare candy, wrapped up in in’s signature blue plastic. It was a medicine for Pokemon whose trainers wanted a faster way of leveling them up. On humans, it had totally different effects. The company that makes them prints out warnings on every candy for humans not to consume them, ever since the first reported case came out, where a woman had transformed into a Magikarp.

Lyra curiously picked the small candy in between her fat fingers. Transformation was not the only thing rare candy did to humans. It seems that the change has something to do with the kind of person you were. For people like Lyra, meaning fat, rare candy could make people hungry like there was a black hole in their stomach. Other candies could make specific parts of their body explode with fat, while others still just made them more fat overall.

Before Lyra could seriously consider whether or not to eat the potentially dangerous candy, she found herself already gulping it down with wrapper off. She looked down at her hands with the wrapper sill in her fingers, proof that her instinct to eat had overrided her core thinking.

“Uh oh…”

Suddenly, though, she doubled over on the ground, an unbearable tingling sensation attacking every inch of her body!

Quickly, she started feeling her body strain against her clothing, as she feels her outfit become several sizes too small for her.
