She stared it for a moment, uncertain… before deciding ‘fuck it, why not?’ and answering the phone.

“Yes, Gent? Hello? Listen, I hate to bother you, but the egg you’ve requested is about to hatch!” A seemingly elderly man said on the other line. “If you want the togepi to imprint on you, you’re going to have to pick up the egg soon!”

“The togepi?” Lyra raised a brow.

“... uh, excuse me, who is this?” The man asked.

“Umm… I’m…” Lyra said, trying to come up with something, “his niece! I’m just taking care of things while he’s gone on business.”

“He’s gone? Ugh…” The man groans, seeming a little surprised. “Well, could you be a dear and pick up this togepi egg for him? I really don’t want it to imprint on me. Once it does, it never goes away…”

“Uh, Togepis don’t happen to be a rare Pokemon do they?” Lyra asks, trying to sound natural.

“Oh, yes, extremely rare! There’s not a single other togepi in Johto!” He says, and Lyra perks up.

“Alright, I’ll be right over!” Lyra smiles.

“Fantastic! I’m right in the big house on the end of Route 30! Can’t miss it!” The man said, before hanging up. Lyra considered her newly-acquired task. She didn’t know what a togepi was, but she knew she loved collecting rare Pokemon! She turned and slapped her expose ass cheek in the mirror, giggling as she watched it jiggle, before walking back into the living room, her Pokedollars hidden away in her purse.

Ethan was sitting in the living room, slowly nursing the unconscious buizel back to health, when looked up and gasped in shock when he laid eyes on Lyra! “Whoa! What happened to you?” He stuttered. In just a few minutes, she had gone from about the height of an average man to roughly the size of a Venusaur! “You’re… huge!”

Lyra didn’t have the energy to explain what had happened, so she just decides to insult him again. “What are you talking about? I’ve always been this big. Guess you’re not just a dumbass, but you’re blind, too,” she said, enjoying the hurt look on the boy’s face. Bullying Ethan was like comfort food to Lyra. She could do it all day. “Anyway, we got work to do! Some guy on Route 30 wants to give me a super rare Pokemon!”

“What? He does? Why?” Ethan asks, tilting his head.

“Just because I’m gorgeous, that’s why! Now shut up and pack your things. We’re never coming back around here,” Lyra says. She figures her time living in the old man’s house is about through. She didn’t know when he planned to be back from his business trip, but she knew she didn’t want to be around when he returned, having stolen millions of dollars from him and all. Besides, with all her money, she can rent a place to sleep anywhere in Johto!

Meanwhile, Ethan sighs miserably, being uprooted from his new home just as he was settling in. He started filling his bag with all his worldly possessions, while Lyra stuffed her’s full of the old man’s food and valuables. A couple hours later, and they were on the road again.

By now, the two Pokemon had regained consciousness, and Lyra had purchased a few potions to heal them up. Immediately upon waking up, the buizel seemed ready to attack Lyra, but Ethan whispered something to it about all the Pokemon Lyra’s eaten, and the buizel seemed horrified and submitted. Now, the poor little water-type clings to the boy’s shirt as he carries it down Route 30, following along behind the now unbelievably tall Lyra.

Seeing how many other their brethren Lyra was able to devour, most of the wild Pokemon stayed hidden from them as they walked down the route. However, when they were halfway there, they’re suddenly attacked by another trainer!
12222122233323.title: Lyra started to feel bloated

122221222333233.content:
Ethan frowned as he walked along the trail behind Lyra, the skinny child’s new water-type Pokemon in his arms. He was incredibly stubborn to ever admit it, but as abhorrent and repulsive his ‘kidnapper was, he was starting to...like her new body.

He didn't know what she did to blow up to this size so quickly, but whatever it was, it certainly inflated her curvy assets as well. Ethan blushed heavily as Lyra’s big booty shook and swayed from side to side with each heavy step she took, the skin tight clothes she had acquired only coming up halfway past her buttocks.

And it was not helping that Lyra had decided to take off her red and blue vest to cool off even though it wasn't very hot at all. Ethan gazed at her giant bra band, groaning in mute protest as it expanded across her vast, flabby back. Her pillowy back fat billowed all over the straining bra band, almost disappearing as they dug into her blubbery shoulders

Lyra could feel Ethan’s eye’s burn into ass. With an almost sultry smirks, she pretended to swat a fly and smacked her left cheek hard, making the poor boy confused on so many levels.

Soon, however, the relatively peaceful scene was interrupted one of the most annoying forces in the known universe: Youngster Joey.

Joey came running out of the bushes like a zubat out of the distortion world. With an ear-piercing squeal he flew into the air and landed right in front of Lyra’s path, making her stop suddenly and Ethan almost walking into her backside. Buizel blinked as the last thing he saws before he lost consciousness right in front of him.

“When two trainers make eye contact, they must have a battle! Go Rattata!” The irritating child shouted as he tossed his Pokeball to the ground, which split open to reveal a purple mouse Pokemon. It looked up at Lyra and nervously gulped as she eyed at it hungrily.

“...what the fuck?” Lyra finally mouthed in response to the situation that unfurled before her. “Like, seriously, what the actual fuck? Were you just waiting in the fucking bushes for someone to walk by?”

“Yes!” The hyperactive youngster replied enthusiastically. “Rattata, use Tail Whip!” The rattata looked back at it’s master with a look of pain, before sighing and turning its body around to pitifully shake it’s rump at the giant human. Lyra actually looked stunned for a moment, before a sadistic smile formed on her face.

“Your rat is lucky that it’s so small, otherwise it would be a light snack.”Lyra as she brutally kicked the small Pokemon at her feet back to it’s master. Joey looked genuinely surprised at the outcome of this riveting battle. How could he be defeated? His Rattata was in the top percentage!

“Now, YOU on the other hand…” Joey soon looked up to find that the imposing women was licking her lips hungrily. “You look much more filling~”


“Gah! It may look like I’m running away now, but I swear, I’ll meet you again, and I WILL win!” Joey than picked up his bruised pokemon off from the ground and sprinted away at inhuman speed. Lyra, Ethan, and the Pokemon looked at the dust trail that the youngster left behind, confused and a bit miffed.

“Ya know, that idiot reminds me of you, twerp!”




Soon, the two humans and Pokemon made it to the house that the elderly gentlemen on the phone said to come to, not that there was that many houses on Route 30 to begin with. There was a large, wooden engraving above the door spelling out “MR. POKEMON”.

“What kind of stupid name is that?” Lyra asked to no one in particular, having put back on her blue and red vest. Ethan shrugged and walked up to knock on the door.

“Hey! What do you think your doing?” Lyra tugged at the back of Ethan’s shirt and pulled him back. “This geezer has an incredibly rare Pokemon that imprints on the first one it sees, and it’s gonna be me!”

Suddenly, the door opened to reveal the elderly Mr. Pokemon, dressed in a fancy suit with pinstripe pants, a red bow tie, and a fedora. He was about to greet the two visitors at his doorstep with a friendly hello and an invitation for a cup of tea inside, but his mouth was left agape as he stared at the massive teenager in front of him.

Lyra rolled her eyes at the old man’s reaction. Were all old men horny pervs? She snapped her fingers impatiently in front of Mr. Pokemon’s face “Hey buster, my eyes are up here.”

Mr. Pokemon was taken back by the voluptuous girls snapping of the fingers, but his face softened with a warm smile. “I’m terribly sorry young lady. You must be the girl I spoke with on the phone. I apologize, it’s just that you bear striking resemblance to a women I used to know.”

“Uhh...okay?” Lyra said, genuinely creeped out by how she was once again referenced to an old man’s love interest. “Are you talking about the old man’s - I mean, my...aunt?” Lyra corrected herself, just now remembering the lie she told this guy on the phone.

“Hmm? Oh yes! She had a lot of impact on all of our lives, really!” Mr. Pokemon said wistfully, mostly remembering some bygone days of his youth. “You look so much like her. What with the hair and the...uh...well that doesn't matter!” He stopped himself before he started talking about Lyra’s assets.

“Yeah, what does matter is that super rare Pokemon you were talking about, right?” Lyra was eagerly waiting for the old man to get on with his conversation and just give her the damn Pokemon already.

“Oh yes, I almost forgot! I’ve got it right here.” The old man chuckled. He dipped away from the doorway back into his house, only to reappear seconds later with the mysterious egg in his hands.

“Now, tell you uncle that the Togepi is still in its egg, and it's gonna take some time for it…” Mr. Pokemon started, but stopped in the middle of his sentence as he felt something twitch in the egg. He looked down to be greeted with the sight of a rather large crack on the multi colored shell, with stubby arms pushing away at the pieces.

“It’s hatching?!” Lyra almost shouted. “Gimme!” She gripped the egg and forced it away from the old researcher’s hands. Soon enough, the top half of the shell popped off to reveal small, light yellow Pokémon with a round body and horned head that is still encased in its eggshell. She expected the rest of the shell to come off, yet it didn't. Stubby hands and feet, however, popped out from the casing.

The Togepi’s eyes opened and looked at the face of...
122221222333233.title: Easy To Wear Shorts

1222212223332331.content:
Ethan seemed excited as the egg cracked, and the Pokemon within revealed itself. He seemed to know what a Togepi was, because of course he would, the little nerd. Lyra was a little confused. Was this little thing so stupid, it couldn’t figure out how to get its egg off? So far, she didn’t have very high hopes for this thing…

The togepi glanced around for a while, dazed by its entrance into the world, but coincidentally happened to lock eyes with Lyra. Immediately, it let out a gleeful chirp, and waddled pathetically over to hug Lyra by the ankle. With a look of distaste, Lyra grabbed the little Pokemon and held it in the air, inspecting it while it smiled and giggling.

She was eager to see what the rest of it looked like, but the togepi let out a distressed squeal when she tried pulling the rest of the egg off of it. “No! Don’t try to pull it off!” Ethan immediately stepped forward, insisting. “The egg is part of the Pokemon!”

Recognition dawned on Lyra’s face as the realization struck her. “Are you saying that this is supposed to be… some sort of eggshell Pokemon?” She said, looking severely unimpressed. “That’s… the stupidest fuckin’ thing I’ve ever heard.” The togepi let out a confused murmur as Lyra tried handing it over to the boy. “Umm… here, you can have this one, kid.”

“I can’t take it! It already imprinted on you!” Ethan insists, pushing it back to her. “It thinks you’re, like, its mother!”

“Yeah, well, I’m not going to take care of this stupid thing for its whole life!” Lyra complains. With a sigh, she holds the togepi up again, analyzing it.

“C’mon, Lyra, just give it a chance!” Ethan begged. He had seen enough Pokemon die at Lyra’s hands, but this togepi was especially rare, and losing it would be especially tragic.

Lyra rolled her eyes. “Ugh! Whatever. Fine,” she says, glaring at the togepi. “Hey, your name’s Omelet, alright? Now, don’t make too much trouble.” With that, she shoved him down into her cleavage along with Snack, its chirps and complaints muffled by titflesh. Now that she was this big, it was very easy to fit both of them in there.

Thus began their long journey up to Violet City. Having to walk up a hill was strenuous enough, but to make matters worse, a horde of dumbass kids challenged her to battles as she walked by. Each of them cried and ran away when Lyra punted their Pokemon across the route like a football, or even just threatened them. It was fun to be so much taller than everybody… but it only made Lyra wonder just how big she can get!

Route 31 was comparatively much more peaceful, and Lyra thought she could just relax and enjoy the scenery… at least until she was ambushed by some bug catcher kid! “I caught a bunch of Pokemon! Let me battle with-” He suddenly popped out of the bushes beside her, and almost by instinct, Lyra rears back and punches him in the face! He’s sent flying backwards a few feet, and when he lands, he has a bloody nose and he’s unconscious.

Ethan gasps. “Jeez, Lyra!”

Lyra, on the other hand, just laughs like crazy, looking at her fist which now had a bit of blood on it. “Damn! Guess I don’t know my own strength,” she cackles. At 6 foot 6, she was already significantly stronger than she once was. It only made her wonder how strong she was going to be at 7 feet… or 8 feet… or 10… or 20!

Finally, once all that was through, they finally arrived in Violet City! It was exactly was Lyra had imagined it! Beautiful traditional homes, the gorgeous Sprout Tower swaying in the background, a sea of purples of every hue and shade… and, of course, the Violet City gym! Her eyes lit up when saw it. She would be dominating that gym in no time!

The city’s inhabitants were a little weird, though. They kept offering to trade random things. Some guy even offered to trade an onix for a bellsprout, which Lyra was certain was bullshit. That guy just wanted to steal somebody’s bellsprout. Lyra flashed him a dirty look as she continued on, looking for a place to settle in.

Lyra wandered the town, asking around for anyone who knew a nice place to stay, but all the morons in this city seemed completely clueless. Soon, the two of them were growing frustrated as they aimlessly walked around the city. “Ugh… my legs hurt so freaking bad…” Ethan sighs, only for Lyra to suddenly stop in her tracks.

“Wait… did you just ‘freaking’?” She turns to him, wide-eyed. “Oh, hell no.”

“W-what?” Suddenly, Lyra wrapped her big, pudgy arms around him, and pressed him painfully tight against her sweaty, pudgy body! He immediately started wriggling in her grip, blushing as he was lifted into the air and wrapped in a huge bear hug. “Let go of me!”

“Ethan, say ‘fuck’,” Lyra demanded.

“No!”

“I’m not letting you go until you say ‘fuck’,” she frowned, squeezing him so hard he could hardly breath.

Ethan let's out a little pained gasp. “M-mom says I’m not supposed to!”

“Yeah, well, she’s not here right now,” she rolls her eyes. “C’mon. You know you’ve always wanted to.” Lyra’s grip on him is insane! Slowly, the boy realizes there’s no chance he’s getting out of this one unless she does what she says. Besides, he’s a little embarrassed being hugged up against her so tightly.

“... fuck…”

It was barely a whisper.

Lyra tilted her head, a smirk on her face. “What was that? I can’t hear you!”

Ethan looked up into her smug face, and suddenly remembered all the times over the years she made him miserable. How she thought herself fit to swallow his best friend and steal him away from his home. In that moment, Ethan was overcome with rage! “... f-fuck you!” He yelled at the top of his lungs, so loudly that bystanders stared. “Fuck you, fuck you, fuck you!”

He expected her to be upset… but instead, she only smiled! “Haha! Nice!” She laughed, a big, warm smile on her face as she set him down on the ground. “See? I told you you could do it! Didn’t that feel great?” He left him there, blushing and embarrassed, as she started walking through town again. “Now, I don’t want to hear any of that ‘freaking’ bullshit anymore, got it? Say what you mean!”

Ethan followed after her, staring at the ground, ashamed that she was able to so easily goad him into using such obscene language. What would his mother think?

With that settled, it was time for them to finally find a place to stay during their visit to Violet City...
1222212223332331.title: Lyra

choices: Take In The Sights Of Violet
12222122233323313.content:
Sprout Tower was a large pagoda located in the northern half of Violet City. The tower itself was more than one hundred feet tall, and is held together by a giant, flexible pillar that sways from side to side, never falling over This flexibility of the central pillar protects the tall tower from earthquakes, which happen frequently in Johto. It was inhabited by isolationist monks who study diligently and teach visitors that all living beings, Human, Pokemon, or otherwise, can coexist through cooperation.

To Lyra, however, she was far more interested in the sign out front of the tower that read ‘Free Lodgings!’, than the spiritual beliefs of those who inhabited it. After an hour of wandering around the city, the two humans had finally found a place to stay at. It was far away from most of the town, but it was either Sprout Tower or roughing it outside.

Lyra walked up to the front door of the, what she saw as, rotting, wooden tower that should have been bulldozed a long time ago to make way for a parking lot. She pounded on the heavy door, tired from the walk around Violet and impatient to relax for a spell. A young, bald man dressed in blue and black robes came to answer the door


“Hello young lady, little boy.” The man bowed in respect, not deterred at all by the size and width of Lyra’s body. “Are you here to stay for the night?”

Lyra snorted. “Uh, duh! Why else would we come to such crappy building in the middle of nowhere?”

The balding man did not grimace in the slightest. “Very well. If you wish to stay at our monastery, however, you should know that we only allow those who have a strong bond with their Pokemon.”

Lyra grunted. She should have seen this coming. A bunch of hippie dip-shits who praise Arceus and live with Pokemon? Of course they would come up with something so stupid. Luckily, she had the perfect way to prove that Snack and Omelet were head over heels for her.

“You want a strong bond? Well, look!” Lyra spread her massive mammaries open and fished out her two Pokemon: Snack, who had by now gotten used to his fleshy home, and Omelette, who was still disoriented from the experience. “My Pokemon love me so much, I don’t even need a Pokeball for ‘em! They insist of spending every waking moment with me!”

The robed sage looked Lyra’s Pokemon over, before nodding, convinced. “And what of your Pokemon, small child?” He addressed Ethan “Does it care for you the same way you care for it?”

Ethan looked down at the small buizel in his arms, who in turn was looking back up at him. The two had only really known each other for a day, which wasn't a lot of time to bond. Ethan had nursed the Sinnoh Pokemon back to health after Lyra did Arceus knows what to it, and the Buizel didn’t see why he shouldn't like the small child. Besides, it was either him, or being handed off to the bigger human who had tricked him into getting squashed and stuffed in her ass. The water-type Pokemon smiled and cried happily to the Sprout Tower Sage.

“Very well. The two of you are free to stay in any room you please upstairs. However, please stay off away from the highest floor. That is where our Bellsprout live, as well as the other Pokemon who have made this tower home. If you disturb the Pokemon, you will be removed immediately.”

The balding man turned back inside the Tower, leaving Lyra and Ethan alone to follow inside. Lyra smirked and unapologetically shoved her Pokemon back in between her two breasts, while Ethan gulped nervously. The sage just had to mention the fact that they're was a plethora of Pokemon on the top floor, waiting for Lyra to gobble up. He could only hope that her want for a place to sleep would counter her want to eat.

The two of them stepped inside the unofficial foyer area of the place. It was completely wooden, form the walls, to the floor, to the lattice ceiling that separated the floors, even the main support beam was wooden. Lyra shifted her boobs a little nervously. She had just remembered that Snack was a fire Pokemon, which meant that one spark form the idiot could set the whole place ablaze, and than were will she sleep?


The only way to move from floor to floor was a series of ladders, much to Lyra’s irritation. As she grabbed on, Ethan bit his lip, not sure if the old wood was strong enough to support her weight. Fortunately, the ladder did not break, but it did mean that it was time for him to follow. He blushed as he found himself directly positioned underneath Lyra’s sweaty, pillowy Ass as she climbed ahead.

Buizel, who Ethan was carrying in his arms still, watched the two spheres of shiny blubber quiver and jiggle just under foot away from him. Being squashed underneath all that ass was not pleasant...but it wasn't unpleasant either. Before her weight could catch up with the small Pokemon’s body, for a brief second, buizel was smothered in the cuddly softness of Lyra’s butt each time she sat down on him before. And when she put him inside of her crack, the blubber around lulled his battered body to sleep and…

Buizel beat red and turned his head into Ethan’s chest. What the hell was he thinking?! Did he think that he would actually want to get sat on by that abhorrent human again? No! It was crazy, stupid, and-

“Aw, ya gotta be fuckin’ kidding me!” Lyra stopped climbing as her wide hips got stuck in the narrow opening in the ceiling that she was supposed to go through. She pointed at two passing sages. “Hey!” She yelled angrily. “Get over here and help me out of this thing!”

Ethan, who wasn't paying attention, kept climbing up until Lyra’s plush, massive ass brushed up against his head. Confused, he took another step and looked up, only for his whole head to be lodged in between her butt cheeks, making him freak out and struggle. Buizel was suddenly smashed up against Lyra’s skin tight clothed ass, which he couldn’t help but lean into with a shameful smile.

“H-hey! What do ya t-think your doing, brat!?” Lyra yelled, surprised. “Get out of my ass right now or...or...mhmph.” She mumbled as Ethan’s surprised jerking scratched an itch that was bothering her for a few hours.

“O-on second thought...why don’t you just stay there? It’s not like we're gonna move anytime soon…”




After a half hour of pulling, the sages on the second floor finally got Lyra’s body stuck, freeing up the ladder again. She and Ethan finally got to their rooms, the closest one that wasn't occupied by someone else. Lyra, who was exhausted by the whole ordeal, decided to dig in to the food she had smuggled form the old man’s house in Cherrygrove, while Ethan just lied down on the one bed in the room and curled up into a ball, trying to forget what just happened to him.

After Lyra was done eating her quote on quote snack, she got out her other snack and Omelette from the valley of her cleavage and tossed them onto the bed with Ethan. The two Pokemon shook their head and tried to start up a conversation amongst themselves, which soon included Buizel as he joined in.

Lyra looked at the trio of Pokemon chattering away and chuckled. Look at them! They think they're real people, talking to each other in that silly language that no one understands. What was even funnier was how some people claimed that the bond between their Pokemon was so strong that they could understand each other. Phht, fat chance.

Lyra got up and stretched her puffy arms above her head. She had some time before the local Gym would be open for battle, so she could do whatever she wanted at the moment. Climbing up those stairs and ladder had let her rather tired, so she could just take a nap and join Ethan and the Pokemon on the bed. It was a bit small, but she could make due.

Than again, she was till a bit hungry. The sage from before told her about all the Pokemon that lived on the next floor. But he also said that if anything happened to them, they would be kicked out. Not a problem if she was sneaky, but at her size...eh…

Lyra also pondered leaving Sprout Tower to check out more of the town. Her legs were still fucking sore, but it could prove valuable later on if she got a lay of the land. Maybe she should even clear out a restaurant with all the money she had in her purse.

So many choices, so little time...
12222122233323313.title: Sprout Tower?

122221222333233133.content:
Well… the day’s still young! No point wasting it in this boring, stuffy old tower. The bellsprouts upstairs sounded like an opportunity for some mischief, but she didn’t want to get kicked out of her only shelter, and besides, she preferred Pokemon with some meat on their bones.

Speaking of which, she was hungry. She hadn’t stuffed herself silly yet since she grew to her new size, and she was eager to see just how much her belly could stretch now. Maybe she could gulp up some random Pokemon off the nearby routes… but, eh, she’d rather try the local cuisine. Sure, squirming, lively meals were nice, but she hadn’t yet soured on traditional food, either.

She let Ethan sit around the tower, to bond with the Buizel or whatever. These monks were annoying bleeding hearts just like Ethan was, so she was certain they’d get along fine. Meanwhile, she decided to stuff Snack back between her tits and head out, asking around town for the best restaurant Violet City had the offer, and she usually got the same reply; the Ivy Basil. People tried to convince her that it was rather expensive, but Lyra smugly convinced them that money is no object.

When she finally made it there, she realized the restaurant wasn’t… quite her scene. It was full of those sorts of pretentious fucks that admired food for its ‘flavor’ and ‘texture or whatever, rather than just the full feeling you get when you stuff yourself full of it. Idiots! Food is food, though, so Lyra still took a step inside…

The moment she stepped in, she was the center of attention, and she loved it. At 6’6”, she was now taller than basically everyone else in Violet City, and this combined with her sheer weight made her a sight to behold for the shelter cityfolk. She smirked smugly at the gawkers as she took a seat at a booth, her seat creaking beneath her weight.

She attracted further attention when she loudly ordered one of everything the restaurant had to offer. The waitress seemed stun, but reluctantly agreed to her order when she proved she had the means to pay for it. Soon, a small army of waiter and waitresses was wheeling out an entire buffet for Lyra. It was a dinner fit for thirty people… and Lyra was going to devour it all in minutes!

The other diners watched in awe and disgust as she started loudly chewing, slurping, and swallowing down her food, stuffing her mouth full like a starving pig. She wasn’t used to eating out, so her table manners… left a lot to be desired. Still, it wasn’t like she cared. Let those scrawny bastards stare at her all they like. While she swallowed down an entire Watmel Berry, Lyra idly fantasized about what she was going to do when she got even bigger. For example, what if she someday got big enough to swallow people whole?

She’d definitely start with that nurse joy bitch in New Bark… but who next? Once she was that big, anyone was on the menu. Would she eat Ethan, for example? Ehh, maybe if he got really annoying. But overall, somehow, Lyra was starting to feel a strange sentimentality towards her companion. He was a useless little shit, for sure, but he was her little shit. Figuratively speaking, of course.

Eventually, Lyra stepped out of the restaurant, every single kind of dish you could imagine stewing in her gut. The buffet made visible bulges in her belly, which was nice, but she wasn’t quite stuffed yet. After all, it was always a good idea to leave a little bit of room for more, just in case she runs into anything tasty…

She collapsed on a nearby bench, letting out a little moan as she leaned back and rubbed her hands over her big, round gut, which poked out from beneath her new vest. The restaurant was a little dull, but the food had definitely not been disappointing! Now that that was all digesting, it was time to take a good look around town, and see what else Violet City had to offer.

Lyra wanders for a while, doing a bit of sightseeing, before finally coming across the Violet City gym. The moment she saw it, Lyra had stars in her eyes. Even to a girl as cynical and unambitious and Lyra, the grandeur of the Pokemon gyms was tantalizing. She knew she had to conquer it before she left the city!

In fact… on second thought, it couldn’t hurt to step in an take a look around, right? Get a feel for what she was dealing with. In reality, she was almost giddy as she stepped into the gym, expecting to find an epic stadium spread out before a cheering crowd! Instead, though, the gym was… absolutely empty? “What the hell?”

She wanders around the gym for a while, confused. Was it closed today? She couldn’t think of any reason that would be the case. Just as she’s about to give up and leave, she steps on a wooden platform in the center of the gym… and it suddenly propels her up into the air at a terrifying speed! “Oh, shit! Oh shit oh shit oh shit!”

She immediately drops down on all fours and hugs the platform for dear life, adrenaline rushing through her veins. Eventually, the platform rises to meet some scaffolding raised multiple stories in the air! Falkner and a couple bird keepers were standing on the various corners of the scaffolding, staring at Lyra curiously as she freaked out.

What the hell kind of an idea for a gym was this? Don’t they know some people are afraid of heights!? “What the fuck!? Get me down! Down, down, down!” She yelled loudly, her voice echoing off the stone walls.

“J-just press down the button again!” One of the bird keepers called. Lyra’s confused for a moment, until she realizes the circle shape carved into the center of the platform she was on was actually a giant button. Whimpering and shivering, she pressed down on the button with her belly, only to yelp as the platform rapidly lowered itself to the ground.

Soon, she was stumbling out of the gym, dazed and exhausted, her heart still pumping out of her chest. Damn it! It makes sense that they’d be so high up, considering it was a flying type gym… but Lyra was afraid of heights! How the hell was she supposed to get her badge now? She stood there for a while, fuming with anger, thinking she was totally fucked.

Unless… what if she sends Ethan in to fight the battle for her? All she had to do was give him Snack and tell him her strategy, and then once he wins, she can just steal the gym badge from him. A confident grin dawned on her face as she considered her master plan! Of course, there was one problem; Ethan was a dumbass, and would probably screw up any strategy she told him to attempt.

Then again… if she overleveled Snack enough beforehand, it would be impossible for even a moron like Ethan to lose, right? The cyndaquil was already quite high-level for the area, able to knock out the Pokemon on the nearby routes with a single move. Just another day or two of grinding, and the Zephyr badge would be her’s!

The most obvious solution would be to train him against wild Pokemon on Route 32. They were all quite low-level compared to Snack, so it would take a while, but at least it would provide Lyra with some more tasty treats. On the other hand, she could also get him some tutoring at the local Pokemon School. It seemed to be mostly attended by kids, though, so she might be out of place there.

Where shall she train?
122221222333233133.title: Take In The Sights Of Violet

1222212223332331332.content:
“Before you start learning more about Pokemon as a student, it is important that you get to know the kinds of Pokemon you already have...don’t you think so?” said the Pokemon School Teacher with a smile.

“Uhhh...yeah! Yeah, totally! I...I love Pokemon with all my heart!” Lyra lied through her teeth to the friendly adult in front of her. It was like a dream come true for the gluttonous eighteen year old. Right now, Lyra and Snack were inside the Violet City Pokemon Academy, a rather small, drab building in the middle of town that only had one room.

Lyra had thought that it might have a mistake to come here instead of fighting other Pokemon, and she stood out like a sore thumb when she realized that she was the only other person over ten years old besides the teacher. But thankfully, the teacher happened to be another old geezer like the ones in Cherrygrove and Route 30, meaning that he was a complete perv. His name was Earl Dervish, which Lyra thought sounded incredibly stupid, but she pushed it aside.

The elderly teacher was so enamored Lyra’s curvy assets that he basically agreed with every comment she let slide. The children of Violet City were now going to be taught that Pokemon are incredibly delicious and good for you, that stuffing your Pokemon in your breasts and ass was a great way to befriend them, and good little boys and girls should listen to whatever older and bigger people say.

Honestly, Lyra felt like she had done a good deed.

Mr. Dervish smiled warmly at the teen aged trainer in his class. Lyra was sitting in a desk obviously made for people much smaller than her, but she didn't seem to mind her gut spilling over the top and her lap burgeoning into the seat next to her occupied by a kid, who was much too afraid to speak up to tell her this.

“Very good, Lyra. Which is why I am going to tell you more about your Cyndaquil, Now class, pay attention.” Mr. Dervish addressed the class as he brought down a the projector screen in front of the room. With a push of a button, the lights went dim and the projector at the top of the ceiling sprung to life.

A picture of a Cyndaquil came onto the screen. It showed various things, like it’s circulatory and respiratory system, and the glands that made the fire come out from it’s back. “Many of you have Cyndaquil’s in your care, given to you by our esteemed Professor Elm”. Mr. Dervish taught.

“Total pushover and whiny little bitch, am I right?” Lyra asked slightly above a whisper to the uncomfortable boy sitting next to her. The kid didn't respond, but he did shift more in his seat as more of Lyra’s thigh flab spilled into his lap.

Mr. Dervish continued, “Cyndaquils are usually timid by nature and often curl into balls when intimidated. They are capable of sprouting flames from their back, which they mainly use to defend themselves. They get bigger and hotter the more angry the Cyndaquil becomes.”

“Arceus, get on with it ya old fart…” Lyra mumbled as she rolled her eyes. True, she learned a few things about Snack that she hadn't known before, but she didn’t come to school to learn about him, she came to level him up!

“Oh! I apologize Ms. Lyra, you have to forgive an old man rambling about nonsense.” Mr. Dervish said, completely under the portly women’s thumb. “If you may please take out your Pokedex, young lady?”

“Uhhh...sure…” Lyra obliged, not understanding what he was going with this. She opened her Pokedex, constantly going to the Cyndaquil’s info page, which was the last thing she was looking at before she shut it off.

“As you can see, your Cyndaquil, or ‘Snack’ as you call him, is at Level 12. You should all take a page from Lyra’s book, class. Her Pokemon is already at Level 12, and she only started her journey yesterday!”

“Whoa, really!?” The little kid next to Lyra suddenly peaked up, impressed at how she had leveled up her Pokemon so fast. “How did you do that? You gotta tell us how you did that! Please?” He asked giving her his best begging face.

Lyra was about to punch the obnoxious snot in the face, but Mr. Dervish intervened right before she could. “Actually Lyra, it is fascinating how you were able to get you Pokemon so close to evolution in just a day! We would all appreciate it if you could share your secret with us.”

“Uhhh…” Lyra deadpanned, suddenly being put on spot. Honestly, the reason why Snack got to such a high level was become she basically worked the little thing like the slave it was, fighting until fatigue and than kept going. She was going to have to come up with a lie, fast.

“I uh...I used Rare Candies.” Lyra finally responded, remembering the time earlier today she ate one that caused her figure to balloon to such ludicrous proportions.

“Ah, yes! A classic technique, very good Lyra!” Mr. Dervish approved. In point of fact, using Rare Candies was considered a cheap trick to level up Pokemon, but his sexual libido was overwhelming his cognitive morality. “You hear that class, this is why Lyra’s ‘Snack’ is so close to evolving into a Quilava.”

“Y-yeah, that’s right!” Lyra raised her puffy arm into the air for a cocky cheer. “Wait...Quilava?”

“That’s right, a Quilava!” Mr. Dervish nodded and pressed the button on the wall again, changing the image on the projector screen from the familiar Cyndaquil to one that kinda the same, but overall a lot different. It was a slim quadruped Pokémon with the top half of its body blue, and the lower half cream. It’s ears were triangular with red insides, and possessed a rounded nose and red eyes.

“Your ‘Snack’ is at Level 12, which means it is only two levels away from evolving into the Pokemon you see here.” Mr. Dervish taught.

“Holy shit!” Lyra swore, making the other kids in the classroom blush and cover their ears. “Look at that Snack, that’s gonna be you soon!” She finished her Pokemon out from her fat boobs and pointed a soft finger at the projector screen.

“That’s right, Lyra. Now…” the elderly teacher pressed the button on the wall one final time, and the lights came back on in full force as the projector died off. “...since you have came all this way to help a humble class like us, I think it’s only fair that we give you a little gift to help your Pokemon evolve sooner before you go.”

Suddenly, Lyra felt like a woman reborn. She had came into this pathetic little schoolhouse with low expectations, but not only was she showered with praise and adoration from the teacher, she was getting a free gift to make Snack level up even sooner than he would have if she had grinded on Route 32. It was like a grate weight was lifted from her shoulders, and placed on her boobs, butt, thighs, belly...you get the picture.

Lyra gasped in delight as the old man brought out his gift from the desk drawer, and was revealed to be...
1222212223332331332.title: Pokemon School

12222122233323313323.content:
Lyra’s eyes lit up when the old man pulled open his desk drawer. It was filled with all the latest equipment, enough to make anyone a successful trainer! She was primarily attracted to a glowing, metallic little helmet thing that looked extremely high-tech. She was expecting him to give her that, but instead, he reached even deeper into the drawer! He must be planning on giving her something ever BETTER!

She was practically jumping with excitement when he finally pulled something out of the drawer… only for him to hand her a measly little egg. Not even a Pokemon egg, just a regular egg you’d see at a supermarket. She holds it in her hands, analyzing it for any unique features, but finding nothing. “Umm, just what is this supposed to be?”

“It’s a Lucky Egg! Blessed with good fortune!” The old man said, cheerfully. “It is said that any Pokemon that possesses this egg will find their training to be swift and free of obstructions!” He was talking like everything he just said wasn’t completely nonsense.

Realizing he was serious, Lyra was almost outraged. He was obviously lying to her just to try and convince her to go away. Just how stupid did this old asshole think she was? She restrained herself from getting too angry, however, deciding to try diplomacy first. “... are you trying to bullshit me? This is literally just an egg,” she said, speaking a little louder, the anger evident in her tone.

With her second cuss, the class reacted with even greater shock and horror, many kids covering their ears. Meanwhile, the old man looked nervous. He was starting to realize Lyra was an irredeemable annoyance, and while he was attracted to her, if she kept being obscene, some of his students were bound to complain to their parents. He had to do something.“L-Lyra, please. This classroom is a bad language-free zone...”

“Ugh, whatever,” she rolled her eyes. “What about that machine thing in there? The thing that glowed and beeped a lot? Give me that instead!”

“Lyra, that EXP Share is an extremely valuable prototype! There is only one of its kind in Johto!” He reacts, surprised she would even ask for it. “The Lucky Egg will provide plenty valuable all on its own, if you just give it a chance.”

Apparently, this was supposed to dissuade her, but instead, it only made it more tantalizing. Lyra always had a penchant for rare things, and so far, she’s been collecting the rarest Pokemon in Johto. What’s stopping her from collecting the rarest items, too? With that thought, she suddenly stood up. “... can I speak with you in another room?”

Before the old man could even react, Lyra grabbed him by the arm and dragged him out of the room with incredible strength, taking him somewhere private. Once they were out of sight of his students, Lyra immediately pinned him roughly against the wall. He thought she was attacking him, so he was about to call for help… but he’s interrupted when she leans forward and plants a big kiss right on his lips!

He gasped, shocked by what the young woman had just done. She had a sultry smirk on her face, now, her entire demeanor having seemingly suddenly changed. “Mm… sorry, I just couldn’t help myself any longer! You’re just so handsome…” He was about to say something, but she presses a finger to his lips. “Shhh. Close your eyes. I have a surprise for you…”

Mr. Dervish’s heart was beating out of his chest! This was like something straight out of one of his fantasies! He immediately obediently closed his eyes, expecting her to start undressing or something. Instead, however, she turned around, leaned forward… and leaped backward, slamming her huge butt right against his head with incredible force!

Her humongous booty hit him like a wrecking ball, and he immediately fell to the ground, knocked out by the force of the blow. Lyra let out an amused cackle as she stood over his unconscious form. Apparently, her booty was powerful enough to knock people out with a single blow! She only wondered how dangerous her backside would become once she became even larger…

She walked back into the classroom without a smug smirk on her face. The kids all stared at her expecting an explanation, but she just ignored them completely, and started searching through his desk drawer. The first thing she grabbed was, of course, the EXP Share. She didn’t quite know what it did, so she revolved to just try it on Snack the next time she trains him. It couldn’t hurt, right?

… well, on second thought, it was an untested, probably unstable prototype, so for all she knows it might just explode and blow Snack’s head off. … eh, that wouldn’t be that big a loss anyway, though.

She searched through the drawer some more, until she finds a stack of a few rare candies. These would make her absolutely huge if she ate them… but rare candies are kind of boring way to gain weight, now that she thinks about it. Maybe, if some scrawny chick pisses her off, she can force feed her the Rare Candies and ruin their precious figure? Maybe even turn her into a magikarp or something? She cackled at the thought, tucking the rare candies away in her bag for future mischief…

The kids were all staring at her while she searched through the drawer, cackling and mumbling to herself all the while. Eventually, one kid worked up the bravery to speak up. “Uhh, Miss Lyra?” They nervously ask, raising their hand. Where’s Mr. Dervish?”

She seemed a bit surprised as she looked up at them, as if she’d completely forgotten about the class. “Umm… he had to take a nap,” she shrugged, quickly coming up with a lie. “He’s really old, you know. Doesn’t have the energy he used to. Probably even gonna have a heart attack one of these days.”

Much of the class immediately cries out in distress, the students obviously being very saddened by the thought of their beloved teacher dying. Lyra rolled her eyes. “Hey, I’m just telling the truth! Jeez, you kids need to toughen up…” She said. Suddenly, though, she got an idea. With a smirk, she sat down on the teacher’s chair, which creaked beneath her immense weight. “In fact, that’s what Mr. Dervish sent me in for! You kids want to be trainers, right? Well, news flash; weaklings aren’t allowed to be trainers!”

The students all seemed distressed by this. “H-how do we know who’s a weakling and who's not?” One asked.

“First of all, you can tell how strong someone is by how fat they are. If someone’s BIGGER and FATTER than you, then that means they are objectively BETTER than you in every way! And you should do whatever they say!” She laughed, kicking her feet up. She has to teach these scrawny little brats who the real trainers are, after all. “Otherwise, they’ll eat ya!”

Their horror only intensified at this threat. Most of them hadn’t known such a thing was even possible. “E-eat us!?” One cries.

“Mhmm! Hell, I ate ten weakling trainers just for breakfast this morning!” She proudly lies, kicking her feet up on the table while proudly patting her big, round belly, which peeked out from beneath her vest. At that, she received a few ‘ooos’ and ‘aaas’ in either terror or intrigue as all the students stared at her shiny round gut. It was a terrible lie, but these gullible brats fell for it!

Lyra spent the next hour tainting these student’s minds with her twisted, narcissistic worldview. All these dumb kids had been convinced that the world was all sunshine and roses, so they were both horrified and fascinated by Lyra’s ‘teachings’. Eventually, though, the bell rang, and Lyra realized she had completely lost track of time. She had to get out of here before that old man woke up!

“Alright, class over! Don’t tell the cops I was here, or I’ll sit on your entire families! Now, scram!” She immediately shouted, ushering the confused, disoriented students rapidly out of the room. With that, she smirks proudly as she picks up all the gear she’s stolen, and starts walking towards the door. The lucky egg was completely useless probably, but with the EXP share, Snack will surely be incredibly powerful in no time!

Just as she stepped outside of the schoolhouse, though, someone poked her in the side. She turned to see...
12222122233323313323.title: ...A Lucky Egg!

choices: Head back to Sprout Tower to rest
122221222333233133233.content:
“Brat?” Lyra looked down at the small boy in front of her. He was carrying Omelette and Buizel in his arms. “What the hell are you doing out of the tower?”

“W-well…” Ethan stuttered. “I was getting bored waiting for you to come back, so I decided to check out the town a little bit. And I heard this town had a Trainer School so I brought my Pokemon-”

“Whoa, whoa, whoa there ya little asswipe!” Lyra interrupted Ethan’s explanation, stepping closer to the young child to make herself more intimidating. “You mean...MY Pokemon, right?”

“Uh, y-yah Lyra! Your Poke-...your Togepi.” Ethan corrected himself mid sentence.

“Uh, no! You mean, my. Fucking. Pokemon.” Lyra bumped her belly against Ethan’s frame, making him and the two Pokemon tumbling to the ground. “That pathetic little orange fur ball you got was a gift. A gift ya dickslice. And I can ,and will, take it back if you keep mouthing off to me!”

“Okay, okay Lyra!” Ethan pleated, scared that Lyra was seriously gonna take Buizel away. “Your Pokemon, your Pokemon! I’m sorry! Look, I’ll go back to the tower, alright?”

“Hmph, not so fast twerp,” Suddenly, Lyra brought her foot down on Ethan’s stomach as he laid down on the ground. He grimaced as she grinded her fat foot against his torso. “You actually ran into me that the best time. Snack needs some training to go up against the gym leader, and you are going to challenge him for me!”

“What? What are you talking abo- AUGGH!” Ethan shouted in pain as Lyra put more of her enormous weight on the nine year old boy.

“Don’t question it! I’m too tired to explain shit to you. Here, take these.” Lyra fished out the Lucky Egg and EXP. Share from her purse and tossed them to the ground near Ethan.

“Take these things and Snack to Route 32 to train him. Don’t come back until he evolves into a super cool Quilava, got it?” Lyra commanded, while Ethan shook his head up and down quickly, wanting to get the pressure off from his belly.

“Sure Lyra, whatever you say!...oh, but, how will I carry all three of your Pokemon?” Ethan questioned nervously, careful to make sure that he said that they belonged to her. The two Pokemon looked at each other over Ethan’s pinned down body.

Lyra rolled her eyes, “Ugh, leave it to you to ruin a good plan, Ethan. Fine, you know what, I’ll trade you. I’ll give you Snack,” Lyra pulled the Cyndaquil out from her breasts and threw him to the ground with Ethan. “And I’ll take this!” Lyra bent down and grabbed the Sinnoh water type from his yellow ring and hoisted him up into the air.

“But-!” Ethan protested, relieved that Lyra had finally lifted her foot off of him

“No butts, mister!” Lyra mocked, hugging the poor Pokemon against her fat, naked stomach. “I think it’s high time me and him get better acquainted with each other. Now get going, before I consider re-gifting the little shit to my gut!”

Frightened beyond comprehension, Ethan scrambled to his feet, picked up the two dazed Pokemon and experience gaining items, and ran off as fast as he could towards Route 32.

“Hmph, pussy.” Lyra smirked evilly. She eyed the little Pokemon in her grip, who looked up at the fat, cruel human with fearful eyes. There was a certain satisfaction to seeing the little Pokemon look so afraid and scared to her.


You know, I really need to get you a real name. I mean, I can’t keep calling ‘Buizel’ or whatever.” Lyra put a fat finger to her double chin and pondered over the subject for a moment, before coming up with a answer.

“How about...treat?” Lyra offered. The Buizel looked stunned for a second. There was no way she was actually thinking of calling him that...right? Unfortunately, Lyra took the water-type’s silence as affirmation. “All right than, Treat it is!”

“Now, where to put you?” Lyra scratched her head. Normally, she would put most Pokemon in her possession into her boobies, but perhaps...wait a minute, back when she was stuck on the ladder at Sprout Tower, she felt something brush up against the side of her heavy butt cheeks, besides Ethan’s head. Could it have been…

“Treeeaaat~” Lyra brought the shivering Pokemon closer to her face. “Do you like my ass, you naughty little boy?” She teased, earning a heavy blush of shame from the Buizel, who tried to cover up his eyes to avert her gaze.

When Treat reopened his eyes, he was met with a very familiar sight: Lyra’s bare ass. She had lowered him to her massive behind and lowered her shorts, revealing itself in all its splendor and glory. It had grown since the last time Treat had seen it unclothed. What once was large bowling balls for cheeks, were now beach balls for cheeks.

The small Pokemon did not have time to ogle at Lyra’s ass for long, as Lyra forcefully plunged his body into her sweaty, pillowy crack. He gave a yelp of surprise as the pale blubber slowly smothered him from all sides, quivering and jiggling like jello before settling and trapped him. Treat couldn't help but use the limited mobility in his arms to run his cute little paws against the soft flab. As repulsive and evil the human was, her body just felt so goooood…

Lyra smirked as she felt Treat nuzzle and snuggle up with her glorious butt. Fucking perv. At least he knows how to appreciate a real women. She hoisted her shorts back up around her ass, and the small Pokemon was completely hidden away from the world, totally at the whims of a sadistic trainer.

Lyra began walking in no particular direction. She was thinking of ways to spend the rest of her day. It had gotten kinda late while she was teaching at the Pokemon School. It was evening, and the sun was beginning to set. She considered going back to Sprout Tower to get some shut eye, built her stomach made a slight grumble that distracted her thoughts.

Lyra’s massive lunch had mostly digested away at this point, which left her not exactly hungry, but not full either. If she wanted to get some more food, it would have to be Pokemon from Route 30 or 32. That pretentious high end restaurant was probably not gonna let her come back, and hadn’t eaten anything squirming in her teeth for a while now…

With the sun descending faster and faster in the horizon, Lyra had to make her decision fast.
122221222333233133233.title: Ethan?

choices: With her belly this big, she can't even stand!
1222212223332331332333.content:
She smiles to herself as she walks through town, glad she made the choice not to use Pokeballs. Sure, it was inconvenient in some ways, but nothing beats walking around and feeling your Pokemon squirm in the various nooks and crannies of her fat body. While Treat hated her, they had to admit, their surroundings were extremely soft, warm and comfortable.

As she walks, she fantasizes about the power she’s going to obtain again. From what she heard, the general rule is that in order to easily squish somebody or fit them down her throat, she’d have to be roughly twice their size. For example, she’ll be able to swallow someone Ethan’s size when she’s somewhere over 8 feet tall, and she’ll be able to swallow that Nurse Joy when she’s over 10 feet tall.

If she’s not going to cheat and use rare candies, though, she’s going to have to eat a lot to reach those kinds of heights with any expediency! That’s not a problem, though. Eating’s what Lyra does best! That thought fills her with determination, and starts walking faster and faster towards Route 32. She thinks she’s tasted everything the previous route had to offer, so this is the next best choice.

She was filled with excitement as she approaches the route! Unfortunately, as it turns out, Route 32 sucks. It’s too long, and all the meals on offer are the same. Damn. Rattatas. She’s gotten so sick of rattatas! When she started this adventure, it was largely because she thought she’d get to taste all sorts of Pokemon, not just the same boring rats.

Worse still, while on the outskirts of town, she was constantly accosted by the boy scouts that seemed to be camping in these woods. They didn’t even have any Pokemon worth eating. Lyra’s getting so, so tired of all these damn kids everywhere! Luckily, once she moves on to the more higher-level routes, there’ll be hardly any of them, so she just had to deal with these brats for just a while longer.

Eventually, she’s tempted to just cut her losses and head back to the tower with her belly unsatisfied. Something caught her attention, though. On the west, there seemed to be the entrance to the ‘Ruins of Alph’. She had no idea what the Ruins of Alph were, but it had to be more interesting than this snoozefest, so she hesitantly made her way through.

Indeed, the moment she stepped in, she was almost blown away by what she sees! Even though she can only see their silhouettes from here, the ruins are truly staggering in their scale; and according to the pamphlets, they are just the tip of the iceberg, with huge underground passageways built below. It was a wonder humans were able to build these things all those centuries ago! The thought of such sheer human determination ingenuity almost warmed Lyra’s cold, black heart. Almost.

She wandered around the ruins, filled with wonder. Apparently people were able to walk anywhere and interact with the ruins however they wanted, which seemed kind of stupid and irresponsible, but Lyra wasn’t complaining. She walks around, doing a bit of sightseeing, before finally finding an entrance to the ruins proper.

Her immense weight causes her to stomp loudly against the stones as she investigates the ruins, running her hands across the ancient concrete walls. She wondered what it must’ve been like to walk through these things in their prime, all those centuries ago. Eventually, she found a little plaque on the wall, and what seemed like some kind of… puzzle set?

She gazed at the plaque. This Pokemon hides on the seafloor and watches the shore with eyes on its back. Well, that doesn’t make any sense at all. The puzzle seemed straightforward, though. Laughably easy, actually, since every piece was already locked into place except four.

It literally took her only a few seconds to solve the puzzle. When she completed it, she laughed triumphantly! … only for the thing to start glowing. She stared at it, curiously… only for the ground to suddenly collapse beneath her, plunging her down into the subterranean labyrinth below. “Oh shiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii{ /size}iiiiiiiiiiiiiit...”

Her entire life flashes before her eyes as she’s convinced she’s doomed… only for her to land immediately. She had only fallen a single floor! Whatever damage that might’ve done was cushioned by her pillowy booty. She stood up, grumbling and dusting herself off, thinking the floor must’ve collapsed beneath her weight, when a man walks up to her. “You must’ve solved the stone-panel puzzle! Wonderful!” He smiles. “Not many others have figured it out yet! You must be truly talented!”

She stares at him, as if not certain whether or not he was serious. “... really?” She asked, exasperated. “That was the easiest puzzle ever. Arceus, I really am surrounded by morons, aren’t I?”

“M-morons?” He looks a little taken aback. As if to make up for what he had said, he holds out a little blue, electrnic tablet. “Look, miss, I was just going to offer you an unown report…”

She takes it in her tubby hands, inspecting it. “A what?”

“An unown report!” He repeats. “It keeps track of all the unown you catch!”

“And unown are…?” She glances up at him, a little incredulous.

“Oh, unown are fascinating Pokemon! It is believed that they are somehow related to the first systems of language ever developed by-” He starts his spiel, only to be interrupted.

“Yeah, yeah, yeah. Blah, blah, blah,” she said in a mocking tone, holding a hand up to his face to silence him. “The point is… are they tasty?”

He seemed disturbed that she would even ask that question. Eating Pokemon? Especially historical relics? Why, that was just madness! “Well, I… suppose they’re technically edible, but-”

“Good enough for me!” With that, she shoved him out of the way, staring at her new, fancy unown report as she descended deeper into the ruins. He seems like he wants to warn her about something, but stops himself. She was on her own.

She hummed happily to herself as she strolled through the halls, admiring the hieroglyphics on the walls. Eventually, she saw a beady little eye staring at her from the darkness. “Uh, hey there, little guy,” she said, leaning over, expecting a regular Pokemon. Instead, however, a giant, floating letter A with an eyeball drifted slowly into sight. Lyra was taken aback. “W-what the hell?”

It seemed just as fascinated by her as she was by it. It just sort of… hovered there in place, completely unmoving. She had no idea how this weird fuckin’ thing would taste… but hell, she’ll try anything once. “Treat! I choose you!” She called, reaching into the back of her pants and retrieving her Pokemon. She rolls her eyes when she realizes the water-type is unconscious, lulled to sleep by the pillowy softness of her booty.

“I said GO!” She yelled, literally tossing the buizel at the unown. The unown dodged easily, and the buizel landed flat on his face, yelping loudly. Dazed, the buizel pulled itself to its feet, its nose bleeding, glancing around the ruins in confusion… until it noticed the unown flying right towards him! Just before it got too close, Treat used Water Gun, and the unown fell limply to the ground, unconscious.

She walked over, picking up the unown and holding it in her hands, inspecting it. It was… without a doubt the weirdest Pokemon she’d ever laid eyes on. But hey, it looked edible, so with a shrug, she popped it in her mouth. It tastes like the alphabet soup Lyra used to have as a child. Strange. Sort of nostalgic, actually. She savored its flavor for a few moments before swallowing it whole.

Feeling it come to rest in her belly, she turned around… to find Treat knocked out, and surrounded by dozens of unown! Before she could react, the unown all flew at her at once! She opened her mouth to scream, only for three of the unowns to shove themselves into her mouth before she could make a noise! They wriggled around between her lips, and she realized they were trying to shove themselves down her throat!

She fall onto her back on the ground, confused, as the entire horde of unowns quickly forced their way into her mouth and down her throat. She realized they must be trying to rescue their consumed comrade, not realizing that by shoving themselves down her throat, they were only dooming themselves to the same fate. All Lyra can do at this point is lie back and weather the storm.

It was actually a little painful just how much her mouth and throat were stretched, as all of the unown try to shove their way in all at once. She gulps them down as fast as she can, but she can hardly keep up. Tears were rolling down her cheeks at one point as her jaw was rendered painfully sore, but all she could do was keep eating them.

Eventually, the entire horde has disappeared down her throat, and Lyra let out a thunderous bulge. She groaned, nursing her sore jaws… only to look down and see that her belly was the biggest it’s ever been! She watched in awe as her absolutely humongous, round gut bulged with the dozens of unowns fluttering around inside, now all trying to escape.

Being stuffed beyond the limit like this wasn’t an entirely pleasant experience… but it wasn’t an entirely unpleasant one, either. She lets out little moans and gasps at the sensations as the massive amount of Pokemon within her get settled. Eventually, she knew she had to get up and walk out of here... but was that even possible?
1222212223332331332333.title: Head to Route 32 to feast

choices: Just Ethan sleeping (Where are the Pokemon?)
12222122233323313323331.content:
After a series of failed attempts, Lyra had finally managed to get back on her feet after rocking herself back and forth to build momentum. She put a hand on her bulging stomach, wincing at the pain caused by the pressure on her tight skin. It was like some kind of fairy tale, or the stories her mom used to tell her when she was younger. It was as big as a yoga ball, if it was a yoga ball filled with incredibly rare, ancient Pokemon!

Inside Lyra’s stomach, the Unown were trying to escape from their fleshy prison. They fired attack after attack, but their hidden power simply bounced off of the stomach walls back into them. The heartless trainer squealed in delight as the weird Pokemon inside her pitifully tried to harm her, but only amounting to a pleasurable massage. It actually helped soothed the pain she was experiencing, giving her the second wind she needed.

“Well…” Lyra huffed and puffed as she began to walk with her wrecking ball of a gut. “Thanks for nothing Treat! Your lucky those...stupid Pokemon just flew in my belly...damnit…”

The unconscious Buizel was laying on the ground with a bloody nose. The Unown actually didn’t land a single hit before he fainted after being thrown onto the stone floor head first. It was strange how ancient, probably legendary Pokemon were less dangerous to his well being than Lyra was.

Lyra stood over the Sinnoh water type in disgust. “Fucking Arceus, you are so lazy! You fall asleep in my ass and your only good for one attack before you snooze again?” She rolled her eyes as she slowly bent down to pick Treat up, careful not to fall back over with her massive gut.

She put Treat back in between her two butt cheeks to recover, grunting as some of his nose blood got on her shorts. With that, she began to walk back to the entrance of the ruins, ready to get the hell out of this dump.

On the way back, Lyra encountered the same man from before, only this time he was incredibly distressed. “I...I just don’t believe this!” The man ruffled his hair in anxiety, “If the readings are right, all the Unown in the Ruins of Alph have just...just disappeared! Where could they have gone!”

Lyra gave a slight gasp, but stifled herself, not wanting to give herself away. She slowly tiptoed away, going as quietly as a women at her size could. Could it be true? Did she just eat an ENTIRE Pokemon species?! It was extinction! It was genocide! It was…

...a fucking aphrodisiac. Lyra shivered and bent her knees together as a tingling sensation her loins. She had done it. She had just consumed a Pokemon species from the face if the Earth! She felt so powerful, so heavy...She felt like she could take on the whole world and eat it raw! With a skip in her step, Lyra cheerfully walked out of the ancient ruins, no longer hindered by her stomach full of digesting Pokemon as he forgot all about the pain.

“Aww, are you guys getting tired?” Lyra cooed as she felt the Unown in her stomach settle down as digestion started to kick in. “Just relax and close your eyes...or eye, or whatever. It won’t matter soon, soon you won’t exist!” She cackled.

Lyra began to walk back to Violet City, random persons on Route 32 staring at her naked, bulging yoga ball of a stomach. She wondered what her body will look like after she digests her biggest meal yet. She’ll need new clothes, obviously. The ones she had on were already skin tight. And to think, they fit just fine this morning!

Lyra finally made it back to Violet, the last bit of sunshine dropping over the horizon as stars began to appear in the sky, signaling that nighttime had begun. She got even more stares as pedestrians on the sidewalk were bulldozed over as her giant gut pushed them out of her way. She felt so in power, so dominating...and she wasn't even trying!

By the time she had got to Sprout Tower, she remembered something crucial about her free lodgings. They were on the second floor. The SECOND floor, that’s only accessible by a flimsy built ladder that will surely buckle under the newfound girth. And even if it didn't, they're was just no way that she would be able to fit the opening in the floor.

As Lyra opened the front doors into the foyer, she began to feel...watched. The building was eerily silent save for the creaking of the swaying pillar in the middle. It felt like a bad horror movie to her, and it only got worse as she stepped deeper inside, the floorboards creaking under her weight.

And just when things couldn’t get any worse for poor. little Lyra…

“Haunter!”

Lyra peeped as she turned around to face her attacker, only to find a floating Pokemon snickering to itself. It was a purple, gaseous Pokemon with a round head and a pair of disembodied hands.

Lyra’s face turned red as seethed with anger at the snickering Pokemon. “Oh? You think this is funny? Well you won’t be laughing when your on the floor with a black eye!” She threw a punch at the laughing ghost Pokemon...only for her hand to go through the gaseous body.

The Haunter continued to laugh at Lyra’s misfortune, even going so far to stick it’s tongue out at her like a 5th grader. That proved to be a mistake as Lyra suddenly gripped it’s tongue, the only part of its body that non dead people could grab onto. It gave a sheepish grin as Lyra gave it an intimidating stare.

“Give me one reason I shouldn’t inhale you.” She threatened. The Haunter looked nervous for a second, before regaining it’s confidence and pointed a disembodied claw up at the ceiling. Lyra followed it’s direction, puzzled.

“Wait...are you saying...you can get my fat ass up there?” Lyra questioned the prankster Pokemon. It nodded eagerly as the huge human loomed over it’s diminutive form.

“Well, get to it than!” Lyra commanded, letting go of the ghost type tongue for it to roll back up inside. The Haunter shook its head and shifted its body to behind the portly human, reading the spell the spell...or hex...or…actually Lyra didn't care. In an instant, its eyes turned bright white, and one of the disembodied hands grabbed onto Lyra’s ample ass.

“Hey! Hands of the merchandise, buster!” She warned. Soon, however, she started to feel light, weightless even, an looked down at herself to see that she was now see through. “H-holy shit!” She gasped as she began to float to the ceiling. The Haunter crackled similar how Lyra would as it gripped Lyra’s ass even tighter, relishing how it was in control of the situation.

Lyra’s head soon hit the top of the ceiling, and before she even knew it she was on top of the second floor. The Haunter let go of her ass, and her body returned to normal. She grunted as the weight of her stomach caught up with her.

“Well, uh...thanks.” Lyra offered to the mischievous Pokemon. The Ghost made a swirl and flourish in the air before bowing and fading away from the mortal plane entirely. All she could do in response was a mere shrug as she navigated the hallways to find her room. What a weird Pokemon...

As Lyra opened the door to her room, she found...

122221222333233133233311.content:
Lyra pats her now still gut as she wandered around, searching for her room. She still couldn’t believe an entire species of ancient Pokemon was melting away in there! She fantasized about them existing for literal aeons and aeons, living for centuries and centuries, just to ultimately end up stuffing her humongous, gluttonous gut.

She was a little worried that Ethan might’ve just taken her Pokemon and ditched her… but nope. When she walked into the room, she smiled to see they were all accounted for. If any of them tried to escape from her, they were dead, and they knew it. With a low chuckle, she approached the bed… only to notice a problem.

It just wasn’t big enough for the two of them! Hell, it was hardly even big enough for her, at her new height! Her first instinct was to make them all sleep on the floor, so she could have the bed… but then she came up with another idea. She gently placed Snack and Omelet between her soft tits, at which they cooed in their sleep and got comfy.

With that, she lifted Ethan up in the air! His sleepy eyes immediately shot open as he kicked his legs a bit, a little surprised. “W-wha-!?” Without explanation, Lyra laid down on her back on the bed, which creaked beneath her weight. With that, she set the boy down on her huge, soft, squishy belly. It was just big enough for him to curl up on top of, and Lyra even enjoyed the feeling of his weight pressing down on her gut.

“There you go. New bed,” she giggled, folding her arms behind her bed while looking up at the boy sitting on her belly.

“What? I’m not going to sleep on your-” Before he could finish that sentence, she interrupted him by jostling her belly around a bit, almost knocking him off his balance.

“C’mon! It’s comfy and you know it!” She insisted. He blushed, feeling her belly squish beneath his weight. She was right; loathe as he was to admit it, her belly was the comfiest bed he’d ever felt. She patted the top of her gut before leaning back and closing her eyes. “Now get back to sleep, you have a big day tomorrow!”

He grumbled a bit, wondering if she was serious. But, the way she was acting, it seemed she really did expect him to use her huge belly as some sort of makeshift bed. He curled up on it as best he could, feeling the soft, comfy flesh squish beneath him. He can hear gurgles from below, and he shuddered. He could only wonder what she’s devoured over the day.

It only took a few minutes for Lyra to fall into a deep, restful slumber. Ethan was kept awake a little while longer, listening to the gurgles of her gut and feeling the squishy skin, but eventually, he too slipped into the most relaxing sleep he’s had in days. This was the best bed ever! Or, at least it was, until his slumber was rudely interrupted.

He only got a few hours of sleep before it suddenly felt like his world was being flipped upside down! His eyes shot open, and he realized Lyra was rolling over in her sleep! He tried to let out a yelp, but before the sound could leave his mouth, it was muffled as her belly finally came to rest on top of him. Ethan squirmed desperately beneath her belly, being pinned down against the bed by her weight. He was trapped!

The weight of her belly was incredible, and he could barely breathe as he was squished beneath it. Luckily, her gut was so soft and squishy, or else he probably would’ve been crushed completely beneath her weight. He squirmed as much as he could beneath her, but Lyra seemed to be a pretty heavy sleeper, so all his wriggles amounted to was a relaxing bellyrub for her. She cooed a bit in her sleep, but remained otherwise still.

Thus, poor Ethan was squished and masticated beneath her huge belly for hours that night, not able to get a wink of sleep beneath her unconscious torment. Over the course of the hours, he could hear her digesting and processing her meals, and actually feel her gaining weight and growing taller. By the end, she had gotten so fat that Ethan wondered if it was even possible to survive this situation any longer.

Luckily, now that the first hints of daylight were creaking through the window, Lyra was finally awoken from her slumber. She rolled over onto her back, stretching out and yawning with a smile… only to notice Ethan was flattened against her belly. With a cackle, she practically peeled him off. “Well, good morning! You’re looking bright and peachy today!”

Ethan looked absolutely miserable and exhausted. His entire body was sore as can be, and he had bags under his eyes. He desperately wants to climb into the bed and go to sleep… but before he could even think about it, Lyra was lifting him up in the air and carrying him out of the tower. “Big day today! You’ll be getting me my very first badge! Aren’t you excited?”

The sun stung Ethan’s sensitive eyes as she forced him outside, having him follow along lazily behind her as she strolled through town. ventually, Lyra passed by a store window… only to be mesmerized by her reflection! She was absolutely huge! She had grown to 7 feet overnight, and was now roughly 350 pounds!

The weight of those unown had gone to all the right places, adding another layer of delightful cushioning to her tits, booty and belly. Even her face had been affected, now with rounder cheeks and doughier features. Still, while she was obese, she wasn’t morbidly obese yet. She had to get bigger!

Still, she now towered a full foot over even the tallest of these scrawny little weaklings all over town, which amused her. She giggled at the passersby who couldn’t help but stare at her huge, jiggling body as she walked down the road. Eventually, she stopped at a small restaurant to buy breakfast for herself and Ethan. She didn’t eat much this time; she wanted to save the real feast to celebrate her impending victory!

Outside the gym, she informed Ethan of her genius master plan, which just consisted of letting all their strongest Pokemon spam attacks, and the spamming potions when their health gets too low. Unfortunately, there was one problem. While Lyra was full of energy this morning, Ethan was on the verge of passing out. She fears this might cloud his ability to battle… but whatever! Surely, her Pokemon were so overleveled that he couldn’t possibly fuck this up, right? Or at least, that’s what she hopes when she walks into the gym…

This time, she opts to stay on the ground, while letting Ethan travel up to the higher platforms. She spectates the battle from below. She can hardly see what was going on, but from the sounds of it, things must be going well!

Eventually, Ethan returned, and Lyra realized...

Lyra observed Ethan and her Pokemon as they descended to the floor from the scaffolding up above. Omelette and Treat were out cold and being carried in the nine year old’s arms, while Snack, while on the verge of fainting, was still awake and walked along the human as they made there way to her.

“Well?” Lyra impatiently asked, tapping her foot on the concrete ground. “Did you win? Where’s my badge?”

Ethan, looking like a wreck and no better than Snack, wordlessly obeyed Lyra and digged into his pockets to reveal a metallic pin shaped like a pair of wings. Excited, Lyra snatched it out of his hand without permission and quickly knotted it to her too small vest.

Lyra made a mental note to get some new clothes soon. Her nipples were pushing up against the tight fabric, with her cleavage exploding out of the top of her vest like rising bread in an oven. Her soft, well fed tummy bulged freely, fully exposed as it spilled over the sides and fronts of her panties, which struggled against her massive butt and thighs.

She looked down past her breasts to see his head brush the underside of her boobs as he got some well needed rest. Even Snack thought it was a good time to take a nap as lied on his back and closed his eyes.

Normally, Lyra would be pissed that Ethan and her Pokemon were being so fucking lazy, but instead she just sighed and took Treat and Omelette from his arms and pushed them down her boobs for safekeeping. They had all worked hard, and got her the Zephyr Badge from the gym leader Falkner. They deserved a small break.

Lyra picked up Snack and stuffed him in her snuggly butt crack, opting to switch the places he normally places him with Treat. With a slight chuckle, she grabbed Ethan by his sides and began to carry him in her arms out of the Pokemon Gym. Too onlookers on the streets, it looked like the snoozing boy could be her son, and it wasn't helping that he was unconsciously hugging against her enormous bosom.

Lyra and Ethan had already unpacked from their room at the Sprout Tower, but their things were still at the restaurant they ate breakfast at earlier. She told the people in charge that she was coming back for her victory feast.The staff said they were not responsible if they got stolen, but Lyra with her imposing figure and threatening stare made them change their policy.

The seven foot tall Lyra sat Ethan down in a chair in a patio table. She took a seat next to hum, her huge buttocks big enough to crush the chair under her if it wasn't reinforced by her request. A nervous waitress came to take the duo’s order, intimidated by the older women’s height and weight.

“H-hello! Welcome (again) to the Ivy Basil! May I take your order?” She asked with a stutter.

“Two...two of everything? R-r-r-right away, ma’am” The poor waitress meeped obediently, zipping off into the main restaurant towards the kitchen to tell the chefs to stop everything their doing, for there was a hungry monster on the loose.

Conveniently, by the time the food came by a platoon of staff pushing carts and holding trays, Ethan and the Pokemon began to stir.
