Ethan blushed crimson red at Lyra’s teasing, which she personally found cute. It wasn't a surprise to her. Such a large, voluptuous women all to himself, of course he was head over heels for her! She mindlessly fished the Pokemon out from the folds of her body so they can eat on the ground.

The waiters and waitresses had to clear the patio fo other patrons and tables to make room for Lyra’s feast. It was her largest meal yet, but with her increased stomach capacity, she confidently dug into the food.

“That is one fat butt.” Ethan commented as he ate his relatively meager bowl of macaroni. He tried to look away and pay attention on his food, but he couldn't help but watch Lyra’s gigantic ass sway from side to side as she guzzled down enough food to feed a family for a week, her huge thighs rubbing together hypnotically. “Why do my pants feel funny?”

In under half an hour, Lyra polished off the last bit of edible matter in the restaurant. The patio looked like a warzone, littered with dishes and plates licked clean. The staff watched in awe as she dug into her purse and pulled out enough money to pay for the meal. Her fat stomach bulged out several feet in front of her as the food inside her settled and began to melt into goo.


Ethan followed Lyra out the restaurant. He was surprised to see his traveling partner not hindered by the weight in her stomach in the slightest. How strong could she be if she was able to stay up with all the belly in the way?

Meanwhile, Lyra was weighing her options on how to proceed. By the time she digested her meal, she could no longer be able to pretend that her clothes fit her fine. She patted her bulging, overflowing breast flesh that was her cleavage, feeling her Pokemon toss in turn within. Treat opted to travel with Ethan, but he couldn't stop stealing gazes at her glorious booty.

She could go the Poke-mart to get some new clothes before she blew this dump...that is if they even carried clothes. Or she could just go out on Route 32 right now, and if her clothes got to small...well, going naked didn't sound too appealing. But it would feel nice not to be contained by tight fabric and just let everything out.

12222122233323313323331112.content:
Lyra was about to head for Route 32… but stopped herself, a wide, evil smirk dawning on her face as she suddenly remembered something. She had some unfinished business to attend to before leaving this boring little town...

…

“Somebody’s slaughtering the bellsprouts!”

All of the sages of the sprout tower were running around the second floor in a disorganized mess, trying to prepare for battle. Most of their forces were lying limp on the third floor, knocked out by the might of a mysterious stranger’s big, fat booty. They were largely pacifists, and did not train for battle. By Arceus’ name, she had a fire-type Pokemon! How could they possibly defeat her?

Suddenly, the hall was filled with the echoing booms of a man loudly tapping his cane on the ground, and the sages froze in place. They all stared in awe as the tower’s elder, Li, emerged from his quarters with a stoic look on his face. “Calm yourselves. I will repel this threat,” he said, simply. The other sages all cheered and clapped as Li bravely ascended the staircase, certain that he’d defeat the intruder.

In his old age, Li had seen many terrible things in his life, but what he saw on the third floor of Sprout Tower was still able to chill him to his core. Lyra - that hulking, gluttonous, mountain of a girl - was sitting there rubbing and patting at her unbelievably huge, bulging gut. He could only watch helpless as the girl raised another struggling, crying bellsprout to her lips, and swallowed it whole.

Ethan was standing on the sidelines, seeming equally horrified by the display. He respected the ancient history and traditions of the sages of the Sprout Tower - their pacifism was the antithesis to Lyra’s hedonism. Thus, he was horrified to watch her destroy what they had spent centuries building. He rushed over to the elder, tears on his face. “I’m so sorry! She just keeps eating them! I can’t convince her to sto-”

Suddenly, the old man rears back, and slaps Ethan across the face! He falls to the floor, crying louder. “Quiet, stupid child! Out of my way!” He yelled, angrily, walking past the crying boy to confront Lyra.

Meanwhile, Lyra had just finished tucking the last of the bellsprouts down her throat, dooming the entire tower’s stock to the salad-like malaise within her belly. She was content to just sit there, enjoying the feeling of stretching her gut to the limit for a while… but she was knocked from her stupor when she saw the old man slap Ethan! “Hey! Leave him alone!”

Lyra very slowly, laboriously pulls herself to her feet with a loud grunt, almost losing her balance with the huge weight of her belly slowing her down. Not only was she stuffed with food, but she was stuffed with dozens bellsprouts now, too. Luckily, bellsprouts were mostly just vines, and were really easy to gulp down en masse.

Seeing each other's determined expressions, they both knew a Pokemon battle was imminent. Lyra pulled Snack out from between her tits, and tossed him onto the floor in front of her. Meanwhile, the old man summoned a weakling little bellsprout, which cowered at the sight of the huge woman it was facing off against. “You have no respect for Pokemon! None at all!” The self-righteous old man called out angrily.

“Says the guy with the level 8 bellsprout,” Lyra rolled her eyes. “Seriously, did you ever train your Pokemon at all, gramps?”

He looks even angrier when she insults his power. “They do not need to be high level! Their bond with me makes them strong enough to overcome any obstacle!”

She’s amused by his piosness. “Well, we’ll see about that!” She said, before pointing and shouting. “Snack, use Ember!” Snack reared back, and a huge fireball launched from his mouth! The grass-type didn’t have a chance. When the dust cleared, the bellsprout was lying there, scorched and unconscious, with little spirals for eyes.

With a grimace, the old man sent out his next bellsprout, only for the result to be exactly the same. The elder was stunned by easily she was defeating him, his delusions of grandeur beginning to slip. Perhaps it has be a long time since he last battled… but no matter! He still had his stronger Pokemon left! With it, victory was certain!

He sent out his hoothoot… only for it to also get clobbered with a single attack! Stunned and miserable, the old man immediately falls to his knees, wondering how he could’ve failed to protect his tower. Meanwhile, Lyra laughs at the pathetic display. “Wow. Looks like I know more about Pokemon than any of you losers do,” she said, feeling overwhelmingly smug in her victory. “Now, it looks like it’s time for desert…”

She licked her lips as she waddled over to his unconscious Pokemon. They were all quite burnt by Snack’s fireballs, making them even tastier. The old man could only watch in horror as she gulps down his last remaining bellsprouts, one by one, his eyes following the bulges they make in her throat before they disappeared. When she held his precious hoothoot over her lips, though, he panicked.

“No!” He said, leaping forward. Seeing him move, Lyra immediately swallowed the hoothoot… only for the man to shove his arms down her throat, grabbing on to the hoothoot before it could descend to deep! “Monster! Vile wretch!” The old man desperately, futilely tried to pry his Pokemon from Lyra’s gullet… but he only succeeded at impressing her with his taste.

Once his entire arms were down her throat. Perhaps, just maybe, she could swallow the old man, too! For a while, she tries to fit her mouth around his head and shoulders while he stubbornly holds on to his precious hoothoot… but eventually, she just gives up, confirming her knowledge that she simply wasn’t big enough to gulp anyone down yet. The old man was about 6 feet tall, so following the rule of thumb, she’d have to be 12 feet to eat him with any ease…

Deciding she was tired of his pathetic struggles, Lyra started swallowing with extra vigor, and the old man cries out in anguish as he feels his hoothoot get pried from his grip by her powerful throat muscles. He can feel it disappear deeper and deeper, until it finally vanishes into her belly. Once that was done with, Lyra pushes him away, forcing his arms from her throat.

Overwhelmed by the horror he had just witnessed and experienced, the old man fainted, landing on the ground with a thud.

Meanwhile, Ethan had been watching the entire display, rubbing at his sore cheek, now heavily bruised where the old man slapped him. He hated to admit it, but watching Lyra swallow the old man’s Pokemon was actually rather cathartic. He had completely lost all respect for the sages when realized how hypocritical and self-righteous the elder was. Plus, it didn’t hurt that he actually liked the look of Lyra’s huge belly almost as much as her booty…

Meanwhile, Lyra was basking in the joy of humiliating yet another weakling trainer! Truly, she was the greatest Pokemon trainer of all time! She was about to walk off… only to nearly fall of balance by the immense weight of her gut! “Urgh… think I might’ve bit off a little more than I can chew here…” She groaned, realizing she wasn’t going anywhere soon. She huffs as she takes a seat on the ground, looking up at Ethan. “Think you could you give me a hand?”

Ethan was confused for a second… before realizing what she was asking. Hesitantly, he walked forward and sat on his knees in front of her huge, grumbling belly. It was bigger than his entire body! He massaged the squishy, stretched-out skin with his small hands in awe, hearing it loudly gurgle as the belly rub she was giving her helped speed up the digestive process.

Soothed by Ethan’s belly massage, Lyra laid back and rested her eyes, resolving to let her belly do all the work. Eventually, though, Ehan worked up the courage to say something. “Hey, Lyra?” She lazily opened an eye. “I just wanted to say… thanks for sticking up for me back there.” He was actually rather surprised that she seemed to care about him so much.

“Heh! No problem!” She laughed, amused by his gratitude. In truth, the primary reason she defended Ethan was just because she felt like he was her property, and she didn’t like other people damaging her property. But, on a deeper level, she actually was starting to like Ethan. Sure, back when he always bitched and complained, he was annoying, but he’s gotten much more bearable now that he seems to have come down with a bad case of stockholm syndrome, and has fallen in love with her beautiful boy and bad habits. Amused by that thought, Lyra wrapped her arm around the boy’s neck, and gave him a rough noogie! “Nobody’s allowed to bully you except for me! Remember that, champ!”

Ethan laughed and giggled as he squirmed out of her grip. Soon, while Lyra relaxed, he got back to massaging her huge belly, occasionally curiously pressing his ear against it to hear the gurgles within…

…

…

…

The nurse joy stood at attention as Lyra lumbered through the front doors of the Pokecenter. She looked exactly like the last nurse Joy, which filled Lyra with immediate hatred. Hopefully, they don’t have any problems here.

After digesting her meal for a couple of hours, Lyra had already gained 2 inches and 20 pounds, putting her at 7’2” and 370 lb. Her meal wasn’t even halfway digested, though, so she knew she was still going to gain a lot more weight in the next few hours. She already felt like she was on the verge of bursting out of her outfit… in a couple hours, she was probably going to be walking around in the buff.

She had to buy a new outfit… but that meant she also had to come up with a new look. That weird mix of city girl and farm girl aesthetics she usually rocked just didn’t fit her anymore. She had to think of something else...

Finally, Lyra found a pair of clothes she liked and went into the changing room to check them out. She made Ethan and the Pokemon wait right outside while she got dressed so they could tell her how she looked. Ethan feared that none of the clothes in the store would fit her, but apparently she found one.

Gigantic, incredibly fat humans like Lyra are not exactly uncommon in the Pokemon World. Most of them, however, make a point to only live around major cities where people are more accepting of their hedonistic lifestyles. Not all of them eat Pokemon as voraciously as Lyra does, but they are insanely gluttonous for food, and range from sizes of 7 feet, like Lyra is now, to the height of a skyscraper and the width of a mountain.

Because of this, there are many companies that make clothes specifically for these types of people. They specialize in incredibly elastic and stretchy material that reduces the times they need to buy new outfits. And although Violet city was barley an actual city, it was considered populated enough for the big and tall clothes to be sold.

After a while, Lyra opened the door of her changing room to reveal her new outfit to Ethan and the Pokemon, and giggled in amusement as they all dropped their jaws in response.

Lyra was wearing an incredibly skimpy two piece outfit...and nothing else. It covered her private parts, but other than that, EVERYTHING was on display. She had chosen the skimpiest style the store offered, a bikini top whose straps were practically strings, and cups were just triangles meant to cover as little chest as possible. The string, however, was stretchy and designed to accommodate for three more cup sizes.

The bikini top was paired with a matching thong. The fabric was skin tight and looked painted on her massive, pillowy booty. Lyra gave her ass a playful smack and watched it jiggle before tuning back to Ethan and the Pokemon. “Well boys~” she teased, cupping one of her blubbery boobs in a pudgy hand, “How do I look?”

How did she look? From the three Pokemon and Ethan’s perspective, she was a humongous bombshell. Lyra towered over the four of them with her incredibly voluptuous body in an outfit that let absolutely nothing to the imagination. The flabby women walked towards them, her whole body shaking as she did. Ethan in particular was transfixed on her bulging stomach, still digesting her meal and padded with soft pudge.

“Y-you look...really nice, Lyra!” Ethan stuffed with a blush on his face. “But, are you sure you can go out walking like that? It looks great and all…”

Lyra chuckled and patted Ethan on the head dismissively. “Don’t worry your pretty lil’ head, pipsqueak. If anybody has a problem with how I look, they can take it up with me. Now come on, I’m gonna wear this out.” With that, Lyra tore off the tags from her sexy outfit and walked over the counter to pay.

Suddenly, Ethan heard something hit the ground. He looked down to see Snack and Omelette hovering over an unconscious Treat, who had passed out from a nosebleed watching Lyra’s ass.

…

…

…

The two of them soon arrived at the beginning of Route 32. The Nurse Joy at the Pokecenter had the nerve to wish to see them again. Why the actual fuck would someone ever wish for their Pokemon to get thrashed so she can treat them? Girl must have some sick fetish.

Speaking of weak Pokemon, Lyra finally noticed that Snack, while stronger than he was yesterday, had still not evolved into a Quilava. At first, she was pissed at Ethan for going against her orders and bringing him back unevolved, but calmed down when she remembered that all the Pokemon on Route 32 were as weak as hell. Snack was too overpowered to gain much experience from battling smallfry Pokemon.

She took out her Pokedex from her purse to check Snack’s stats. It said that he was LV. 13, and looked like he only needed to win one more battle to evolve. Unfortunately, all the wild Pokemon were avoiding them, deathly afraid of Lyra’s massive form as she stomped her way through the tall grass.

Suddenly, the two of them were assaulted by the high pitched screech of a very familiar Pokemon Trainer they had met before.

“Fya!” The youngster Joey cried as he ran past Ethan and Lyra and forced the two of them to stop walking as he blocked their path. “We meet again, old foe! You won’t be so lucky this time, however!”

“Hey, look Ethan, it’s that retarded fuck from Route 30! Do you think I’m big enough to eat him this time?” Lyra ignored the spastic child’s ramblings as she addressed her property. Ethan looked at her incredulously. It was one thing to eat Pokemon, as vile and evil as it was, but eating...humans? The thought of Lyra eating someone alive and whole made him feel tingly in a way he didn't understand.

The three Pokemon obeyed Lyra and fired their attacks all at once. With their combined force, they were able to knock out the level 20 Raticate. “No! How could this happen!” Joey cried dramatically. He picked up his Raticate and pointed his finger at Lyra.

“Ugh, finally!” said Lyra exasperatedly, having been imapatine for Snack to finally evolve. The sight of evolution didn't warm her cold, black heart like Ethan’s, but she had to admit it looked pretty cool.

Snack’s body finally stopped glowing and his new body was revealed. He looked exactly liked the diagram showed at the Pokemon School, but Lyra noticed something she hadn't before: she could see it’s eyes now. Before, his eyes were squiggly lines on his face, but now, she could see his sparkling, ruby red irises.

“...Ohmyarcuesyouaresoprecious!!!!!” Lyra screeched as she picked up her Pokemon new body and hugged him against her exposed mammaries, smothering him in sweaty tit fat, kinda like how they first met back in Professor Elm’s Lab. To Snack's astonishment, despite the fact it was now two feet tall, he fit perfectly in between Lyra’s breasts as she stuffed him back in his home. The fire on his head and tail was smothered out by his trainer’s sweat and blubber. Lyra patted the top of her massive boobs affectionately and squeezed them together slightly.

“Whoa…”

Union cave looked like nothing particularly special from the outside, but on the inside, it was actually rather gorgeous! “Oh shit!” She let out a scream as she accidentally plunged face-first into the water, immediately thrashing like wild. Ethan was, of course, alarmed by the display. What the hell was he supposed to do? Try to lift her up out of the water? She was 400 pounds at this point! Eventually, though, he realizes that the pools of water around here probably weren’t nearly as deep as she assumed they were. “Try standing up!”

Hearing his advice, Lyra hesitantly tried to right herself… and felt her feet press against the bottom of the pool! With her height, when she stood up, the water only came up to her chest. “... oh. Heh! Thanks,” she laughed, relieved that she wasn’t drowning anymore. The water was actually comfortably warm, in fact, to her surprise. Ethan didn’t respond though, as he was too busy staring at her chest, his eyes wide and his cheeks flush.

Meanwhile, her Pokemon had also been knocked from her cleavage, and the poor dears were now swimming back to shore. “Hehe… like what you see?” She giggled, pushing her breasts up with her hands, a teasing look on her face. Overwhelmed, Ethan immediately looked away, covering his face with his hands. Chuckling, Lyra turned to try and find her top… only to feel a small fin press against her thigh for a moment! “Oh! Well, what do we have here?”

The fish she grabbed immediately started squirming with all its might, but the huge woman was easily able to overpower it, pulling it up by its tail.

It was a goldeen! Lyra smiled and licked her lips as it wriggles around futilely in her grip. While trekking down Route 32, her powerful stomach had completely processed her huge meal… and she was always in the mood for seafood! Ethan peeked through his fingers, watching with shameful interest as Lyra held the goldeen up above her lips, and dropped it in!

She cooed at the taste as she leaned back, only the fish’s tail still poking out from her lips, thrashing around while Lyra savored its taste. Eventually, she slurped up its tail like a noodle, and a big round bulge slipped down her throat, disappearing into her waiting, churning gut. Invigorated by the taste, Lyra immediately dived beneath the water for more!

It was a familiar sight. Once Lyra was overcome by gluttony, nothing could stop her. A countless number of magikarps and goldeens easily slipped down her throat one by one, while Ethan could only watch with awe. Eventually, Lyra was the searching the pool for more… until realizing there wasn’t any more! She had devoured every single Pokemon in the entire pool!

She let out an aroused coo as she rubbed and patted her once again huge and bulging gut, turned on by the knowledge she’s completely transferred all the pools Pokemon to instead swim around in her gastric acids. She always likes feeling like she’s single-handedly wiped out a community, however small it may be. There were many other pools in Union cave, though, so if she wanted to wipe them all out, it would take a while…

But she had no such ambitions. These fish, while they didn’t fill her up completely, did enough to sate her appetite for now. She glanced around, finding her bikini top floating around in the pool, and slid it back on again before climbing out of the wall. “Mm, mm!” She smiled, patting her gut, amused by the look on Ethan’s face. She’d never get tired of a belly full of Pokemon…

With that, the group continued on their way. Lyra noticed she didn’t even have to stuff her Pokemon between her tits for them to follow her anymore; through her abuse, she had whipped them all into a group that was loyal, and secretly attracted, to her. That thought made her smile. Everyone in Johto should be looking at her with the same awe and devotion Ethan and her Pokemon seemed to!

As they descended deeper into the cave, passing by many more strange pools, they suddenly heard something huge slithering around in the distance, its every movement echoing through the cave. Lyra stopped in her tracks… and Ethan noticed that even she seemed to be a little frightened!

Suddenly, a giant fuckin’ snake made out of rocks showed up! It was almost thirty feet from its head to its tail, and it had a pissed off look on its face! “Holy shit, it’s fuckin’ huge!” Truly, something of this size must be absolutely unstoppable! She immediately turned around, ready to flee, when Ethan suddenly poked her in the side.

“Lyra…” He said, looking up at her. “It’s just an onix. They’re… not actually that much stronger than any other Pokemon.” Lyra turned back, looking nervously up at the onix. This huge thing was just as weak as all those geodudes and rattatas running around here? That was hard to believe… but it at least seemed to be more interested battling than killing her, so, might as well give it a shot.

“Umm… okay. Uh, Snack! U-use Ember!” She points up at the onix. Snack unleashes yet another fireball, hitting the giant rock Pokemon right in the face… and Lyra watches in awe as the entire, huge serpent creature was knocked back, immediately slamming to the ground, unconscious. “Whoa! That was badass!” She cheered for Snack, and the quilava seemed pleased.

Lyra strutted confidently through the rest of the cave, now certain that her team could overcome any obstacle the world throws at them. When they reached the end of Union Cave, she stuck her Pokemon back between her tits, and basked in the warmth of the sunlight as she stepped back into the outside world!

Route 33 was lame. There was like one hiker there who tried to challenge Lyra to a battle, but she just walked right past him. Overall it was a fuckin’ boring route.

As they finally approach Azalea town, they hear two men bickering loudly about something. She peeks in to see some young man in a goofy black outfit arguing with an old man, saying something about ‘team rocket’. Suddenly, the rocket dude rears back and punches the old man in the face! Lyra laughs uproariously at the sight, as the old man runs away crying like a bitch. She likes this guy’s style!

So, she just easily walks on by, deciding to mind her own business unlike that whiny old man. She had come to azalea for a single purpose; getting another gym badge!

When she made it to azalea town, it… kind of sucked. It was about as big as New Bark, but a lot shittier, with houses with old thatch roofs that went out of style literally centuries ago. Really, the only reason anyone ever comes to Azalea is for the gym. The gym that’s run by a little kid, by the way, meaning it’s a terrible gym. Basically, everything about Azalea town was just awful.

Lyra sighed, trying to keep her eyes on the prize. Sure, Azalea town sucks, but she’ll only have to stay here for a day or two. Then she can move on to Goldenrod City; the best and biggest city in all of Johto! Right now, though, she had to find a place to stay around here. It was getting late, and the sun would be setting soon....

Near the Bug Type Pokemon Gym, there was a small house with a comically oversized chimney that was constantly spewing out black smoke. There was a sign placed on the front lawn of the place, that read: ‘Azalea Charcoal Kiln / B&B’.

“A Kiln?” Lyra tilted her head as she read the sign. “What the fuck is a Kiln?”

“It’s a old oven thing that people used to make bricks and clay.” Ethan answered for her, having conveniently known the information like the little nerd he was. Lyra rolled her eyes slightly, of course the little shit would know that.

“Well, they got a roof to sleep under and free breakfast, I’m seeing all green lights. How about it, Ethan?” Lyra turned her body towards the small child, making her whole body wobble. She knew she didn’t have to ask, she could have easily just marched up to the door and Ethan would follow her without protest. But she wanted to test something…

Ethan looked up at Lyra with a sad frown on his face. “You mean...you want us to sleep in a charcoal factory?” He questioned, not seeing any appeal in staying a night in an archaic wood furnace. To him, roughing it out under the stars seemed like a more preferable option.

Suddenly, Lyra grabbed Ethan by his sides and lifted him off the ground with ease. The little boy made a surprised gasp, but knew better than to struggle, which would only make the grip around him tightened. Without an warning, his body was pulled into a bear hug as his kidnapper pressed him against her soft, fat, sweaty, naked body.

Ethan’s face was so red it could have been mistaken for a tomato. His whole frame sunk into Lyra’s heavy padding, quivering like jello before settling and molding over him. He was lost in a sea of blubber and warmth, his mind muddled as he couldn't help but return the hug. Finally, Lyra released him, and he stepped back in a bit of a daze.

“Soooo...what was that about staying here Ethan?” Lyra asked the confused boy.

“I uh...I think it’s a great idea Lyra!” Ethan faked a grin. “C-c’mon! We don’t wanna get caught out in the dark!” With that, he walked ahead of Lyra towards the front door of the Kiln, leaving his traveling companion smiling evilly as he did so. She had the little shit wrapped around her fat thumb so much, he couldn't say no to her at all. True, he probably won’t ever warm up to her eating live Pokemon, but she knows she loves her body. And it was only gonna get bigger the more she ate, more fat flesh for her lil’ Ethan…

As Ethan ringed the doorbell, the two of them felt the Earth underneath them shake a little bit. They were joined by a bit of concrete too, as the surrounding wall had cracked and given way quite a bit as well as a massive women from inside the small house forced her bulk through the hole in the wall she made to greet the visitors.

“Well hello there you two, what can I help you with today?” The gargantuan women from inside spoke warmly and with a southern drawl. Ethan and Lyra looked up in awe and alarm at the sight of her. Her skin was cocoa brown, her hair a bright blonde, but most importantly, she was fat. Fatter than Lyra, that was for sure. Her breasts were larger, her butt was larger, even her belly was larger than the eighteen year old’s.

“Say no more, sonny!” The obese women chuckled. “Sure, I got a room ready for some weary travelers. Why don’t you come on in for a while? Supper’s almost ready!” With that, the big women ducked her head back into her house, shaking her ass on purpose as she did.

The house itself was a lot bigger on the inside than it looked from the outside. Most of the building was actually underground, with the structure on ground level a decorative remnant from the old house that used to be there. “Really?!” Lyra seemed to get sparkles in her eyes. If what this lard ass is saying could be true…”Tell me more!”

Lyra got up from her seat to sit next to her much more fat hostess, which happened to be Ethan’s seat. Ethan was outraged that these huge fatties were ruining Johto in the name of their gluttony! Most of the ladies didn’t share her relentless appetite for Pokemon, but they certainly had a robust taste in food! All the while, Ethan felt the pressure bearing down on him grow bigger and bigger as Lyra stuffed herself silly, chowing down on exotic and perfectly-prepared foods from all over the world. All the while, she laughed and chatted loudly with her new comrades. They all seemed to find Lyra’s jokes and frank observations about how stupid all the scrawny trainers were hilarious, so she fit right in.

Time flew by fast, and before she knew it, this simple ‘dinner’ had stretched on for a few hours. She only realized just how much time had passed when the other women started to retreat to their quarters, eventually leaving her and Olivia alone. Eventually, Lyra realized that Ethan wasn’t moving a muscle beneath her anymore, and for a moment, she was concerned she might’ve smothered him!

Octavia piped up upon seeing them. “Aaawww! Look at ‘im! He’s like a little teddy bear!” Ethan was suddenly torn from his slumber when the woman easily lifted him up in her tubby arms, and he found himself suddenly smothered in belly flesh!

His yelp was muffled by her big, fully, sloshing belly as Octavia swung herself back and forth, snuggling the small boy. Eventually, she pulled him up, letting him get some fresh air. “You are just so cute! I could eat you up!” She said, as Ethan looked at her huge, round, smiling face.

His addled mind immediately misinterpreted her statement, and he started squirming in her grip! After seeing what a smaller woman like Lyra’s capable of, he knew that a woman Octavia’s size could gulp him down for sure! “No! Please! Don’t!” He whimpered, trying to pry her tubby fingers off of him.

In response, Octavia just laughs. “Pffft! Calm down, sugar cube! It’s a figure of speech,” she said, before tapping her chin. “Though, on second though, you do look pretty tasty…” Ethan let out a little yelp when she leaned forward and sent her massive tongue along his cheek, savoring his flavor like he was some kind of popsicle!

Lyra chuckled at his horrified reaction, though seeing the hungry look Octavia’s face, it seemed she might actually just straight-up eat him. That prospect intrigued Lyra somewhat. It would certainly be a cool sight to see! Instead, though, after licking him like a popsicle for a while, Octavia just set Ethan on the ground, leaving him a little wobbly and disoriented.

“Just kiddin’, sugar pie!” She giggled, leaving Ethan with a big blush on his face as he’s filled with confusing feelings. With a roll of her eyes, Lyra lifted him up and set the exhausted boy down on her big, comfy belly, which was now stretched even bigger and rounder than it was after he little seafood binge back in the cave. Apparently, she had lost track of how much she’d been eating. Meanwhile, Octavia turns to Lyra. “Just about ready to call it a day, huh? How’ve you been like Azalea town so far?”

“Well, this kiln is great, of course,” she smiled, “but the rest is the lamest fuckin’ town I’ve ever seen. And I’m from New Bark!” They both laughed. “I guess I did run into some guy in black straight-up deck some old dude. That was pretty cool.”

Octavia raises a brow. “Guy in black?” She asks. “You mean, by the well?”

“Yeah,” Lyra nods. “He seemed to be guarding it. He was wearing some goofy fuckin’ uniform.”

Octavia rolled her eyes. “Ugh! Those bastards,” she mumbles, sitting back down again, her metallic chair creaking beneath her weight somehow. “That was a Team Rocket grunt. Y’know, those scrawny little shitstains that think Johto belongs to them, and hates us ‘fatties’. They’ve been a huge thorn in our side through this whole operation!”

“Really? I’ve never heard of ‘em,” Lyra looked up at her, inquisitively.

“Then you’ve been lucky,” Octavia groaned. “Now that you’re in Azalea, though, you’re going to get tired of them quick. “They’ve been trying to keep us out of this town, thinking we’ll bulldoze the place. We used to have a nice slowpoke tail operation going in that well, but then they came and shut us down. Now, they’ve even added a ‘no fatties’ rule to the local gym!”

Lyra was taken aback! She’s heard of skinny idiots getting up to typical skinny idiot things, but this was beyond the pale! How could these big, powerful ladies tolerate all this? “Why don’t you just, like…” she shrugs. “... eat ‘em?”

Octavia sighed. “Everything they’re doing is technically legal, so so far, we’ve tried to deal with them through legal means. We can get away with a few things here and there, but mostly, we have to follow some laws, or we’ll lose our funding!” She explains. “For example, harming humans is a no-go, but Pokemon don’t have any rights, so we can do whatever we want to ‘em.”

Lyra tapped her chin. “... would you lose your funding if someone else happened to take care of them for you?” She asked.

Octavia stares at her, before smirking. “I thought you’d never ask,” she chuckles. “If somebody were to, I don’t know, rough ‘em up, eat their Pokemon and scare them out of town, we’d certainly be grateful.” Lyra nods, obviously interested. “Well, if you’re interested, you should talk to that old coot, Kurt. He’s the only other person to volunteer to help us, since he apparently loves fat chicks. Unfortunately, he’s skinny, which basically means he’s useless. You might be able to get some intel out of him, though.”

Lyra stood up, jostling Ethan around a bit, as she was filled with dedication. “On it!” She said, with a fiery smile on her face… but Octavia laid a hand on her shoulder, and gently pushed her back down into her chair, extinguishing her fire.

“Now, now. You should get a good night’s rest, first!” Octavia insisted, and Lyra sighed, unable to disagree. “Come. There’s an open bedroom fit just perfectly for a girl your size!” Lyra was a little excited when the larger woman led her into a huge room. It was rare she got to sleep in a bed that was exactly the right size for her!

Lyra dropped the sleepy boy and her Pokemon down on the bed, and they all instantly get cozy and drifted off. After going and getting ready for a while, she eventually joined, snuggling up with them all and enjoying the feeling of them cozied up against her big, flabby body. With a sly smile, she drifted off to sleep, feeling the happiest she’s felt in a long while…

When she woke up, she immediately rushed over to a mirror! Over the night, she had gained forty more pounds and 3 inches, so she was now at 7’7” and 440 lbs. Soon, she’d have a high enough BMI to be considered truly, morbidly obese. That thought filled her with glee! At this rate, soon, she’d be Octavia’s size again!

The next morning played out much like the night’s feast. Lots of laughing and chewing, huge women hanging out, and Ethan getting teased and his cheeks pinched by a half dozen big, beautiful ladies. Once again, Lyra stuffed herself silly, the little kiln seemingly exuding an infectious sense of gluttony. Eventually, she stumbled out the door, with a huge, sloshy, gurgling gut once again.

Now… back to business! She had to take out these team rocket fucks. It was the least she could do for her new ‘comrades’. The only problem; should she really go and talk to that old perv, Kurt, for advice? That’s what Octavia recommended, but it seemed like a waste of time. Surely, it couldn’t be too difficult to just head down to the well and beat the shit out of a few grunts...
122221222333233133233311124121.title: Lyra and Octavia eat into the night

1222212223332331332333111241211.content:
“Come on, Ethan! Keep up!” The borderline morbidly obese eighteen year old tapped her fat foot impatiently on the cobblestone streets as she waited for Ethan to catch up with her. Lyra’s increased height had elongated her legs, making walking long distances much easier for her. But, she constantly forgets that her traveling companion was much slower than her.

The small nine-year old panted heavily as he finally caught up to Lyra after running. Azalea town may have been small, but Kurt’s home was still far away from the Kiln, and Ethan was not prepared for an early morning sprint. “It’s *pant* not my fault *dying wheeze* your so fa- healthy!” He corrected mid gasp for precious, life giving air.

There was a mix of annoyance, sympathy, and amity going through Lyra’s mind as he eyed Ethan with his hands on his knees, bent over to catch his breath with Treat rubbing his ankle to see if he was okay. There was something so...so captivating about his innocence and frailty, slowly but surely being squashed out as the real world catches up with him. The poor kid must have lived a pretty sheltered life up until she essentially stole him from New Bark.

First, it was Lyra eating his two best friends for Pokemon, Furret and Marill, now fat on the same booty that he now worshiped. Than it was the fact that the same meat he had been eating was in fact his beloved Pokemon companions. Than the pretentiousness and self-righteousness of those hippie shits from Sprout Tower. Now, he had learned that Ilex Forest, Johto’s famed ecological wonder, was being bulldozed to make way for a buffet district.

And at the same time, Lyra felt like she had an obligation to the brat to...keep him safe. Granted, she may beat the living shit out of him if he ever crossed her, wouldn't hesitate to belittle and bully him, and just genuinely takes pleasure in seeing him suffer…

Seeing Ethan gasping for breath on the ground in front of her, just made Lyra want to hold him close and never let go. He was a cute little thing, a little irritating, but not as much as before. She smirked as she walked over to him, her huge form casting a shadow over him.

“Maybe” Lyra retorted to Ethan’s previous comment. “But that’s not an excuse for being a fucking slowpoke! Honestly, Ethan, I take you on a Pokemon Journey, and this is the best you can do? If this is the work ethic your gonna put in…”

The 440 pound young women bent down, making her fat quake in all directions as she locked eyes with Ethan, before grabbing him by his sides and lifting him into the air. The situation was familiar to Ethan, but it never stop becoming surprising.

“...you might as well stay with Snack and Omelette!” Lyra said cheerily as Ethan’s feet made contact with her soft tit flesh. Lyra made a surprised gasp. She couldn't possible thinking of stuffing him in their with her Pokemon, can she? But more and more of his lower body was swallowed by the cavernous breast flab, answering his own question.

“L-lyra, put me down! I can’t g-g-go in-in-in-” Ethan stuttered as more and more of his small body was surrounded by jiggling cleavage.

“Oh relax, ya big moron.” Lyra rolled her eyes. “Did you honestly think you could stay down their forever? I’m only gonna get bigger, lil’ man, and since you’ve shown me you can't handle keeping up with all this” She squeezed a roll of her belly to emphasize her point, “Than staying up here, is the only logical way, isn't it?”

“Oh, and don’t think I forgot you my lil’ morsel!” Lyra bent down again to grab a nervous Treat from off the ground to stuff in her ass. He instantly got comfortable and settled in for the long haul, happy he could get to rest in the pillowy surface.

Ethan, with his chest sticking out from the top of Lyra’s tits, silently folded his arms with a blush on his face as Lyra walked with a confident strut to the old geezer’s house.

…

…

…

The trip to Kurt’s house did prove to be helpful. The old man, being yet another pervert fr fat teenagers, showed Lyra hidden pathways and entrances that Team Rocket most likely didn't know about, meaning she could get the jump on them. Charging in blindly is fun and all, but without a plan, Lyra could get seriously hurt. Pokemon can pack a punch! The old coot even offered to accompany Lyra and Ethan to help fight the grunts, but Lyra rudely turned him down. Looking at his face, Lyra realized that he was the same old idiot that got punched earlier. He was probably more of a burden then a help.

Kurt also fished out some special Apricorn medicine before she headed off. They were pills made from a very rare breed of Apricorn, with it about to go extinct since it could only be found in Ilex Forest. It made the digestion process speed up, making more room for meals and faster weight gain, which Lyra all but happily agreed to. She tucked it in her purse alongside her rare candies. She made a mental note not to get them mixed up. Two different types of experimental consumables that drastically alter her body? Sounds like the plot to B-movie monster flick.

She finally came to the well outside of town, and deposited Ethan and her Pokemon on to the ground before heading in. They had to be ready to be useful for when the battling starts. Snack and Omelette cracked their backs after being stuffed in their trainer's breasts. Normally, it was kinda comfortable, but since she suddenly wanted to force Ethan down in their too, there was a whole less room to move and settle. They like Ethan just fine, but they secretly hoped that Lyra would grow bigger already so they could have some more room.

Originally, she had planned on just knocking out the grunt guarding the well and charge forward, defeating the skinny pricks who got in her way and eat all of their Pokemon. But, because she went to Kurt’s house first, she now had the option to do go about this a different way. Around the corner, there is a secret entrance to the bottom of the well, conveniently where all the Slowpoke are being kept. She could catch them by surprise and get it over with faster, but it seemed less fun when compared to her original plan.

After a while of deciding, Lyra chose to go in...
1222212223332331332333111241211.title: Talk to Kurt for intel

12222122233323313323331112412113.content:
Well… if Lyra bothered to go talk to that old coot in the first place, she might as well try this ‘genius’ little strategy he cooked up. Otherwise, the entire thing would’ve been a waste of her time. Sure, she might have a bad case of the sunk cost fallacy… but fuck it! With a grunt, she wandered over the little cavern entrance hidden away in the forest, which lead deep into the sprawling caves beneath the well. With a triumphant smirk, she stepped inside… only for the ground to immediately give way beneath her! “Oh, fuck!” She screeched, as the soft mud and loose debris that composed the floor here collapsed.

She was sent flying down into the depths of the caverns, the last thing she saw being the cold, hard stone floor… and then, there was nothing. A while later, she awoke, immediately groaning at the splitting headache she had now. She must’ve gotten some sort of concussion! With a groan, she pried open her eyes… only to realize she was tied up! Those damn team rocket grunts must’ve found her while she was unconscious! “Damn it! Next time I see that old dickhead, Kirk, I’m gonna beat the shit out of him!” She groaned out loud, blaming her situation on that old man’s stupidity.

She wriggles a bit, trying to escape from her binds. Her size made her strong, but the rope was stronger. She looked around, noticing that she wa on some sort of island of rocks in the center of a little underground lake, on the lowest floor of the well. Ethan and her Pokemon weren’t anywhere to be seen. Before she could ponder her situation anymore, the dumbest-looking man she’d ever seen walked out in front of her. He had a goofy black uniform, an atrocious green haircut, and an insufferably smug look on his face. “Hey, fatass.” He smirked. “Did you really think you could interfere in the affairs of the venerable Team Rocket?”

“Let me go, you scrawny fuck!” Lyra roared, enraged. She HATED the feeling of being helpless! Her quest to become bigger and fatter really came down to a desire to never feel weak or overpowered. It cut her down to the core, and filled her with rage! In response, though, the scrawny fucker only laughed.

“What? And let you stand by and watch you destroy this gorgeous region to sate your own gluttony?” He taunted her. “Johto belongs to Team Rocket. And right now, you are going to serve as a warning to the other fatties not to meddle in our affairs…”

He placed a foot up against her fat belly, prepared to push her into the water… and Lyra realized what he had planned! “W-wait! You’re not gonna fuckin’ d-drown me, are you?” She said, filled with a mixture of furious indignation and a hint of genuine fear. “The police will be on your dumb ass in an instant!”

He cackled, stepping back. “Oh, officer, it was just terrible! She tried sneaking on, but the floor must’ve collapsed right under her or somethin’! She just fell right in the water!” He mimicked in a mocking voice, looking up and pressing his hands against his cheeks. “Poor girl sunk like a rock! We tried to rescue her in time, but she just too heavy…”

She tried to come up with a convincing argument… but she didn’t have any. So, instead, she just tried insulting him. “Is this the best leadership Team Rocket has?” She growled. “They expect me to scared of Captain Shit-For-Brains here?”

The man chuckled. “I’ll have you know my name is Proton. One of the most feared members of Team Rocket… and you’re about to find out why.” He pushed her up to the edge of the water. A single extra shove, and she’d sink like a brick. “Any last words?”

She stared down at him. “‘Proton’ is the dumbest fucking name I’ve ever heard.” And with that, Lyra was dunked into the freezing cold water! She let out a scream, but all that escaped her mouth was a few bubbles. She squirmed frantically against her ropes, but even if she did manage to break them, she didn’t know how to swim anyway. Eventually, as she sunk deeper and deeper, the lack of oxygen got to her, and she started to lose consciousness. This was how she was going to die, down here in some dark cave, murdered by a man with fuckin’ green hair…

Her eyes shot open, however, when she saw a familiar orange face; it was Treat! Lyra let out an excited shout as the buizel swam up to her. He blew a huge bubble, which engulfed Lyra’s head, giving her a bit of air. She immediately gulped down as much air as she could, filling her lungs. It was stale, but it was better than nothing. With that, the buizel swam over to her butt and pressed against it, before spinning his tail like mad, propelling the two of them up towards the surface! Eventually, he managed to push Lyra up onto the shore of the rocks, watching her gasp for fresh air.

“That was fuckin’ awesome, Treat!” She eventually smiled, once she was done coughing up water. The little buizel saved her life, and has thus earned her eternal respect! It was good to know that he was so loyal, he’d save her even when he had no real benefit to doing so. Lyra and Buizel spent the next few moments tediously pulling the ropes off of her. After the fall, her meager clothing fell off, and she was completely naked, leaving her a little chilly after her plunge into the freezing pool. “Where’s Ethan and the others?” She asked, and the buizel pointed up a nearby ladder.

She had to climb the ladder very carefully, as it stained beneath her weight, but eventually, she made it up and started hearing voices. She immediately hid behind a rock, peeking out at the activity occurring beyond. She noticed a few team rocket grunts all around… and most importantly, she noticed Proton bullying Ethan! “We saved you from that fatass, and this is how you repay us?” He yelled at the crying, bruised boy. Snack and Omelet were nowhere to be seen. The Rocket grunts probably already stole them with their fancy Pokeballs.

“I-I’m not gonna let you have Buizel…” Ethan cried. Lyra realized that Ethan must’ve been the one to release Treat, and whom sent the buizel to go rescue her! Her respect for the boy reached an all-time peak, which is why it enraged her so much to see Proton bully him. With one last slap, Ethan fell to the ground at Proton’s feet, crying. Furious, the man with the green hair pointed at two of his grunts.

“You! You! Go find that buizel!” He shouted. With a nod, the two walked towards the ladder. It wouldn’t be long until Lyra was found! She had to rely on the element of surprise. Her Pokemon were mostly stolen, so she was going to have to rely on her sheer strength for this one...
12222122233323313323331112412113.title: ...the other way?

122221222333233133233311124121132.content:
“Treat, I’ve got a plan,” Lyra addressed the sinnoh water type. “You take the green haired asshole with the stupidest game ever, while I take on the two idiot grunts, got it?”

Treat nodded confidently. He didn’t know if he would be able to take on the Team Rocket Admin without direction, but is was certainly better than being forced up against two meatheads. Lyra patted him on the head and pointed the finger at the scrawny ass man who had bullied Ethan to tears. And while he dealt with him, she will deal with the grunts.

“Arceus damnit!” Grunt 1 exclaimed in frustration him and his partner traversed through the cavern. “Where the hell is that stupid Buizel?! It can’t be that hard to find, it’s fucking orange for crying out loud!”

“Well, you complaining about it aint gonna make it come out, asswipe!” Grunt 2 smacked Grunt 1 on the back of his head. “Just keep your trap shut an’ we’ll find it eventually!”

Suddenly, the two grunts began to hear something from behind them. Turning around, they only saw darkness in front of them from an absence of light, but they could definitely hear footsteps running towards them.

“Hey, look at that! Complaining about it did make him come out!” Grunt 1 said smugly as he bent down to capture the rare water type running towards them. “Come here lil’ moneymaker, come to papa…”

“Hey, dude. I don’t think that -” Grunt 2 interrupted after realizing the footfalls sounded too heavy to be a tiny Pokemon’s, but was rudely interjected by Lyra’s fat foot smashing against Grunt 1’s face, breaking his lower jaw and re-aligning his nose. Grunt 2 watched in horror as his partner was punted across the cavern floor by the portly trainer.

Grunt 2 looked back at Lyra, “You-y-you bitch!” He exclaimed angrily. “You should be dead! Our boss put in the water! Fuck it, it doesn't matter. If water won’t kill you…”

The Team Rocket flunky snagged a Pokeball from his belt and threw it to the ground. It opened and a stream of light erupted from the split. The light soon materialized to reveal...the most disgusting Pokémon Lyra had ever seen. It was a purple, spherical Pokemon with vacant eyes, a toothless mouth, and pores all over that constantly spewed out toxic gasses.

“Than poison will!” The grunt continued. “Koffing, use Smog!”

The poison type Pokémon obeyed it’s master and gushed up a storm of bacteria laced gas into the air around Lyra. The morbidly obese trainer coughed and wheezed as the bad air got in her mouth. She held her breath and thought up her straty through the toxic smog.

‘I can’t eat it, that’s for sure. The fucking thing probably rolls around in shit to get that smell.’ Lyra pondered. ‘I just got to wait for it to come to me, than BAM!’

“Koffing, use Tackle!” The grunt commanded. Sure enough, the Pokemon charged it’s way into the smog cloud. Lyra couldn't see where it was coming from, so in a desperate attempt she started to throw punches and kicks everywhere at once, hoping that one of them would strike.

Fortunately, the Koffing had as much trouble as Lyra did at finding it’s target. The poison cloud was to dense even for it to find its way through. Suddenly, one of her stray kicks managed to straight into the Pokémon’s underside, and the spherical Pokemon was sent flying to the cavern ceiling.

With that, the Koffing was knocked unconscious, and the smog cloud dissipated as it stopped spewing gas. The Grunt was fuming with rage as Lyra smirked at his confused face. How did she do that? She’s just some fatty without any Pokémon!

“Maybe you can dodge poison…” The Grunt seethed, his face red with fury. “BUT YOU CAN'T DODGE BULLETS!”

To Lyra’s surprise, the Team Rocket grunt pulled out a pistol from his belt and pointed it at her with his finger on the trigger. She was confused why he would call out his weak ass Pokemon instead of bringing the actual weapon out. But she didn’t really care, she was more concerned with the lethal weapon inches away from her.

“Any last words, bitch?” The grunt cocked his gun dramatically to emphasize his point.

“When your pal wakes up, tell him when I get big enough, I’m gonna come back to this stupid piss stain you call a town, and I am going to eat all of you.”

“DIE!” The grunt shouted as he squeezed the trigger. The bullet when flying from the barrel, but to his astonishment, Lyra simply move out of the way at inhuman speed. The fuck? Does being fat make you faster too? He aimed at her again, but before he could pull the trigger, the pistol was slapped out of his hands and fell to the floor.

The Grunt instantly went to grab it, only for Lyra to place her fat foot down on his back, pinning him down as she put all 400+ lbs of her body on the lithe man. He screamed in pain as she grinder her soles into the man’s spinal cord, not finding the strength to grab the gun that was only 3 ft away from him.

“Remember what I said. I’m gonna come back. And next time. You. Are. Food.” With that, Lyra kicked the struggling bully’s head and knocked him down for the count. She got off his still body and looked down in disgust at the gun next to him. What a cheap trick. Who needs bullets when you have brute strength?

Lyra made her way back to where Proton was, to find that...

Just leave this boring town behind...
1222212223332331332333111241211321.content:
She glances over to see Proton shivering and whimpering on his hands and knees, bleeding profusely. Treat was standing next to him, triumphantly. That buizel’s water gun was like a pressure hose, and apparently Proton had taken a blast directly to the face. “Good job, Treat,” she nodded at the buizel with a smile, walking up to the agonized little man.

He let out a yelp as she lifted him up by his shirt collar, easily hefting him up into the air with her incredible strength. His struggles and squirms were completely useless, only serving to amuse her. He looked in horror at the smug, triumphant look on her face. “What? No! Y-you’re supposed to be dead!” He whimpered, shocked to see her still alive.

With that, she dropped him flat on his face on the ground, and he groaned. He let out a little whimper of fear when Lyra straddled him, her huge booty hovering over his head. “Yeah, well, this ‘fatass’ is full of surprises.” Suddenly, she dropped all her weight down on his head, and she could hear him lose a few teeth as he smashed his face into the ground! When she stood up, he was knocked out, and probably had brain damage or something.

Once that was taken care of, she walked over to Ethan, untying the bruised, crying boy. He immediately whipped around and hugged her, wrapping his arms around her flabby belly, not seeming to mind her nudity. “L-Lyra!” He sobs, tears soaking her flabby flesh. “You’re okay!”

“Hey, Ethan,” she smiled, wrapping her arms around him and patting him on the back of the head. “Were you the one that released Treat?”

He looked up at her, nodding. “Yeah! I wanted him to go get you!” He said. “I knew you could beat up these grunts!”

“Well, shit. You pretty much saved my life, then, y’know,” she said, impressed, as they broke the hug. “These scrawny shitheads were about to murder me?”

“W-what!?” Ethan said, seeming shocked. “We need to go to the police!”

“Uuuh! Let’s not get the police involved,” she immediately stuttered, wagging a finger. Most of the things you were doing on your Pokemon journey weren’t exactly legal, so you doubted the cops would be your ally here. “We should just go tell Olivia.”

Thus, a while later, after they’ve freed Snack and Omelet from their Pokeballs, Lyra and her loyal comrades were climbing up out of the well, their mission accomplished. Now that emotions weren’t quite as high, Ethan was starting to be a little more disturbed by Lyra’s nudity; especially when he climbed up below her on the ladder, giving him a clear view of her unmentionables.

When she finally pulled herself up from the well, she started shivering in the cold, every single inch of her skin bare to be assaulted by the wind. With that, they rushed back to the Kiln. Lyra did like showing off her body, but running around naked wasn’t entirely pleasant, even if she was amused by the confused looks passersby were giving her.

When they made it to the kiln, a new outfit was Lyra’s first order of business. She decided on something decidedly more ‘normal’ this time. She donned a more typical trainer vest and jeans, though her outfit was obviously designed for girls like her, as it clearly showed off her big belly.

Finally, they sat down with Olivia, and told the much larger woman about everything that had happened. “So it’s come to that, huh?” Olivia frowned when Lyra mentioned that Proton had genuinely tried to drown her. “Those Team Rocket bastards are trying to start a war they can’t win.”

“You know… I know your hands and tied and all, but I do wonder if you’d appreciate someone ‘dealing’ with those guys… permanently,” Lyra said with a sly smirk, patting her big, round belly. Olivia responded with a smirk in kind, realizing what the smaller girl meant by that. Lyra was going to have to get a lot bigger if she was going to start eating people, though…

“Let’s put a pin in that.” Olivia waved a hand, dismissively. “For now, let’s discuss payment. You’ve done us a great service taking back that well. Slowpoke tails are a very lucrative business. Besides, after everything you went though… I think you deserve a proper reward.”

Lyra was excited at the thought. “Reward? Like what?” She asked. “I already have more than enough money.”

“Well, it depends on what you desire, really. If you’re not interested in money, perhaps there’s some sort of dish you want to try? Maybe some particularly rare Pokemon?” Olivia offered.

Lyra perked up immediately. “Rare Pokemon?” She smiled. She always liked rare Pokemon! “What kind of rare Pokemon do you got?”

With an amused expression, Olivia rummaged around through her bag, before finally pulling out a fancy white Pokemon. “Well, if you request a species in particular, we can go find one for you. The only one I have on me at the moment is this…” She pulled out a Pokeball, and pressed the little button on the front, and a Pokemon appeared in a blinding flash of red light!

“Oh… my… Arceus…” She muttered under her breath, staring down at the smiling, fluffy little Pokemon on the table in sheer awe. Just when she thought she’d seen the most adorable Pokemon in Johto, this trumped them all. “This is… the most precious cuddly-wuddly little cutie patootie that has ever walked or crawled on this green Earth!”

She immediately wrapped her arms around it, hugging it tightly into the soft, squishy folds of her belly as she practically squealed in excitement! In response to the huge woman’s bear hug, the little Pokemon just cooed happily, evidently used to being manhandled by big, fat ladies like Lyra. It was a little, fluffy brown-furred fox creature, but with a flat face like a cat’s.

“Mm. That’s an Eevee. Fascinating little buggers. Their DNA is all messed up, so they can evolve into almost any type you could imagine,” Olivia nodded. “They’re usually used as designer Pokemon for rich folk, but they’re decent in battle, too.” Meanwhile, the little eevee seemed to be loving all the attention she was getting from Lyra.

The other Pokemon watched on with envy as Lyra played with the eevee, squealing and giggling over how adorable the damn thing was. Even Ethan was starting to feel a little jealous. Eventually, though, the novelty wore off, and Lyra simply stuffed her newly-acquired Pokemon between her tits. It was so warm and fluffy, it felt great between her breasts.

With that, she sent Snack and Omelet there too, and settled Treat in his favorite spot in the back of her pants. Ethan silently wished he’d have the opportunity to slip back into her cleavage again, but he’d probably look pretty weird now that Lyra’s walking around in public. Satisfied with her gains, Lyra stepped happily out of the kiln, feeling ready to take on the world!

Some part of her wants to head straight to Goldenrod… but she knows she has to get this gym’s lame badge before she can head out...
1222212223332331332333111241211321.title: Treat managed to beat Proton!

choices: ...chased by a pissed off looking Bugsy
12222122233323313323331112412113211.content:
Lyra wanted nothing more than to be rid of this Podunk town for good and make her way to Goldenrod City. Maybe even see the construction of the urban extension was coming along. But, she was a Pokemon Trainer, which meant that she should probably try to collect the Johto Gym Badges.

Lyra doesn't really have any interest in becoming the Pokemon Champion or master, whatever it’s called. But she does have an interest in asserting her dominance in life, so she supposed that being the best damn trainer in the world was something to gloat about.

Instead of turning to the slowly eroding Ilex Forest, she walked with Ethan in tow to the Bug-Type Gym. She could feel her newly acquired Eevee squirm around and play in her titflesh much to the annoyance of Omelette and Snack. It seemed the adorable Pokemon was bred from day one to practically worship fat humans, as it should.

“Alright, Ethan, we’re here.” Lyra stated as she stopped at the entrance to the Gym. She let out all of the Pokemon hiding in her folds of fat and turned to the small child. “Now win me another badge!”

“What?” Ethan looked at Lyra incredulously. “But I won you a badge last time!”

“Yeah? Well tough shit.” Lyra put her pudgy hands on her meaty hips in a scolding fashion. “I’m not going in that insect garden, the Pokemon inside are super gross! Besides, Bug-Type’s don’t sit well with my stomach.” She patted her soft, exposed gut for emphasis.

Ethan groaned, but knew better than to protest further. Lyra always gets what she wants, one way or the other. He put on his best trainer smile and picked up Treat while Snack and Omelette followed him wordlessly into the building. The Eevee paused for a moment, not wanting to leave it’s master, but decided to follow anyways.

“Not so fast, speedster!” Lyra exclaimed, making the Eevee stop in its tracks to look back at her. She was looking down at the brown Pokemon with a sly grin. “Where do you think your going? Before you can battle on my team, don;t you think we should...spend some time to know each other?”

The Eevee blinked before jumping up and down in excitement. It ran up to Lyra’s feet and sat down with it’s tail wagging like crazy. She chuckled smugly at the innocent expression on her Pokemon’s face. This was almost too easy.

“C’mon, let’s head some place a bit more private. We don’t want anyone interrupting our fun, do we?” Lyra asked with a shake of her hips. The Eevee shook its head eagerly, and it’s master began to confidently strut to the back of the Gym where no one could find them. It covered in shade with some stray bits of litter floating around. Dark and grungy, the perfect place.

“Now that no one can see us, let’s play some games, alright?” Lyra picked up the Eevee by the scruff of its neck and set it down against the back wall of the gym. It looked up at her a bit confused, wondering what she has in store for him. “I call this one…”

Lyra suddenly turned around, revealing her humongous rear end to the small Pokemon, looming over him threateningly. “...Wearing in the Eevee.”

With that, Lyra plopped her fat ass down on the poor Pokemon’s body, crushing it under her 400 pounds of weight. It struggled against the denim clad ass, but it’s whole body was pinned down, unable to find the strength of fight back.

After ten seconds, Lyra lifted her big butt off of the flatted Pokemon...only for it to fall back down instantly. The Eevee cried out in pain as it’s furry body was pancaked to the concrete, cold ground beneath him. It’s master scooted her butt back to reveal it’s face to the world, but other than that, it’s body was completely engulfed in clothed ass fat.

“Now listen to me you disgusting bag of fucking shit” Lyra cursed at the small Eevee, who was wondering what it had done to deserve this. “I don’t care how much you love me, worship me, or fucking even masturbate to me. This right here, is all that you are ever gonna be: a tool.”

Lyra raised her ass again and slammed it back down on the Eevee’s body, this time focused on its hind legs. The poor thing screamed in agony as more weight was put on it’s frame. “Right now, your my ass cushion. But who knows, maybe you’ll be my dildo next, or my afternoon snack? I get hungry so much, you know, it’s how I got to be a total fatass!”

Lyra raised her butt one last time, and watched in glee as the horrified Eevee’s face as squashed under her superior ass. She squeezed her cheeks around the Pokemon’s face, becoming crushingly tight despite the layered flab. “But don’t worry. I’m sure a chubby chaser like you just loves the idea of helping your big beautiful trainer. You’re not gonna cause trouble. You’re not gonna fight back. Because even though I’m crushing the life out of you, you love being back their, don’t you?”

The Eevee grunted as it heard Lyra’s words through the muffled butt fat. It was true, so horrifyingly true. Despite the fact that it’s bones were rubbing against one another, it;s silky soft coat of fur ruined by the grime from the ground beneath, it couldn't help but love be absolutely dominated by such a perfect ass.

Soon, Lyra finally got up for real, giving the poor Pokemon some well needed air in it’s crushed lungs. It looked like a mess, but it had a dopey, pained smile on it’s cat like face. Lyra smiled and slowly picked it up and raised it’s disheveled body to her face.

“This is for being a good lil’ boy.” Lyra cooed sweetly. With that, she planted a huge, slobbery kiss on the Eevee’s forehead, making the crushed thing shivering in delight and pain. She slowly dropped it’s body back into her cleavage to rest, the soft, war. blubber around it lulling the brown Pokemon to sleep.

Lyra patted her big breasts and began to walk out from behind the Pokemon Gym. She had to hand it to the Pokemon, it had been so long since she had any sort of sexual tension release, and it felt so good to just let it all out. The poor thing was such a good sport about it, too. The smile on its face just cannot be bought with money.

“Now, what to name you?” Lyra tapped her double chin contemplating as she pondered on what to Nickname the dozing Eevee in her boobs. “Tool? Nah, too mean, even for me. Appetizer? Eh, I don’t know. I wanna try having a Pokemon that isn't named after how tasty it is.”

The sleeping Pokemon shifted it’s aching body in it’s sleep. Damn, even when it’s fur was partially mucky from before, it was still so soft. Lyra giggled slightly as the insides of her cleavage was bristled by the Eevee’s snugly pelt.

…
