Soon, Ethan finally came out of the Gym...
12222122233323313323331112412113211.title: Go beat the local gym leader!

122221222333233133233311124121132111.content:
Lyra perked up when Ethan finally emerged from the gym. She couldn’t tell whether or not he was triumphant from the bored look on his face, but he damn well better have been. If he had lost, he would get the squishing of a lifetime! Sure enough, though, the boy walked up and begrudgingly held out a little, shiny medal, in the shape of a ladybug.

She snatches it from his hand with a smug look on her face, placing it in her badge case and stuffing her Pokemon back between her tits.“I would say ‘good job’, but… let’s be honest, you didn’t really do shit, did you?” She teased him. “With Pokemon as powerful and well-trained as mine, a braindead chimp could clear these pathetic little gyms!”

Ethan could take comfort in one fact; he was the one who was actually earning these badges. Lyra may get to parade them around, but those badges technically belonged to him. Thus, he was basically fulfilling his dreams of Pokemon a powerful Pokemon trainer, and Lyra was just along for the ride. He kept those opinions to himself, though, for obvious reasons.

“Guess we can finally ditch this shithole of a town!” She said, excitement welling in her chest as she started making her way towards what remained of Ilex forest. At this rate, she would conquer every gym in Johto by the end of the month! Before she left town, though, she stopped in her tracks, remembering one last loose end. “Oh! Wait. One last thing…”

A while later, Kurt is lounging around his crappy little hut when he hears someone knocking loudly on the door. That must be that fat girl he’d helped earlier! Filled with excitement, he rushed to answer the door… only to be greeted by a huge, chubby fist colliding with his face! He stumbled to the ground, his nose bloodied and broken as Lyra loomed over him. “Your plan fuckin’ sucked, old man!”

… aaand with that out of the way, off they went! Lyra’s eyes immediately lit up when she laid eyes on the construction of the restaurant district! It looked like an absolutely massive project, and she was impressed by the sheer size and opulence of the restaurants they were constructing. It looked like an absolute paradise in the making!

Unfortunately, despite going on for months, it was still in its very early stages, as one would expect from a project of this scale. Only a few buildings have finished construction, and even all the trees still hadn’t been cleared; there were still little patches of forest where the few surviving Pokemon hid in misery and despair, terrified of the huge ladies around.

She admired the construction progress as she strolled through. It was mostly scrawny, underpaid workers, being led by big, pudgy forewomen who impressed them all with their sheer strength. A few of the workers gasped at the sight of a 12-foot tall woman carrying a steel girder like a Conkeldurr! Lyra just giggled at the sight. Truly, fat was the future…

As she navigated the complex construction zone, though, she couldn’t help but notice her loudly growling belly. Apparently, her near-death experience has really caused her to work up an appetite, and the sight of all these restaurants being constructed can’t hurt. Eventually, she found one that seemed to be open, and curiously stepped inside.

“Fucking braindead idiot! You probably couldn’t even cook fuckin’ mac and cheese!” She heard a loud, familiar voice yelling. “Get the fuck out of my kitchen! Out, out, out!” A scrawny little chef emerged from the kitchen, tears in his eyes as he stumbled out of the restaurant. Meanwhile, Lyra just perked up, straining her ears to identify the source of the shouting. Could it be…?

Lyra’s heart leaped in her chest as she glanced into the kitchen. There she was! Irene - one of the most famous celebrity chefs in Johto, and one of the fattest, too! Her white uniform barely squeezed around the curves of the massive, 20-foot tall woman. She was truly a breath-taking sight to behold! She was probably the biggest woman Lyra’s seen on her adventure so far.

She constantly yelled at any abused the scrawny chefs that worked under her for the tiniest of mistakes. It was actually pretty hilarious to watch, though Ethan seemed to be disturbed by the sight. Eventually, though, Irene noticed Lyra standing there at the front desk, and seemed relieved to see a fellow fatty. She barked some more orders to the poor chefs before slipping out of the kitchen.

“Ah, sorry about that! It just gets so frustrating! I swear, these scrawny fuckin’ morons wouldn’t know how to cook if-” She was about to ramble, only to blush when she realized she was being crude with a customer. “Ahem! Sorry! I get a little passionate sometimes.” Lyra noticed Ethan hiding behind her, obviously frightened by Irene’s sheer size. Not to say that Lyra wasn’t a little intimidated herself.

Lyra looked up at Irene in awe. She had actually looked up to the chef when she was little; mostly for her size and power, though. Cooking was never her passion. “I-it’s okay!” Lyra insisted. “I mean… skinny people are pretty stupid, yeah. Why don’t you hire chefs that are a little more… robust?”

Irene sighed, wiping some sweat from her brow. “The problem with that is, fat chefs always end up eating all the food!” She complained. “Besides, these scrawny pricks can suffice if you run a tight enough ship. But anyway, you don’t have to listen to me ramble. What can I help you with today?”

She stuttered, having momentarily forgotten why she had even walked in here. “W-well… I was just wondering if you were open yet?” Lyra asked, patting her own, comparatively smaller belly. “I just got done beating up some Team Rocket chumps in Azalea town, and I think I worked up an appetite…”

Irene perked up. “What? Really? Well, I’ll be!” She smiled, impressed by the smaller girl’s work. “I’ve been wanting to put the boots to those bastards myself, but you know how it is. It seems the law favors the scrawny nowadays…” Irene gave a big, forlorn sigh, her belly expanding with air for a moment as she inhaled.

“Anyway, yes, we’re not really set up yet, but we are up and running. Right now, we’re only serving larger gals, though,” Irene explained. Lyra seemed a little sad, thinking she didn’t make the cut. “Oh, don’t worry! You’re more than large enough, dear. Here, right this way.”

Irene led her and Ethan to a table… which was a little weird for the head chef to do, but it seemed they didn’t have any service staff yet. There were a few other women her size eating at the nearby tables, but for the most part, the restaurant was empty. With a satisfied sigh, Lyra sat down with Ethan at one of the booths, excited to see what this restaurant has to offer.

“Now, I’m sure you’re wondering why we’re only serving larger gals at the moment. Well, this restaurant is trying out some new cuisine…” Irene said, pulling out two distinct menus for some reason. “Unlike our regular menu, it’s all free of charge, but it’s also very… experimental.”

Lyra perked up, a little intrigued. What, exactly, did Irene mean by ‘experimental’? She supposes there’s only one way to find out. After a moment of consideration, she chose the...
122221222333233133233311124121132111.title: ...victorious!

choices: Big, but not as big as Irene.
1222212223332331332333111241211321112.content:
Lyra, being the adventurous eighteen year old, decided to take a trip on the wild side and chose the experimental menu. She had more than enough money to pay for regular food, but if it was food specifically made for fatties like herself, than that’s what she should be eating, right?

Irene smiled down at the comparatively lithe fatty and handed her the experimental menu. Ethan, however, found himself completely ignored as Lyra read from her menu and he had none. After getting beat up by some Team Rocket grunts and beating the Pokemon gym back in Azalea, he was understandably hungry.

Just when he finally worked up the courage to ask the massive chef for some food, Lyra cut him off before he could utter a single syllable. “I’ll think I’m gonna go with the ‘Rare Candy Pancake Surprise’.”

“Excellent choice!” Irene smiled as she was handed back the mysterious menu. “I would get something for your friend over here, but we’re only serving fatties right now.” She glanced down at Ethan who sunk into his seat under her gaze. “Nothing personal kid, but I’ve had it up to here with you skinnies today.”

“That’s alright! Ethan here has a thick skin!” Lyra patted him on the head like a pet, making him blush hard. “I should know, I helped him grow it.”

“I’m sure you did.” Irene chuckled. There was no doubt in her mind that this girl had basically stole Ethan away from wherever he was. The way he constantly eyes her body yet is deathly afraid if it, the way Lyra talked to the kid was like a bully trying to express her emotions for her victim.

It was kind of common with the fat community. Men are seen as toys, slaves, pets, and only sometimes equal. Only women can ever get the physical condition to bloat with muscle and fat. So, with such a power gap between the two genders, it’s obvious which one would be in charge of the relationship. The way Lyra treated Ethan reminded Irene of how she mercilessly teased the boy she was sweet on was she was younger.

“Before I those scrawny asses in the kitchen to fix up your meal, you do know what happens when a fatty like you and me eats rare candy, right?”

“Yeah, it’s like, some kind of superfood that makes you put on weight like crazy.” Lyra patted her empty gut as Ethan stared up at her. That’s how she grew a couple of days ago in Cherrygrove!

“Um...ma’am?” Ethan piped in quietly. “Aren’t the reason why Rare Candy is so rare because...it’s outlawed?”

“Huh?” Lyra shifted her gaze from Irene to Ethan in confusion. “What the hell are you talking about? Why would anyone ‘ban’ food?”

Irene rolled her eyes in slight annoyance. “It WAS outlawed, skinny boy. But much like how this forest used to be protected land, it isn't now.”

“But why?” Lyra asked, genuinely confused. “Why would it have ever been illegal in the first place? Sure, it’s kind of a cheap trick to gaining weight quick, but that shit’s amazing!”

Irene smiled and suddenly sat down into the booth with Lyra and Ethan. Although the wood and steel groaned under her heavy ass, it was specifically made for girls her size. Ethan felt small and insignificant as the massive chef scooted her away towards him, and he found himself squashed between her and Lyra.

“It is amazing, that’s why we fought to bring it back.” Irene chatted. She had motioned to one of the chefs in the kitchen to start making Lyra her meal, so she could have time talking to her. “The reason why it was banned is because it’s made out of Pokémon.”

“Wha...what?!” Ethan shouted, clearly shaken about the load of information dropped on him. Lyra was surprised as well, but she only raised her eyebrows in shock.

Irene continued “The way you make Rare Candy is that you take around a hundred of this delicious creatures and super squish them to extract their essence. Back than, when Pokemon training just started, it was called Poke Candy. But some Tree hugging dipshits got so fussy over it that it got banned.”

“Until now, that is.” Irene chuckled, making her whole fat body wobble and jiggle. “Those candies are incredibly calorific, so when a Pokémon eats it, it turns into energy that makes them level up. When someone like your friend here eats it,” she motioned to Ethan getting swamped in thigh flab from both girls, “ he’ll probably turn into a Lucario or something.”

“And when a fatass eats it?” Lyra asked with a cheeky grin, knowing full well what the answer was.

Irene matched her smile. “We get fatter. That’s gonna be the whole theme of this place once it opens for real: getting bigger fast. Oh sure, the skinnies are gonna complain about us eating Pokémon and destroying the environment and all that bullshit, but who gives a fuck? This piece of salad, this forest, is only the beginning. We got big plans for Johto. And if a couple species of Pokémon go extinct because of that? We don’t care.”

Ethan looked up at at Irene with fear and apprehension. He felt like...like he was in a world on the verge of the apocalypse. Lyra only nodded with Irene’s statements, finding nothing but agreement in her words. How is it possible for these two to be so casual about the potential death of thousands if not millions of Pokémon for the goal of making their already obese bodies even bigger?

And...how was it possible that only heard about all of this until now? No one back in New Bark ever talked about how girls bigger than Lyra or her mother, or how meat came from Pokémon, or how Ilex Forest has been in the process of deforestation for six months. Could Lyra had been right, could they all be…idiots?

“Hold on one second, girl. I’m gonna see why my retarded cooks aren’t finished with your meal yet. HEY! DICKSLICES!” Irene shouted across the dining room, with only Ethan looking disturbed as the other fat ladies kept guzzling down food. “WHERE THE HELL IS THE FOOD FOR TABLE 53!?”

On cue, a visibly disturbed cook came out of the kitchen rushing with a moving tray filled with multi colored pancakes. He parked the cart next to the table not a moment too soon, or else he would have been fired. With that, he exited back into the kitchen to fix up more food for the gluttonous women.

“Ah, here we are! Rare Candy Pancake Surprise, a personal favorite of many. Go on, try it out!” Irene encouraged.

“...kinda skimpy, isn't it?” Lyra complained as she eyed the cart if breakfast food. True, to a normal person it would be a lot, but for Lyra, it was more like a snack.

“Don’t worry, people who eat from the experimental menu get a complementary feast of three of everything we got.” Irene smiled. “Eating Rare Candy leaves an empty feeling in your gut, and we wouldn't want anyone leaving this place hungry, do we?”

“Three of everything!? Man, you can’t argue with that logic!” Lyra guffawed and began shoveling in the colorful pancakes at breakneck speed. She started at swallowing one at a time in single gulps, than two at a time, than five! In seconds, she was already a sixth of the way done with her meal. She was careful not to let a single splotch of syrup go unlicked, no crumb not slurped down. As Ethan looked on in awe, Irene looked at the scene with a supportive smile. With an appetite like that, she had to be destined for bigger and better things.

Soon, Lyra had put away all of the experimental foodstuffs in her blubbery belly with a dopey smile. It wasn't long until a familiar sensation in her abdomen began to bubble from the surface. She was getting fatter, and it was starting now!

But how big will she get?

12222122233323313323331112412113211121.content:
Ethan sat there in terror, hating every moment of their trip to this restaurant. Irene’s description of their plan to take over Johto was frightening to the boy. The cruel way Irene was treating her chefs... was that the way ALL skinny people were going to be treated in the near future? If so, his only hope was that he’ll be protected somewhat by his friendship with Lyra, who didn’t treat him THAT badly in comparison…

Still, it seemed that Lyra was giving into bad habits herself. The way she was gobbling down those pancakes… ugh. Ethan could only hope she doesn’t get as big as Irene was. He didn’t know if he could handle a building-sized Lyra. He grit his teeth, bracing himself for whatever happened once Lyra finishes her meal.

Lyra downs the pancakes in seconds, leaning back and patting her belly in satisfaction. They were actually surprisingly filling for such a meager meal! She sat there for a while, waiting for their effects to kick in… but nothing seemed to be happening. Eventually, Irene looked concerned, as if worrying that the experiment hadn’t worked.

Just when they were about to give up, Lyra was suddenly overcome by a powerful sensation! Every single inch of her body seemed to be overcome with this incredible energy, and she felt a strong warmth in her core. “Oh! Ah! I feel… I feel… ooohhh…” She shuddered a bit, letting out a moan as the tingling sensation caused her to tense up in her seat.

With that, right before their eyes, Lyra started to grow. In just a few seconds, she had gained about 5 inches - then 10 - then 20! She was getting proportionally thicker, too, and Ethan found the space between her and Irene growing smaller and smaller by the second. Still, he was mesmerized by the sight of her breasts, butt and belly growing right before his eyes!

Her eyes were practically rolling back in her head as she was overwhelmed by the sheer sensation. Ethan was starting to get pressed tightly between the fat rolls of the two women, much to Irene’s amusement. Still, it seemed that Lyra was only going to get bigger and bigger.

Just when Ethan thought she’d keep growing forever and ever, her growth suddenly stopped all at once. Lyra eyes snapped back into focus, as if she had awoken from a trance. She was still visibly shaking after the orgasmic feeling of such incredible growth. She was almost a little disappointed that it was over… until she looked down and gasped at the sight of her body!

Over the course of just a couple of minutes, she had gained over 1,500 pounds! Now, she weighed almost a ton! Her belly was officially big enough to fit an entire person, and her butt was big enough to squish somebody. At a staggering 15’4”, she’d have a difficult time fitting in most houses, and any furniture that’s not heavily reinforced will be destroyed beneath her weight. Somehow, her clothes seemed to have grown as well.

“Holy shit…” Lyra suddenly jumped out of her chair, filled with energy. Ethan had never seen her look so happy or excited. With her size, she could do whatever she damn well pleased and nobody could stop her! No putting up with dumbass nurse joys, or almost getting killed by pathetic Team Rocket grunts. “I’m a fuckin’ goddess!”

“Now, slow down there! You still have a long ways to go,” Irene wagged a finger. “Always remember our motto; NEVER be content with what you have. Always demand more, more, more…!” Lyra’s smiled widened. The thought that she could get even bigger than this invigorated her!

“Yeah! Yeah! Fuck yeah! I get ya!” She said, practically shouting now, just imagining all the possibilities. She just wanted to get fatter, and fatter, and fatter, until the entirety of Johto sinks beneath her weight! “Shit, by the time I’m done with this little adventure, I’m gonna be the size of a damn mountain! And even THAT won’t be enough!”

“That’s the spirit!” Irene smiled. “Now… are ya hungry?”

Lyra’s enthusiasm was deflated somewhat, when she realized she was, indeed, starving. Her massive belly was growling loudly at this very moment, demanding to be filled. “Uh… shit. Yeah, I am,” she said. “Are the chefs ready?”

“They damn well better be, or I’m putting THEM on the menu!” Irene laughed. With that, she stood up and walked back into the kitchen, and the two of them could faintly hear her yelling again. Lyra chuckled, before sitting back in the booth besides Ethan, chuckling as the blushing boy admired her humongous curves.

“So what do you think, Ethan? Like my new look?” She teased, striking a pose that showed off her huge breasts and immense belly. Ethan was stunned.

“You look… great,” he sheepishly confessed. While he was loathe to admit it, he actually really liked watching Lyra grow bigger and bigger. He let out a little gasp when Lyra suddenly wrapped him in her huge, pudgy arms, and the boy was pressed tightly up against her humongous, firm, pillowy belly. It was bigger than his entire body! They move as quickly as they can, but they can hardly keep up with Lyra’s appetite, and she keeps clearing plates faster than they can bring them.

Ethan watches in awe as Lyra’s appetite reaches new heights. Now, she can clear an entire plate in a single gulp, before tossing it aside and moving on to the next one. Meanwhile, Lyra was thrown into a gluttonous trance by the sheer quality of the food! She thought the stuff the instaovens cook was delicious, but this was the greatest food she’s ever tasted!

It takes a truly incredible amount of food to fill Lyra’s now humongous belly. She quickly devoured enough food to feed a hundred men, and still he hunger was insatiable. Ethan could only watch in awe as an incredible amount of food disappeared down her greedy throat, and her big, round belly expanded wider and wider.

Soon, she had devoured three of everything the restaurant had… and she still had room for more! She disappeared him completely into her cleavage, and there was not a single trace of him left visible to the outside world. He was completely surrounded sweaty, jiggling titflesh.

He noticed Snack in there with him, gazing curiously at him, as if wondering why Lyra had suddenly gotten so big. “Hey, Snack,” he smiled a bit, patting the Quilava on the head. He noticed a fluffy Eevee nuzzling his side, and chuckled. “Oh! And hey, uh, Pillow!”

With that, Lyra was on her way, strutting happily through the construction site on her way to Goldenrod proper. She was feeling happier than she’s ever felt before, and sometimes tells her that when she finally makes it to the big city, things will get even better! Unfortunately, there was one last obstacle in her way before she could make it to Goldenrod...

122221222333233133233311124121132111213.content:
As Lyra continued to make her trek with all of her Pokemon and Ethan tucked away on her body, the dwindling and dying forest around her slowly paved way towards the more developed area of the vast construction site. The urban extension was still not done, but it was much more complete on Route 34 than it was in the Ilex Forest. This was where all the homes and apartments were being built, with almost all of the trees bulldozed except the ones for decoration, and the natural cove nearby being reclaimed for seaside villas. The dirt paths were paved with concrete and asphalt, like a yellow brick road leading Lyra to the wonderful city.

Even though it wasn't the city proper, the streets were still bustling with activity, every street crowded to the tipping point with bloated women and reinforced cars. Looking at the ravenous crowds, Lyra was grateful that her Ethan and Pokemon were safe and sound strapped against her body. She was proud of her vulgarity and glad to finally be with the people who accepted her, but some of the other women on the streets made her look like an uptight prude. The poor kid wouldn't last a second on these streets. They all seemed to mind their own business, though, too caught up in their gluttony to pay much attention to her. The few ones that did just gave her a welcoming smile from one fatty to another and went on their way.

Meanwhile, Ethan was trying to get accustomed to his new arrangements in between Lyra’s bloated mammaries. He was completely pinned from all sides, but not totally unable to move, but the suffocating warmth and plushness only made each movement more energy draining. Snack seemed to have gotten used to it and tried to play with Ethan in an attempt to help him stay awake, while Pillow did the same. Suddenly, he felt Lyra’s gait come to an abrupt halt, and the constant jiggling around him slowly stopped. Confused, the small boy gripped both sides of the boob flesh and thrust his torso upwards to see what was happening.

“H-hey Lyra, what’s going on?” Ethan questioned as his head peaked out from the valley of her cleavage. She didn't respond, however, just looked ahead of him with an angry, dumbfounded scowl with an occasional eye twitch. Curious, he turned his body around after much maneuvering and saw what had stopped her from making it to Goldenrod Proper.

“You have got to be fucking kidding me!” Lyra cursed with venom as she eyed the same brat that had stopped her twice before: Youngster Joey. “I mean, seriously, how the fuck did you even find me here?!”

The Irritating child trainer grinned at her like dopamine injected shark and pumped his chest with pride. “Haha, no one is incapable of being tacked down by me! Now, call out your Pokemon, for this time I WILL defeat you!”

Ethan looked back at Lyra, scared she was going to pop a blood vessel she was so angry. She was soooo close to standing in the city of her dreams, and this stupid retard was blocking her! At first, she just wanted to push the pitiful boy down to the ground with her gut and walk over him, but...but then she remembered the last time he had fought her...

‘I bet I’ll be able to down him the next time we see him.’

“...no.” Lyra’s anger slowly washed away from her face as she realized her own prophecy had come true. “No more battles.”

“What is this?! You can’t deny someone a Pokemon battle, it’s the rules!” Joey defended himself, keen on proving his self worth to his rival. “You can't just...hey, hey what do you think you’re doing?!” The small boy grimaced as he noticed Lyra walking ominously towards him with a hungry look in her eyes.

Lyra licked her lips as she eyed Joey all over. She was still rather stuffed from all the food she had just eaten at Irene’s restaurant, but the feeling of a too full gut was meager in comparison to never having to be annoyed by this brat again. Plus, this would be her first living, human meal, and that idea was too tantalizing to pass up. To Ethan’s horror, she bent down and picked up the annoying pest off from the ground and into the air with ease like she had done with him earlier. “Hey, let go of me you fatty!” He protested, wiggling hopelessly in her grasp. “What are you gonna do...eat me?!”

Lyra answered Joey’s question by opening her maw wide and, without any verbal warning, thrust the kid’s head inside her mouth. Her eyes rolled back in ecstasy as her fat tongue rolled over his head. It was better than...it was better than everything! A human might just be her new favorite food! Joey, still not comprehending how mortal his situation was, kept pitifully demanding to be spat out and have a proper Pokemon battle. Meanwhile, Ethan looked up as more and more of his body disappeared between her lips. He felt like he should be helping him, but instead, he kept silent, not wanting to get caught up in her haze of gluttony.

Soon, Ethan could feel Joey’s body ride down her esophagus, his form making a large bulge in his neck and pressing out her boobs even further. It was horrifying and disgusting, but at the same time gratifying to him in a way that made him feel shameful. He liked seeing Lyra eat, get bigger, more domineering. “That could be me if I’m not careful…” he muttered softly.

Soon, all that was left of Joey’s existence was a pair of well-worn sneakers, and with one last slurp they were popped off from his feet and discard down to the sidewalk like a piece of garbage. The bust crowds around them saw the whole affair go down, but instead of calling the police or being mortified, they gave a congratulatory cheer. A girl’s first human prey is no small moment, and Ethan was shocked at how supportive and encouraging everyone around him was towards the brutality. Was this a normal occurrence to them?!

Lyra was blown away at how it was possible for something, anything in the whole wide world to taste so. Fucking. Good. It was as if all the countless Pokemon she had devoured in her life, all the sweet foods and cuisine came back in full force one, amazing, heart-stopping barrage of taste. And the knowledge that other of her fellow human beings could be next was enough to bring her to her knees. She grit her teeth as a couple drops of sexual fluid dripped from her crotch.

“I...I just ate a person…” Lyra panted as she forced air to go into her lungs after using so much time on swallowing instead of breathing. “I’ve eaten tiny Pokemon before, but...but this?!“ This makes me feel like a fucking Goddess!” She smacked her belly loud and hard, amazed at how the small kid’s struggles didn’t even make a bulge like the piece of food that he is.


Now that Lyra had finally had a taste of the forbidden fruit, there was no going back. "Ethan, from now on, try to keep out of my eating radius." She pushed the small boy's head down back into her boobs with Pillow and snack, finally walking again as she set out to Goldenrod City with a whole new outlook on life. "Today marks my first day as a Humanitarian!". After passing through the great gates that separated the restaurant district to the main city, she was instantly taken aback. 1222212223332331332333111241211321112141.content:
Lyra could have gone over to talk to that experienced women from before, maybe get along and make a new friend. The two girls had plenty of common; they were both incredibly fat, they both loved to eat Pokemon...and that's really all you need for two people to bond! They always say that the way to the heart is through the stomach, and everyone on this floor seemed to agree.

Lyra could have gone over to not only the biggest on the floor or the whole department store, but the city and maybe even the region’s women, currently making a spectacle by trying to beat her all time record of how much Pokemon she can down under ten minutes. She was Whitney, the Normal Type Gym Leader of Goldenrod City. She has enough influence around these parts, she's practically the mayor! Getting on her good side could definitely be beneficial to Lyra in the long term, especially when she inevitably faces her for the gym badge.

Hell, Lyra could have just wondered around by herself, taking in the sights and states that the semi-secret floor had to offer. She could have bought some new Pokemon to fill out the rest of her team, super rare and strong Pokemon that could beat any wimpy ass kid to the ground. She could have even glutted herself to new levels and lose herself in a feeding frenzy like Whitney was doing.

But she did not do any of those things.

Instead, Lyra’s eye was caught by the appearance of a hastily built day care center for kids as they’re mothers went out shopping, rambunctious chubby girls fighting over who gets to eat the last Eevee, and timid looking boys waiting patiently to be picked up from this hellhole, twiddling their thumbs in an annoying fashion. And among that throng of brats, sitting on his hands was a boy in disheveled clothing, messy hair, and a crooked nose from when he was slapped so hard in the face that it broke.

Ethan.

Lyra suddenly found herself sprinting as fast as she could towards the mostly unattended day care facility as soon as she identified Ethan inside. But why was she? Why did she care about that annoying prick at all? She couldn't possibly want him back, he's been nothing but an obnoxious, annoying piece of shit the entire way here. She took him on the adventure of a lifetime, and he repays the favor by running away. The little bastard deserves to get mistaken for a whiny Pokemon and get gobbled up by a passing mother on a shopping spree.

But despite what she kept telling herself, she couldn't stop from barreling over the other kids in an effort to get to him. The manager was largely removed from the situation, smoking a cigarette and reading from her magazine. Some of the smarter kids realized who the determined stranger was trying to get to, and got out of her way as she whizzed by.

Lyra stopped in front of Ethan, her shoes skidding a little on the tiled floor. He was sitting in a plastic chair, looking down at his feet. He barely made any indication that Lyra was in his presence, refusing to look up. Lyra, for once, did not know what to say. What did she think she could do in this situation? Apologize? She ate his mother and masturbated over her struggles in a restaurant bathroom. That is not something that a person can typically forgive another for. Was she going to force him to come with her, carry him out of the store and forget that any of this had ever happened? Lyra knew that if someone ever hurt her mother, she would remember it for the rest of her life, and Ethan is probably no different.

So why was Lyra here?

In a rare moment of role reversal between Ethan and Lyra, it was him who decided for her.

“I’m sorry.” Ethan muttered under his breath, barely above a whisper, but loud enough for Lyra to hear. Lyra was caught off guard by the mute boy’s sudden words. He was the one that was sorry?! How?!

“How!?” Lyra stopped thinking to herself and began to voice her thoughts to Ethan. “How in the name of Arceus can you be sorry!? You’re not the monster that ate my mom! You didn’t drag me across Johto just so you wouldn't be lonely! You didn't belittle and humiliate me because that’s the only way you know how to say you like someone! I did that, I did all of that to you! I’m the bitch who supposed to be groveling at your feet, begging for forgiveness, NOT YOU!!”

The whole day care center went silent for a moment, before it went back to being it loud self. It was best not to get in the middle of something that was none of their business. Lyra fell to her knees, shaking the ground slightly under her immense weight. Hot streams of water were gushing from her eyes, over her red cheeks and dripping onto the floor. She can’t remember the last time she felt so small and helpless.

“You saved me.” Ethan finally raised his head up, showing to Lyra that he was crying too. “My mom, she...I told myself that I loved her, that she loved me, but…” She stopped to wipe the tears off of his cheeks. “It was a lie. She changed after Dad died. She started drinking and got angry at me for little reasons. She actually told me...she told me that she wished she never had me.”

“Mom was hungover when you came that day. I was...sort of happy that I was leaving. It was scary being with you, and it still is. But being in that big house alone with her...looking back now, she’s pure evil. She let me grow up in a sheltered bubble, not telling me where meat came from, that Pokemon like battling each other, and…”

At this point, Ethan tried to stifle a sob, but was not successful. He put his hands to his face, aggravating his bruised nose, to try and stop more tears from trickling down his face, also in vain. He continued, “I’m...I-i’m glad that you brought me along Lyra. It’s been...the best days of my entire life! I know I’m annoying and stupid and an obnoxious little s-s-shit.” he was still not used to cursing, but he figured he’d have to learn sooner or later.

“But can I come back?” Ethan concluded, leaving Lyra speechless. “I won’t run away, I swear! I’ll help you catch Pokemon to eat! I’ll worship you body and help you get even bigger! Please, Lyra, just don’t make me go back home!”

Lyra was silent for a very long time. Ethan was wondering if she had already rejected him. Until, Lyra finally spoke up, “I’ll hurt you.” She began “I’ll squish you, squash you, and break you with my big, fat body. I’ll call you names and make you cry and make you feel like you're the worst thing in the world.”

“I know” Ethan responded, knowing all the risks that traveling with Lyra posed.

“I’ll break your spirit until your nothing but my slave that will worship me. I’ll force you to feed me so I can get even fatter."

“I know”

“I’ll destroy everything that was ever important to you. I’ll eat more people, people you like. I’ll eat more Pokemon, Pokemon that you like. If there is something in this world that you think is beautiful, no matter how big or small, I will destroy it.”

“I know.”

Finally, Lyra couldn't control herself. She grabbed her Ethan from the plastic chair and brought him into her heaving chest for a hug. “I Love you, Ethan.”

Ethan smiled and returned the hug by wrapping his arms around as much breastfat that was possible. “I love you too, Lyra.”
1222212223332331332333111241211321112141.title: Notice the day care center...Ethan?!

choices: Lyra tells Ethan why Whitney is a big deal
The food comes out at lightning speed
1222212223332331332333111241211321112141.content:
The restaurant’s door opened wide as Lyra came inside with little Ethan following behind her colossal ass like the obedient pet he was. The panicked cries of Pokémon of all shapes and sizes rang in her ears like silver bells on Christmas. Sighing with a smile she took a big step forward into the restaurant.

The secret floor in the Goldenrod Department Store, despite being dedicated to the pursuit of eating as much Pokemon as possible and then some, only had one real restaurant. Most of the patrons just devoured the poor creatures right after buying them in the stores and stalls.

The restaurant in question, which was the very same that Lyra and Ethan were now in, was known by the people that frequented it as ‘The Sour Cherry Diner’, named after it’s signature sour, but still sweet Pokemon based food.

And that was all that the Diner actually served, really. As Ethan perused a display menu that was mounted near the server’s podium, he noted a distinctive lack of fruit and vegetables offered. They didn’t even serve any drinks save for MooMoo Milk. Indeed, if one would want to eat food that did not come from, or is, a Pokémon, they would have to eat somewhere else.

But being in a place where people came specifically to eat Pokémon, it appeared that no one wanted to eat anywhere else period. Although the venue was, by Fatty Standards, ‘small’, it seemed to do very, very well for itself. It was neither the breakfast or lunch rush, yet the place was still virtually packed to the brim with fat giantesses bursting with fat and blubber.

Lyra, having skipped breakfast in her eagerness to explore the sights of Goldenrod, decided that with her heartfelt reunion with Ethan out of the way, it was finally time to put some more food in her starving stomach. However, the staff on hand were a tad busy tending to the needs of the other guests, so it would be a while before the two of them could actually be served.

“So, Ethan...” Lyra turned herself around to look down at the small boy past the horizon of her breasts. “How the fuck did you end up in that crappy daycare place anyhow?”

Ethan rubbed his left arm uncomfortably and tried to turn his head to avoid Lyra’s prying gaze, “It’s...kind of a long story…an older woman thought that I looked like one of her kids and basically kidnapped me off the streets. She left me in the daycare sho she could beat her record at how much Snorlax she could eat.”

“Well, you do kinda look like a generic template for all the kids around here!” Lyra noted with a cheerful smile, happy to have Ethan back at her side, while still working in a teasing insult. However, her smile faded when she replayed what he said back in her mind. ‘Wait...did you say that she was going to eat Snorlax?”

“Uhh...yeah? Why, do you know her?”

“You don’t?!” Lyra was flabbergasted. “That was Whitney! The Whitney! Goldenrod’s Gym leader, ya dummy!”

All of the girls in the Sour Cherry Diner briefly looked up from their meals to glance towards Lyra and Ethan, mostly centered on Ethan. Whitney was one of the biggest woman in the entire Pokemon World! And this little dipshit from nowheresville got mistaken for her kid? Does she even have kids?

“R-r-really!? That’s...that’s news to me!” Ethan stuttered as he realized most of the eyes in the restaurant were now on him. “Well...that’s good isn't it? Maybe we can go talk to her after this and see if she’ll take us back to her gym and…”

Ethan was not permitted to finish his sentence as he was suddenly brought into an embrace from Lyra, his entire body sinking into her soft, fatty form. “Oh God Ethan, you have no idea how much I love you right now~” She squeezed his head into her sweaty, heaving tits and ruffled his hair cutely, to which he blushed and smiled.

“Uhh...thanks Lyra! I don’t know what exactly I did, but…”

“Oh, don't worry, I tell you all about it during brunch.” Lyra licked her lips greedily, remembering the hunger in her stomach. Finally, a server had came and brought Lyra and Ethan to a table near the window. The gold and silver view of the Goldenrod Skyline was impressive, but the real show stopper to Sour Cherry was it’s decor. It featured fictional accounts of several legendary Pokemon getting devoured by hungry fatties not unlike the patrons in the diner itself. Lyra was most captivated of a terrified Lugia, held almost universally as a symbol of power and strength, being brought down to tears as it’s head stuck out from the smiling maw of a human.

Ethan looked over the menu, trying to find a meal that wasn't too caloric for him. It was okay for girls to consume enough sugar and lard to stop a Wailord’s heart, but for a boy his size, just looking at the descriptions was making him full. He settled on a Chancey’s Lucky Egg, which was touted as being able to fix his broken nose by the girly waitress. Meanwhile, Lyra was ready to fully enjoy the Goldenrod experience. No holds barred, she asked for the food to just keep coming until she was stuffed. This order was not uncommon in Goldenrod, and the chefs wasted no time in getting it prepared.
1222212223332331332333111241211321112141.title: Lyra and Ethan stays at the Store.

choices: Whitney overheard someone talking about her
1222212223332331332333111241211321112141.content:
“So...why is Whitney such a big deal around here, Lyra?” Ethan asked after the bubbly waitress left their table to hawk new orders at the chefs. A few more stares from the other restaurant patrons settled on Ethan again, not fully believing that he didn’t know about the Normal-Type Gym Leader.

“Why? Haven’t you seen her ya idiot!? She’s, like, four times as heavy and big as my mom, and boy half her age! Arceus, I know I only learned about her yesterday, but...I don’t know, she’s like the bitch that I wanna he someday, get it? Only, you know, even bigger!”. Lyra sighed drummed her stomach as she leaned back in her reinforced chair, giving Ethan an impressive view of her wobbling rack.

“So she’s like your role model?” Ethan gulped silently. He was happy to be back around Lyra, but he wasn't going to lie to himself, a rampaging Goddess Lyra scared the piss out of him. During the brief period he was under the care of Whitney, he didn’t really get to talk to her much, which was weird since she thought he was her kid.

But Ethan was given more than enough times to drink in the entirety of her humongous body. Whitney had to be one of the biggest living creatures in the whole world, standing at a staggering and dominating 38 feet and weighing around 4,000 pounds. The Two tone women shook the whole street whenever she walked outside her gym, which in turn had to be demolished and rebuilt as her size and weight increased over the years. Positioned right enough, she could have squashed his old home under just one of her colossal butt cheeks.

“Huh...yeah, I guess so!” Lyra seemed to brighten up at that statement. “She’s so huge and big, she can do whatever she wants, whenever she wants it! That’s, like, my fucking childhood dream…”

“Did anyone tell you how she got so...healthy?” Ethan questioned further, a little uncorrectable calling other people fat. Sure, the person they were talking about was without a doubt fat, but common courtesy and politeness was imbedded into him.

“Huh? Oh, yeah…”

Lyra than began to tell the story of Whitney’s rise to corpulence and power, which she gathered from snippets of other people's conversations around Goldenrod City. Her parents were dirt poor Miltank Farmers that owned a small little operation north of the gold and silver city. When they died and the young girl inherited it, she quickly put the place’s checkbooks back in the black by selling Miltank for their meat as well as their milk. She was the only other ranch providing meat, and soon she had a monopoly on the meat trade.

Whitney began to buy out all the other farms in the area and renamed the whole place ‘Moo Moo Farms’. Trees had to be bulldozed to make way for more slaughtering plants, Pokemon had to be displaced as their homes were destroyed, and all the while the Gym Leader’s wallet got fatter, as well as her waistline. That’s when MooMoo Farms really began to expand. She raised enough money to essentially buyout Route 35 from the government for graze land. Than, the Pokéathlon Dome to make way for her new packaging factory. Finally, she made enough backhanded deals and not too legal transfers of money to purchase the beautiful National Park, soon leveled to nothing.

A lot of the people around Goldenrod praise Whitney for single handedly starting the ‘Fat Revolution’, or the resurgence of popularity of being fat and powerful. She was basically the de facto leader of the fat population, and a lot of the plans for Goldenrod’s expansion went through her. The craziest thing as that she had done this all just under a decade. She started when she was sixteen, and now she was twenty five, still young enough to hold tons of ideas and plans for the future. Lots and lots of plans…

Ethan blinked silently as Lyra finished her story. A whole load of information had just been dropped on him, and he needed time to process it. One would think that after being exposed to so much violence and destruction, he wouldn't be shocked at the news that everything north of Goldenrod City had been turned into an industrial killing zone. But, he hadn't. The blatant evilness of these women still shook him to his core, and despite trying to keep a straight face, Lyra could since he was uneasy.

“Hey, Ethan. Are you okay?” Lyra asked, secretly enjoying the terrified look on Ethan’s face. “You don’t actually feel bad about those stupid Pokemon, do ya? I believe your exact words were ‘I’ll worship your body and help you get even bigger’, right?”

Remembering what he promised, ethan quickly nodded his head up and down. “Y-yes, Lyra! I didn't forget, it’s just...just…”

“Hmmm…” Lyra tapped her chin thoughtfully. She knew that Ethan practically worshiped her for her sexy curves, but he still held that annoying moral fiber that kept him from devoting himself all the way. Maybe he just needs some ‘positive reinforcement’.

Without any warning whatsoever, Lyra suddenly reached over the table to grab Ethan by the scruff of his shirt. He let out a surprised gasp but did not struggle as she hoisted his body over the table onto her lap. His torso instantly sank into the ever so soft flesh that was Lyra’s belly fat, while his legs were getting swallowed up by Lyra’s twin pillars for thighs.

“Just imagine it, you stupid fucking braaaat~” Lyra cursed in a sing song voice. “One day, i’ll be so fucking huge and fat, you can get lost in my tits for days! My glorious ass sitting on your house. And every day, I’ll get even bigger and bigger, eating more and more retarded Pokemon...and you love that, don’t you?”


“Wah...what…?” Ethan was so comfortable, resting against Lyra’s belly, that he couldn't fully respond. He was hanging onto every word that Lyra said, but he couldn't protest a single bit of it.

“You go on and on about how Pokemon are these Gods of friendship or some bullshit, but in the bed you know that all they're good for is another layer of fat for you to snuggle up against~.” She massaged her bulbous stomach flab around Ethan’s head, muddling his mind even more as of the fat molded over his body.

“Nnn...no…” Ethan tried to say. He felt himself sink, sink, sink forever in Lyra’s pillowy gutm, all the while he felt funny. This was;the first time that he had gotten excited about Lyra’s body, but this time seemed to be the most intense.

“Remember your scrawny ass Marill?” Lyra ruffled his hair sweetly. “You LOVED that fucking thing more than anything else in the whole world. And now it’s dead. It’s souls don't go to heaven, it’s not still alive as fat on my body, It’s dead and it’s never ever gonna come back. And everyday you ogle at it’s remains as luscious padding on my boobs, butt and belly, and you want nothing more than to feel and grope at it like crazy. And the more Pokemon I eat, the bigger they get.”

“Bigger…?” Ethan asked, trying to turn his head towards Lyra’s face, but was blocked by rolls of fat and her gigantic boobs.

“Yep! Snack and the others are safe for now, but for how long? Once I’m done with them and this journey, it’s a one way ticket to fatsville for them. You’ll probably cry your pathetic heart out and beg me not to, but i will anyways. And afterwards, for being an annoying shithead, I’ll stuff you in my asscrack as psunsihemnt for a week. But do you know why I’ll keep you alive when everything else you except me is gone?”

“Loooove…” Ethan yawned as he curled up against Lyra’s belly, the sound of it’s gurgles of hunger lulling him to sleep.

“That’s right, because I love you Ethan, and you love me. I love how easy you are hurt and make fun of, and because your too cute for your own good. Do you know why you love me, Ethan?”

“...faaaat…” Ethan murmured in a low voice as he was on the verge of sleep.

“Good. And what makes me get even fatter?”

“Po...po...kemon…” And with that, Ethan had fallen asleep. Lyra grinned lovingly down at her Ethan as he slept like a teddy bear. He slowly raised him up, this time careful as to not wake him from his slumber, and gently placed him within the valley of her cleavage.
1222212223332331332333111241211321112141.title: Lyra tells Ethan why Whitney is a big deal

123.content: Which character will the story follow?
123.title: Ruby & Sapphire

1231.content:
“H-help me!”

Brendan had just moved into this town a few minutes ago, and already, he was scared out of his mind. Wasn’t this town supposed to be peaceful? The moment he stepped foot onto the nearby route, his ears were wracked with the most horrific screaming he’s ever heard! Something terrible must be happening over there! Was somebody being attacked by wild Pokemon or something?

Brendan froze in fear, wondering what to do. Should he go find a police officer or something? No, there might not be any time! Judging by the way this guy was screaming, he might be… dead by the time he made it back. Then again, if Brendan tries to rescue them by himself, he might just suffer the same fate. He looks back and forth, unable to make a decision.

… then he remembers his mother mother. She taught him always to be brave, and always do what’s right, even if it means sacrifice. To live up to her example… he HAD to do this. He had to see if he could rescue this guy, no matter how dangerous it might be. With that thought, he took a deep, frightened breath… before rushing down the path!

He expected to see a guy being torn apart by poochyenas, or covered in webs by wurmples. What he didn’t expect to see was the guy being chased around by a massive mountain of a woman! He immediately froze in place, looking up at the woman in unparalleled awe. He had never SEEN somebody this huge before! She had to be at least twenty feet tall… and probably weighed over a ton!

He was entranced by the sight for a few moments. He couldn’t help but find the sight of such a giant woman a little alluring. But eventually, the screams of the man she was chasing around knocked Brendan from his trance. “You! Please! Help!” The man yelled. “In my bag! There’s a Pokéba-” Before he could finish that sentence, he was interrupted by the woman grabbing him!

Brendan watched in awe and terror as the massive woman easily lifted the squirming man up in the air, staring at him hungrily. When the woman licked her massive lips, he realized what she was planning! Overcome by horror, Brendan glanced all around, searching for the ‘bag’ the man had referred to, only to find it lying strewn on the grass by his feet.

He got in his knees and started digging desperately through it, eventually pulling out three Pokéballs. He’s never used one of these before, so he didn’t really know how to open them. When he glanced up, though, he realized that the man had been reduced to a pair of kicking legs hanging out of the woman’s mouth! He had to act quickly!

He figured he’d just try throwing one of the Pokeballs… but no. It just sort of bounced off the ground with a little clang. In his desperation, he tried throwing another one, this time underhand. That didn’t work either! He looked down at the last Pokeball in horror, wondering just how to get the damn thing open. Maybe… maybe he had to press the button on the front?

Sure enough, the moment he pressed the button, the little ball began to open. Immediately, he tossed it down the field towards the giant woman, and the Pokeball exploded open in flash of blinding light! Brendan had to shield his eyes for a moment… and when he looked again, a Pokemon he had never seen before was standing in front of him.

He was met with what looked like some sort of… lizard? Brendan has never seen a Pokemon that walked around on two feet before! It was like a little human. Judging by its color, he could tell it was probably a grass type. As he stood there, gawking at it, the lizard looked up at him with a confused expression on its face. Just who the hell was this kid?

Brendan was so fascinated by the lizard, he almost forgot what he was doing… at least, until he looked up, and realized that the man had been reduced to a huge bulge in the woman’s throat! She was swallowing him whole… and she had an orgasmic look on her face! Brendan gasped in terror, before lifting a finger. The lizard turned around, only to be just as shocked by the sight.

“Umm… attack!” He didn’t know what this Pokemon was called, nor did he know what moves it had. Luckily, ‘attack’ was all it needed to hear. The tiny little thing ran across the ground at an incredible speed, and used tackle, launching itself right into her side! For the woman, the attack was comparable to getting punched in the kidney!

Brendan was awed to see such a small Pokemon easily bring the huge woman to her knees. Immediately, the woman coughs up her attempted ‘meal’, the man landing in a puddle of saliva on the grass. Meanwhile, she’s in too much pain to even speak, or do much else but shiver… which gives the lizard the perfect opportunity to jump through the air and collide with her forehead, knocking her out!

The very earth shook as the massive, 2000+ pound woman finally collapsed onto her back. Meanwhile, her victim slowly climbed to his feet, coughing and looking a little dazed after nearly taking a journey down a woman’s throat. He was wearing a now soaked lab coat, and was a little on the heavy side himself. “S-sir, are you okay?” Brendan asks, walking up to him.

“Y-yeah, I… think I’m fine…” The man said, panting in exhaustion, surprisingly calm after what had just happened to him. He looks down at the saliva soaking him in disgust, gagging a bit. “Fine as I could be, I guess. Thanks for saving me, kid. I thought for sure I was a goner!” He shakes Brendan’s hand.

Brendan wasn’t nearly so nonchalant. Adrenaline was still running through his veins, and he was still blown away by the seemingly impossible event he had just witnessed. “Who was that woman?” He asked. “Some kind of… Team Aqua secret weapon? Some never-before-seen hybrid of human and snorlax? Some… some…”

“What? No. That was my wife,” the man shrugged, waving a hand dismissively. “Never get married to a fat chick, kid. Trust me. I don’t care how much ‘cushion’ they have. It’s not worth it.” Brendan stood there, baffled, as the man patted him on the back and walked over to his bag. “So who are ya, anyway? I haven’t seen you around town.”

“I’m… Brendan. I just moved in today…” The boy said.

“Hah! Well, I guess that was a rude welcome, huh?” The man laughed as he collected his bag and Pokeballs. The grass lizard returns to his side. “Listen, I’m gonna skip town before she wakes up. Give her a while to cool down. If you want, though, you can come visit my lab before I leave. I’ll scrounge up something to reward you with. After all, I really owe ya, buddy.”

His… lab…? “Wait…” Brendan gawked. “You’re a Pokemon Professor?”

The man chuckled. “What? The coat didn’t make it obvious?” With that, he put the lizard back in its Pokeball, before walking off. “See ya around, kid!”

…

…

…

Later, Brendan finally returned to his new home. It was unfamiliar to him, and he didn’t like it nearly as much as his old house, but his mother assured him that he would come to love this place. Unlike the mountain of a woman he had met on the route, Brendan’s mother was only a little bit chubby, at 6’3” and 200 lbs. She planted a kiss on his cheek when he walked in.

“Hey, Honey!” She smiled, busily cooking something in the kitchen. Brendan could only mutter a little ‘hey’ back, which disturbed her. She glanced at him, and noticed the shaken expression on his face. “Oh, dear. What’s the matter? You look like you’ve seen a ghost!”

Brendan quickly had to make up some kind of story. “I was… walkin’ around town, when I went near Route 101. And I heard a guy yelling for help, so I went and…” He shuddered. “Saw him getting attacked by... some poochyenas.”

His mother looked concerned. “Oh my!”

“He had dropped his Pokeballs, though, so I… brought out this weird little lizard thing, and it scared them all away,” he explained. “After that, he invited me to his lab.”

“Oh, that’s my boy! So brave!” She smiled, giving him a hug, before considering something. “Wait… you must be referring to Professor Birch! A swell fellow, he is. You should go see him right away! After what you did, I’m sure he’d be willing to part with one of those rare Pokemon he’s been collecting.”

Brendan perked up at the sound. Now that he was old enough to be a trainer, he figured that his move to Hoenn would be the perfect opportunity to go on his first Pokemon adventure. Unfortunately, he didn’t have a Pokemon, and didn’t know how to remedy this problem. If he had a Pokemon as strong as that lizard… why, he’d be unstoppable!

“Yeah… yeah, I think I will,” he nods. “Thanks, mom!” After getting another kiss on the cheek, he rushes out the door to Birch’s lab, fantasizing about what kind of Pokemon he might get. He doesn’t know the town, but by following the map, he eventually makes it to the lab. When he knocks on the door, it’s pulled open to reveal...
1231.title: New House, New Problems

choices: Treeko. He already knows him a little.
Mudkip. He seems to have a liking for May
Torchick. He’s visibly afraid of Brendan
12312.content:
Before Brendan stood the second fattest women he had ever seen in his life, followed by Professor Birch’s wife from before. Although not as obese as the other, she was still incredibly bloated fat at a staggering height of 12’ 3”! She had long brown hair secured by a red and white kerchief and blue eyes with long eyelashes. Her huge and blubbery breasts and belly was practically exploding out of her red and navy blue shirt, while her white mini skirt and blue shorts could only contain half of her humongous rear end.

Brendan stood there with his jaw agape for a couple moments at the sight of the mysterious girl. Were all the women in this region Amazonian fatties? He certainly hoped that he was wrong. Soon, he snapped out of his shock and looked up at the stranger's face, who was looking down on him with a hungry glare.

“Well, well, well…” the massive women patted her exposed belly, making it wobble and jiggle hypnotically. “Aren’t you the cutest little morsel I have ever seen!” Without any warning she bent down and grabbed Brendan by his sides and lifted him up into the air. He gasped and immediately tried to escape her grip, but it was all in vain against her strength.

The fat girl giggled as Brendan struggled in her grasp. Suddenly, she brought the tiny boy in for a smothering hug. The poor boy shuddered as his body was engulfed in pale, sweetly fat. Everything from the neck down was forcibly squished into the women’s bulging stomach, while his head and face pressed up against her pillowy boobs. Brendan blushed heavy as the overly affectionate stranger continued to hold him in her embrace, and even began to nuzzle his mop of hair.

The stranger let out a satisfied sigh, totally content. “Oh, Arceus. You are just soooo sweet! Sweet enough to eat!” She cried out in joy. Normally, that was a phrase that most people would pass of as a harmless term of endearment. But after seeing that poor man almost get eaten, he immediately assumed the worse. It wasn't helped that she kissed his forehead, which he mistook for a tasting lick.

“May! Please set down that poor boy! Your scaring the daylights out of him!” A strangely familiar voice rang out from behind the fat women. The girl, now named as May, turned around to face whoever was talking. Out of the corner of Brendan’s eye, he could make out Professor Birch tapping his foot impatiently on the ground.

“Woops! Sorry Dad!” May exclaimed. She let go of Brendan, letting him bounce off of her soft belly and onto the ground hard.

“Wait…” Brendan grunted as he got back on his two feet. He looked towards Professor Birch, who could only offer a sheepish grin at his “You mean that she’s your daughter!?”

“Of course I am, silly!” May giggled. “Can’t you see the resemblance?”

He could not.

“Anyways,” Birch waved his hand dismissively. “I’m sure you’re here for your new Pokémon, right? Come on, I won’t keep you waiting any longer.” He than gestured the new kid in town to follow him into the laboratory. Brendan did, but let out a little yelp of Surprise as the ground underneath him shook. He looked back and saw May smiling down at him like he was a stuffed teddy bear, following him into the building. Brendan quickened his pace.

The laboratory seemed to be both the scientific workshop for Professor Birch, as well as the official Birch Residence. Next to a line of highly advanced computers was a guest are of sorts, and the living room was littered with charts and graphs about Pokémon. Finally, they come to the area where the starting Pokémon were kept; the kitchen.

“Alright, Brendan was it? Brendan, here’s what I’m gonna do. I’m going to give you a choice between these three Pokémon to choose for your starter,” He made a motion with his hand that directed Brendan’s attention to the three Pokeballs on the kitchen counter. Were they planning on...eating them? No! Of course not! That would be immoral and absurd.

“...after that I’ll give you a Pokédex, a map of the region, a couple of Pokeballs, and than I’m off to Petalburg to lay low while my better half cools off.” Brendan noticed a few suitcases nearby, packed and ready to go. He got ready to leave...quick. Like, REALLY quick, as if this was a common thing that happened around here.

“Awww, are you leaving daddy? Did mom try to eat you again?” May whined. “Can’t I go With you this time? I love being with mom, but I want to try exploring the region a little! Instead of just staying here watching T.V…”

“May, you and I both know the real reason you want to leave is so you can even fatter.” Professor Birch shook is head and gave out a sigh. “Honestly, you’ve gotten so fat off of regular food, imagine how much you’ll blow up if you started eating Pokémon!”

“Wait, what?” Brendan asked, confused by that statement.

“As big as a mountain…” May cooed dreamily, closing her eyes to scratch her blobby belly lovingly. She was no stranger to eating Pokemon already, but she never got to really pig out like her mother. Birch probably had enough trouble keeping his Pokemon alive with one fatty behemoth around.

“Sorry, could you repeat what you said earlier?” Brendan asked again, getting a little nervous. But like last time, he was ignored as the Professor scratch his head.

“Alright, May, how about this?” He offered. “I can’t let you come with me, you’re a bit too much to handle outside the house. But, why not go with Brendan here? He’s going on a Pokemon Journey, and i'm sure he doesn't mind the extra company.”

“...what!?” Brendan shouted, utterly confused.

“You mean…” May mouthed slowly. “I get to finally go on a Pokemon Journey?”

“Well, in a way. You not the best with Pokemon, but I can give you a starter after Brendan picks one, and-” Birch tried to explain the limitation of her sabbatical from Little Root, but was cut off by his own daughter pulling him for a smothering hug.

“Oh, thank you dad!” May squealed as she held her diminutive father in her fluffy arms. “I promise, by the time I come back, you won’t even be able to recognize me I’m so big!”

“That's what I’m worried about…”

After all of that, which Pokémon does Brendan eventually choose?
12312.title: May!

1243.title: More choices

12432.content:
“Psyduck? Psy-”

Cynthia swallowed, dragging more of the confused Pokemon’s body down her throat and sealing it’s beak behind her hungry lips. Shut up, you stupid duck. She followed up with a stream of rapid gulps and gluks that sucked the duck completely into the confines of her powerful neck. The bulge, that remained disappointingly still throughout it’s whole descent, disappeared into her chest, jostling her supple bosom as it passed underneath, to became the forth and final Psyduck-shaped mound in her already packed and bulging stomach.

Her meal finished, the Sinnoh Champion sighed in satisfaction and dropped to her tush against the wall of Café Cabin, her fat rump squashing outwards at the incredible weight resting upon it. Displaced air surged up from her gut, causing her to let loose a responding belch that echoed throughout the entire route, strong enough to shake the trees around her. Many a Pokemon and many a person cowered in fear or fled for the cover of the tall grass at the demonic noise. But it’s not like she cared. She was far more interested in churning up her current, boring prey and adding them to her body.

With a stretch, the behemoth known as Cynthia shut her eyes and relaxed against the wall, listening to the gurgles of her belly as it started getting to work on the dumb ducks. How unresponsive they were to being digested was extremely disheartening, as the final, futile fight against the chamber was always the most exhilarating part for her. The struggling that weakened over time, the threats and insults that would melt into begging and pleading, the silence and stillness that accompanied their complete transformation into chyme. It made her whole being, her very soul, tingle with elation. The Psyducks weren’t giving her any of that, and it made her huff. Still, she got some cruel satisfaction from listening to panicked chattering leaking from the wall of her café behind, whispering about the “monster” outside.

Through the gentle howl of the wind, she picked up the sound footsteps approaching her. Lazily, she cocked an eye open in that direction to see Professor Rowan’s aspiring trainer staring down at her nervously. She couldn’t help licking her lips at the sight of them. She had, begrudgingly, promised the Professor she would not try to eat them until they challenged her at the Pokemon League, but they just wouldn’t stop teasing her with how delicious they looked…
12432.title: The Hungry Champion

choices: ...attack the trainer instead of the Pokémon
124321.content:
Lucas Platinum, he aspiring Twinleaf Town trainer, had made his way up Sinnoh Route 210, after defeating the Ghost Type Pokemon Gym Leader Fantina in Hearthome City, and making his way through the peaceful hamlet of Solaceon. It had been a long road for the aspiring ten year old, fighting members of this new organization called Team Galactic along the way did not make it easier. However, with his trusty Infernape by his side, he believed that he could overcome any obstacle.

Cynthia shattered that belief into a million pieces.

Lucas Platinum came to Route 210 under the pretense that it was blocked by a wall of Psyducks, suffering from severe headaches. He had bought some special medicine from the PokeMart back in Solaceon Town in an attempt to cure them and continue on with his journey undeterred. But, as he made his way towards Cafe Cabin, where the Psyducks had lines themselves. The young boy was shocked and appalled to see an enormously fat women gulping down the defenseless creatures with ease.

Upon a second glance, this woman was none other than the Pokemon Champion of Sinnoh herself, Cynthia. Lucas could feel his knees turn to jello as he watched the gluttonous monster of a women from afar. Cynthia was more infamously known than even Team Galactic. Because of her position as Pokemon Champion, nad because the Pokemon League was the only semblance of an Organized Government in the region, she held the ‘right’ to do whatever she wanted to trainer and Pokemon that were defeated by her.

Namely, she would eat them. Whole and alive.

Over the years, her form had exploded in both height and weight from this high calorie diet. Lucas would have almost had a crush on the well endowned women, had she not have been mistaken for as a spawn from the distortion world. The trainer wanted to get away from the scene as fast as possible, but before he could make an attempt to go through the path now devoid of confused Pokemon, the Pokemon Champion lazily opened her eye. Her gaze fell right on Lucas, and she smacked her lips gredley at the sight.

“Well, well, well…” Cynthia stood up from the creaking bench ominously as she kept her gaze on the poor Lucas. “If it isn't Professor Rowan's champion in the making…”

Although Lucas was scared to death of this women, he still found it incredibly impolite not to converse with someone who was already talking to him. Forcing a smile, he took out his arm and held it in front of him. “Hello! My name is Lucas Platinum! And-”

“I don’t give a fuck what your stupid name is, you retarded hick!” Cynthia spat, making the poor boy grimace. The language of this woman! Did she talk to everyone like this? Nonetheless, he kept up his cheerful persona, even as the most powerful women in Sinnoh glared daggers at him.

Cynthia spanked her large, bulging stomach still filled with unresponsive Psyduck before talking again. Lucas blushed at the sight of the pale belly flab wobbling like gelatin, which Cynthia noticed. “Pokemon Trainers like you are a dime a dozen. You come from some dirt poor town from the boonies, you get your best friend for life from the old windbag Rowen, you get all the badges, you beat the elite four...”

Cynthia bent down, giving Lucas a view of her ample bosom jiggling like crazy “...and than you die. You think your so special, you think you’re gonna be the one to break the streak, and then you melt into more flab for the next trainer to ogle at before I eat em’ too.”

Lucas backed away from the dominating women, but she merley walked forward, almost knocking him to the ground as her heavy stomach collided with his torso. “Scared? Don’t worry I’m not gonna eat you yet. You still have three more badges to get before I can do it legally. So, since I’m bored and you probably need more experience for your Pokémon…I’m gonna give you some help.”

“Huh!?” Lucas exclaimed as Cynthia easily lifted him up from off the ground. But...w-why?!”

“I told you already dipshit, I’m bored! I’m not gonna lounge around the Pokémon League every day until you grow enough balls to face me. No, I want a real challenge, and who better to teach you than the champion?” Cynthia smiled at the disgruntled child, before flinging his body over past the cafe. With a heavy thud he collided with the ground, and as he got up he saw Cynthia looking over him, licking her lips hungrily.

“You know, your kinda cute for an obnoxious brat~.” She teased the child in her shadow. “Maybe I’ll go easy on you and make you my slave when I win. Now get your scrawny ass up! I’m gonna teach you what it really means to be a Pokémon Master.”

Lucas shivers at the prospect of being this evil women’s servant for the rest of his days and obeyed. Before long, he was walking along the rest of the Route, only now he was accompanied by the Pokémon Champion herself.

The first Lesson Cynthia taught Lucas, was...
124321.title: The tasty Lucas.
