12512.title: Trainer Bianca or Assistant Bianca?

125121.content:
To any other resident of Nuvema Town, today was just another ordinary day. A day to watch what few Flying Pokemon that visited the town depart almost as quickly as they arrive, in search of greener pastures. Or to observe the waves pass the town by, heading mindlessly onwards to more exotic locations. Or to go mad counting the ceaseless spinning of the Pokemon Lab’s wind turbine.

Or to do as most do, and stay inside and watch TV – the favorite pastime of the tiny town’s few citizens.

But for three young teens, today was a day of unrivaled significance. Today was the day all three would finally escape the overwhelming boredom of their hometown; the day were they all would choose their very first Pokemon and begin their Pokemon adventures!

And absolutely nothing was going to get in Bianca’s way.

“Goood afternoon, Ms. Black!” The bubbly blonde bellowed as she barged into the Black family household. Despite her still relatively normal size, she slammed through with enough force to rip the door from it’s hinges and denting the wall behind it. She couldn’t help but feel a pang of pride in her heart at her own display of strength, and briefly pondered how powerful she’d be once her diet became a little… feistier.

The intended recipient of her call turned her attention from the television to look at the intruder, and her face cracked into a smile. “If it isn’t the Tepig from next door!” The older woman laughed, not at all cornered about the ruined state of her front door. She stood up, rising to a height that dwarfed Bianca, and advanced towards the girl. Each step she took shook the floor beneath her, the house creaking as it struggle to support the behemoth, and caused her massive belly and breasts to jostle and jiggle like an endless, fatty ocean that utterly mesmerized Bianca. Finally, Ms. Black came to a stop and lowered herself down to softly jab the girl in her somewhat chubby stomach. “Or should I say Pignite? Looks like you’ve been “leveling up” quite a bit.”

Bianca giggled. “Yes, mam. But I’m looking forward even more to all the “experience” I’ll get from the wiggling food on my journey.” She proudly proclaimed with a few pats to her tummy. She couldn’t wait to become a goddess like Ms. Black or Professor Juniper, and to crush all who doubted her – such as her weak and pathetic parents – beneath her gigantic girth.

The gigantic woman’s lips curled up into a proud smile as she took in the girl’s statement. She straightened up and trekked to the kitchen, giving the blond a clear path to the stairs. “My waste-of-space son is upstairs with that… Seren boy, or whatever.” She said as she opened up the massive fridge and began skimming over the contents, musing on what to stuff down her throat. “… I do hope you’ll be a fine Emboar someday.”

Bianca nodded with utmost confidence. She moved to the staircase, and pressed up towards her destiny.

---

“They were delivered to Hilbert’s house, so Hilbert gets first pick. And then you can choose after him, Cheren.”

Hilbert and Cheren paused, sparing surprised glances with each other. Bianca wasn’t one for letting others go first. Maybe, once upon a time, when the trio were extremely young kids she did. But not anymore. The boys knew there had to be a catch.

Hilbert bit the Boldore first. “… A-are you s-sure?” He hesitantly asked the girl who had commandeered his bed.

He hadn’t intended on stuttering, Bianca knew, but growing up with his monster of a mother had left him a boy who struggled to speak clearly, always fearful he’d say or do something that’d get him smacked into oblivion. Bianca felt a sliver of pity in her heart for him. A teeny, tiny sliver that was easily dwarfed by the admiration she had for his mother, but it was there, perhaps enhanced with finding him somewhat cute. So, she decided to cut him some slack this time. “Don’t make me repeat myself.” She commanded, voice dropping threateningly low.

Hilbert swallowed and nodded. Shakily, he advanced towards the present and removed the lid. The sight of those three Poke Balls, the embodiments of the trio’s freedom, took his breath away. With the power of one of these Pokemon, he could finally be free of his tyrant of a parent. Free! Free! Free!

Instinctively, he reached for one before stopping himself, his hand so close to touching the top of the sphere, and spared a glance at Bianca out of the corner of his eye, whose gaze was locked firmly on the box. There had to be a catch for her generosity. Would he or Cheren be punished if they picked the Pokemon she wanted?

Only one way to find out, Hilbert begrudgingly accepted. He reached out, his time determined, and grasped a Poke Ball tightly in his hand…
125121.title: The First Step to Fatness

choices: Bianca heads downstairs to get one last meal
Bianca want to have a Pokemon Battle first
Bianca's too impatient! Pokemon Journey now!
1251211.content:
Hilbert could feel Bianca’s gaze burn onto his skin as he picked up the center Pokeball from the case. He lightly pressed his right index finger into the button in the middle, and the containment device suddenly erupted out of his hands, spewing bright white energy onto the floor. The energy began to materialize and took shape, and after a few moments it was revealed to the trio that Hilbert had picked…


“Tepig!” the Fire Pig pokemon squealed in delight as it eyed it’s new master from head to toe, satisfied. It leaped up from the floor into Hilbert’s lap, surprising him, and proceeded to assault it’s trainer with licks and nuzzles. Hilbert, however, was less ecstatic about the current situation than his new Pokemon, mainly because the plump blonde sitting on his bed was red in the face with anger.


“You...you little shit!” Bianca screamed, scaring the fire starter into hiding under Hilbert’s shirt. “You knew I wanted a Tepig since we were fucking Toddlers! Is this some kind of a sick joke?! ‘Cause I ain’t laughing!”


“I-I-I...I’m sorry Bianca!” Hilbert pleaded as he shrunk under Bianca’s glare. “I don't know I would pick him, honest! If you really want it so bad, you can have it!” He tried to remove the Tepig from the inside of his shirt, but the poor thing was too scared to come out. It’s trainer would protect It from the big bad blonde outside, It just knew it.


And as fast as Bianca’s temper came, it faded away as if it had never happened. She blamed herself, realizing that it was her fault for trying to be nice for once in her life. Nothing good ever comes out of helping people. At first, she wanted to smack Hilbert upside the head...but she couldn't. As much as she tried to suppress the feelings down, she did feel bad for making Hilbert so scared, and after observing how strong of a grip the Tepig had on his torso, she knew she blew her only chance at having one.


And than she got an idea in her head.


“You know what!? Just...just forget it ‘bert”, Bianca sighed, letting out all of her frustration in a single breath. Bianca was infamous for getting explosive temper tantrums at a moment’s notice, and instantly forgetting about what made her mad in the first place after it had subsided. “You can have that stupid, fucking...cute lil’ bundle of awesomeness, but it’s going to cost ya’.”


Hilbert signed under his breath. Here comes the catch. When the three were kids, Hilbert and Cheren were forced to get Binaca food if they ever wanted anything from her. The two got many a bumps on their head for trying to sneak food out of their mother’s kitchens for her appetite. But this time it was different...


“I get to come with you on my journey!”


Hilbert down on his lower lip hard, almost enough to draw blood, from shock. “But...but Bianca! Isn't the whole point of getting our Pokemon, going on a journey to go our separate ways and make something of ourselves in the world?”


“Yeah, dipshit, I know that. But I figure it’s a fitting deal. See, you took my Pokemon, therefore you took my journey. So, I'm gonna take your Pokemon…”Bianca than picked up the last remaining Pokeball with Snivy inside, with Cheren already have taken Oshawott, “...and ruin your journey!”


“But...Snivy isn’t my favorite Pokemon…” Hilbert interjected. “I can’t choose out of all the Pokemon in the world which one is my favorite. I love them all!”


“Well, than I’m just gonna have to make sure to eat all of them before you can catch any, huh?” Bianca gave out a hyena sounding cackle, making the two boys and Pokemon grimace. Bianca had been talking non-stop about how much she was going to ‘level up’ during her Pokemon Journey, and she planned to do that by eating other Pokemon. They detested it, but couldn't really do anything with how strong their female friend is.


“Well, if there's nothing left for us to do, I’m gonna head on out. See you guys later!...and good luck ‘bert”. Cheren whispered once last message into his friend's ear and whisked himself out of the bedroom, disappearing from the Hilbert’s and Bianca’s lives...until they see each other on the road again. It happens more frequently than one would think in the Pokemon world.


Bianca felt a pang of sadness as she saw Cheren leave, but drowned it out by focusing on all the fun she was going to have on her Pokemon Journey! She knew she was going to have fun, but now that she had Hilbert for a traveling partner it was going to be even better. She could have him rub her belly after a full meal, or make catch more Pokemon for her to eat! Ohh, the future looked delicious!


Hilbert nervously tapped Bianca on her meaty shoulder to snap her out of her daydream. “Uhhh...so, shall we say goodbye to my mom? I think she has some food ready for us...but I think it was really meant for just you.”
1251211.title: Hilbert chooses Tepig.

125122.content:
With still an ever apparent slush from the remaining Pokemon goop inside your stomach, Bianca raised her puffy, fat arms over her head as she woke up from her sleep. She scratched her stomach absentmindedly, padded with hefty flab that did nothing to lag her movements. She rolled the sheets of her bed off of her body and heaved herself onto the floor, her globe-like belly squashing as she bent down. She gave a girlish squeal as jolts of euphoria were sent up her body as the fluids inside her from last night’s meal were processed further and absorbed into fat.

“Honestly, Emboar, did you have no survival instincts? You should have known better than to let your trainer talk you into being eaten.” She smirked darkly as she smacked her heavy gut. Bianca White, the assistant to Unova’s Professor Juniper, had last night eaten the last remaining Pokemon of her former team from when she was a Pokemon Trainer years ago. She was such a naive shit back than, before she ate her first Pokemon.

She remembered it like it was yesterday. She had just left Accumula Town, and was all ready to catch some new Pokemon Friends on Route 2 with her trusty Tepig. That’s when she saw it: A shiny Lillipup! She had to have it! Tepig took the thing down easily, but when she reached into her purse, she realized she had forgotten to restock on Pokeballs at the PokeCenter, along with having lunch. With no other way to carry her new Pokemon, and was pretty hungry, Bianca deposited the unconscious Pokemon in the safest place she could think of.

Her stomach.

The incident sparked a flame. A voracious, all consuming fire that ordered it’s host to eat more, and more, and more. Since than, Bianca had become a cruel, gluttonous fiend that only wanted to devour more food. Her once trusted companions had become tools, and over her journey her frame expanded and ballooned with fat as she ate.

By now, Bianca was a Wailord of a women. 900lbs, 13’5’’ft, the eighteen year old girl smiled in bliss as she examined her blubbery body in the mirror in her bedroom. Women like her were not uncommon in this Pokemon World. She had a physical condition that most all other female humans had: the fatter you are, the stronger you are. Naturally, gals get addicted to the rush of strength and dedicate their whole lives to becoming bigger, but most are content the way they are.

Not Bianca, however. She pulled out a tight fitting, latex like garb that was custom built for her out from her dresser. It’s stretchy fabric drew attention to her luscious curves, and hugged her body better than her skinny ass mother ever could. The color scheme sort of matched up[ with her old attire: light green leggings, white trunk, orange sleeves...but other than that, she had long abandoned her urban/rural fusion get up.

After putting on her clothes (which felt tighter and tighter every day), the busty and semi-full Bianca walked out of her massive house provided to her my the ever so gracious Professor Juniper, who was more or less around her size in terms of height and girth. It was far away from her home town in Aspertia City, but she didn't mind. Her mother disowned her after she found out about her new hedonistic lifestyle, and Hilbert and Cheren slowly faded away from the picture. Fuckers, who needs them when you got a full stomach?

She looked down at her purse and opened it up to make sure she hadn't forgotten anything. Sure enough, there was three Pokeballs sitting idly, each one containing a rare starter Pokemon. Professor Juniper assigned her to give out these things to some kid who lived in town with her. She couldn't remember if it was a boy or a girl, but she didn’t care. All she wanted to do was get this whole ordeal over with and get some well needed breakfast.

----------

“Why did the fucking brat chose the lookout for the meeting spot!?” Bianca shouted to herself as she stood on top Aspertia's famous viewing platform. “It’s freezing up here, and the view isn't’ even that good! Just some dumb trees and rocks…”.

Soon, Bianca saw a small figure ascend the concrete stairs. It must be the brat, and not a moment too soon. The last bits of her old Emboar had finally digested away, and she had gone from being semi hungry to being plain hungry. Her belly gurgled for food impatiently, while she patted it soothingly to calm it.

Finally...
125122.title: A more sedentary life assisting Juniper is better.

12513.content: Roxie, the rebellious rock star gym leader.
12513.title: Roxie?

1252.content: Which of the two six gen protagonists would you like to follow: Calem or Serena?
1252.title: X & Y

choices: ...when her Pokémon tugged at her heels
12522.content:
The morning sun rose over the horizon in the Kalosian Sky, and the humble village of Vaniville shifted off the lasts wisps of nighttime. It’s denizens began to wake up and greet the day with a happy smile, grateful to be alive in such a wonderful era of peace and brotherhood.

Well, almost everyone...

You see, just last week, Vaniville had accepted a Kantonese Family to move to their quiet hamlet. The people were ever so excited. People from another region, how interesting! They couldn’t wait to learn all about Kanto culture and their way of life, never thinking anything negative of the soon to be neighbors. However, once they did arrive, their welcoming faces turned to uncomfortable frowns. The family, known as the Biggs, were very, very different from the normal Kalosian citizen.

For one, they were fat. Immensely, inhumanly fat. They were a mother and daughter, and were the fattest and largest human beings any of them had ever seen. The daughter, Serena, was an incredibly well fed girl, weighing in at about 431 lbs, with a height of 7”1’. She was fat, that was for sure, but most of her weight accumulated around her ass and breasts. She had a potbelly, thick thighs and arms with a chubby face and multiple chins, but the real showstopper was the immense proportions of her bust and rear end.

Her mother on the other hand made her look like a grape in comparison. The blood het daughter, Ms. Biggs weight was more balanced, all 1,048 lbs of it in her 9”4’ frame. 1253121.content:
I will not be like mother… I will not be like mother…

That was the mantra Lillie repeated to herself, again and again, as her empty stomach burned away at her insides. Her monstrous hunger, something she was undoubtedly sure she had inherited from her monster of a mom, simply refused to be sated. Her gigantic, Tyranitar-sized breakfast had already been broken down into nothing, not a single ounce left to add to her skinny body. Now it yearned, as it had many times before, for something far more… feisty.

Lillie shook her head and softly repeated her mantra under her breath. She glanced out over the conservation area, hoping to find something to take her mind away from her screaming gut. She spotted Ms Wicke on a distant walkway, observing the Pokemon below with clipboard in hand. Unlike her mother, who was a mountain of gelatinous fat and flab, Wicke was supply and shapely, an increasing rarity in this world of slobs and blobs.

And also unlike Lillie’s mother, Wicke was a kind soul who detested the idea of devouring people or Pokemon, another increasing rarity. She was always the one to comfort Lillie or her brother when their mother’s temper flared. Always the one to offer the Aether Foundation's aid to people the president would simply scoff at. Always the one to get her hands dirty nursing countless Pokemon back to health.

She watched Wicke, that amazing person, giggle as one of the Corsola she was observing playfully tackled another into the water. She absorbed the way her body subtly jiggled, her succulent breasts softly bouncing beneath her clothes. Her eyes trailed down to the older woman's ass, taking in all that they could of that delicious rump.

Lillie felt her mouth begin to water.

Maybe… Maybe a little taste wouldn’t…

Her senses returned. She smacked herself, hard and audibly.

No! I will not be like mother! I must not be like mother!

Lille broke into a dash, dodging past the employees who appeared upon her path.

Tomorrow! Tomorrow I’ll do it! I’ll get away from this place! Get away from mother! Get away from this hunger!

---

Even though she had managed escape from the clutches of her mother with Nebby in tow, Lillie would eventually discover that the hunger that burned within her veins was not so easily gotten rid of. It was simply a matter of when it would resurface...
1253121.title: Lillie's Burning Hunger

12531211.content:
Throughout the course of time, the Islands of Alola have been a verdant paradise where people and Pokémon of all cultures came together in Amity. A land that overflows with life force, and where Pokemon and Humans live with bonds perhaps deeper than family. The sun soaked Archipelago Region was all of these things...until suddenly a fat phenomenon took over the world, and tourists from other regions got hungrier, hungry for something more than vegetables, berries, bread and dead meat.

No, no they needed it to...squirm on the way down.

At first the Island Kahuna’s were so opposed to the notion of people eating Pokémon, that for a brief, but impressive, time after the world decided that Pokémon were better as food than friends, Alola trudged On with their traditions and values. But soon after the tourism industry tanked, an industry that the Melting Pot nation depended on dearly. So they had no choice but to do the unthinkable.

Alola still is a beautiful gemstone in the sun, a fact that is blatantly obvious considering the industrialized state the rest of the world is in, but one would have to be pretty dumb not to notice some of the contemporary changes. The water is no longer as clear as crystal, the vegetation and wildlife less abundant, and the sky not as brilliantly blue as before. But it is still a jewel...just a little scratched.

The most noticeable scratch being the Aether Foundation in the middle of the Island Chain, a non profit philanthropic organization dedicated to cure hurt Pokemon. At least, it is on the surface. In reality the Foundation and it’s leader are the main people putting pressure on Alola’s Kahuna’s to lax the Pokémon Protection Laws and stuff their faces even more. It.’s come under the media’s spotlight after the leader’s son, Gladion, ran away with a extremely rare and delicious Pokémon.

And, as of last night, her daughter Lillie, too.

The scrawny, yet incredibly ravenous, teenaged girl walked through Iki Town, a spiritual village close to the Island's Guardian Spirit, and so far away from the tourist itinerary that the locals have not yet been swayed by the Blob mindset. She clutched the straps of the bag she held over her arm and pressed it to her thin waist. Nebby was her only real friend in the world now, and she needed to stay strong so she could protect it...no matter how tasty it looked…

“No!” Lillie shouted out loud whilst shaking her head, her iconic sun hat almost falling off. “I’m not like my mother, I am better than my mother! Pokémon are friends, and humans are living people with hopes and dreams! I could never eat them...c-could I?”

“Hello they're, young lady.” A gruff, masculine voice behind Lillie spoke up. She jumped and turned around to see an elderly man, tanned and vie despite his apparent age. “I’m sorry for eavesdropping, but it appears to me that you are going through a...internal crisis. My name is Hala, I am Melemele’s Kahuna.”

“Oh...oh!” Lillie shriveled up like a dying flower and blushed crimson red. “No, you misheard! I love Pokémon, and I would never, ever even think about sinking my teeth into their soft...supple…”

“Little lady,” the Kahuna put a hand on Lillie’s shoulder and smiled. “They're is no reason to lie. If you are indeed struggling with yourself, than I would like to offer you some helpful advice.” He pointed his hand to the tip of the biggest mountain on the Island.

“Go to the Ruins of Conflict, and seek out our Guardian, Tapu Koko. He shall give you the tools to emerge victorious from your conscious battle.” He nodded sagely. “When the time comes, he will ask you to make a very important choice...I know you will make the right choice. And with that, he bowed and walked away to attend to his duties.

“Tapu...Koko?” Lillie echoed. Her stomach gave an annoyed grumble, reminding it’s host of it’s ever gnawing hunger. “Maybe...he can help me…”

———————————————————————-

“Nebby get back in the fucking bag right now, or I swear to Arceus I’ll stuff you in and never let you out!” Lillie yelled with the rage of ten skinny teenagers as her Pokemon floated happily up Mahalo Trail. She let it out for a quick second to get some fresh air, and now it was dancing and giggling all over the place. The hungry girl grumbled and swore under her breath as she climbed the mountainous trail after it. “I bet Gladion’s stolen Pokémon doesn't rum away from him! Why are you being so difficult!?”

After ten minutes of exhausting climbing, Lillie made it to the top of an incline, and was ready to scream and grab Nebby from the ground...but it wasn't they're. Instead, the rare Pokémon was floating over a rickety bridge, with a scared expression on it’s face as bird Pokémon overhead hovered menacingly.

“Oh no...oh no oh no oh no!” Lillie tugged at both ends of her hat and hit her lower lip hard. Nebby didn’t know any moves, so it couldn’t defend itself. And the bridge looked like it couldn’t support an ounce of weight, let alone her. Her Pokémon was trapped, and she was stuck. If something wasn't fine soon…

“Help!” Lillie cried out. She clamped her hands over her mouth and screamed as loud as she could. “Please, anybody, save my Nebby!”

And someone did come to save Nebby. But the question is...who exactly?

May shouted back hitting Jessie over and over on the head. After some time Jessie managed to pry May off her and threw her to the floor. May got up charging at Jessie her arms outstretched. Eventually what happens?
151112113.title: May Busts Down the Door

choices: Max tries to keep May from eating too much
May ends up clearing out the whole kitchen
Jessie is gone, but not Team Rocket...
151113.content:
Jessie was about to give her new pet Max is ‘reward’ for rubbing her gut, but before she could utter a single sound from her mouth, the door to the kitchen was suddenly broken off its’ hinges, slamming into the wall with a loud thoom.

Max and Jessie looked at the doorway to find a Pokemon that perhaps no one else had ever seen before. Max immediately connected it to Meltan, but instead of being smaller than one foot, it was big enough to tower over Jessie. It walked forward, shaking the room under its’ heavy, liquid metal, and to their surprise May and the other Pokemon were behind them!

Jessie scowled at May, giving her in turn a prideful smirk. “H-how in the hell did you find this place!? And...w-what is that thing?!” She pointed at Melmetal, somewhat afraid of how it was much bigger than her. She wasn't used to being dominated in a very long time, and now painful memories were flooding back into her head.

“This ‘thing’ is Melmetal.” May patted the massive Pokemon on the ‘back’ boastingly, not phased by the slightly sticky, fluid surface. “You can thank him for leading us here. I can go into detail later...after I have a little snack~”.

Without any more warning, Melmetal wrapped its’ hexagonal nut hands around Jessie impressive waist and holsted her up into the air. The women let out a scream of anger and demanded that she be let down immediately. “Let me go you oversized muk!”


Melmetal was only too happy to oblige. He walked towards May, who gave the much more massive Pokemon a wink. Taking that as its’ cue, he slowly dropped Jessie down...into Mays’ open mouth. Max let out a gasp as she witnessed the sight occurring in front of him. He knew that he would be saved eventually by his sister, but he didn’t know it would happen...this way.

“What do you think you’re doing!? I can’t go out like this, I’m supposed to be eating you!” Jessie protested as more of her body passed Mays’ lips, dooming her to a fate inside her stomach. She grinned and continued to gulp down the massive meal quickly and happily, feeling up her tummy as it grew to even more ridiculous proportions to accommodate the latest portion of her feast. Half-digested food was squished to the bottom of her groaning tummy by its new occupant, and the greedy organ glorped and gurgled in anticipation of digesting the mountain of delicious meat it had just been given. The rest of Jessie’s body went down smoothly and quickly, and soon enough her toes were vanishing into her gullet and the entirety of the former team rocket member was deposited into her over ripened stomach. Once her meal was completely and her throat free of any more further tasty obstructions, May sighed and rubbed her jiggling and bulging tummy.


“Ooooh, you tasted really good too!” she announced, patting her belly lightly. “Oof, and you filled me up pretty well too! I’m almost full now!”


Heedless of Jessies’ protests and cries, May slid two hands under her belly and hefted her massively rotund gut, her fingers squishing delightfully into the softness of the digested goop in the bottom of her belly. “Hey Max, do you think you could get me some food from the fridge? I’m still kinda hungry…” Max was still a bit tired from serving Jessie, but obliged his sister with a happy smile, the other Pokemon and Melmetal urged to join him as well. The doors of cupboards across the kitchen flew open one by one, and each had their contents disrobed of packaging and shoved into May’s salivating maw, further filling up her wobbling gut. Jessie voiced quite a few protests about the further masses of food that were likely raining down onto her, but May could hardly hear her muffled complains and paid them no heed. Approximately fifteen minutes after her human meal, May had finally finished stuffing her tremendous tummy with food, having made sure that every inch of her gut was filled up with delicious snacks for her to thoroughly digest.

Panting slightly with effort, May slowly made her way into the living room of the house and flopped onto the couch, her huge belly making the poor furniture groan and creak as she impacted the cushions.

“Ooohh… I’m so fuuuuull…” she groaned, massaging what parts of her tummy she could reach. “That was really good foooooood… I can’t wait to, - Urp - , eat the rest of it tomorrow! Hehe, but for now, I had better rest up and let my belly gurgle all these goodies into chub…” Max sighed from afar, shaking his head. His sister really was a glutton.

Slowly, May drifted off into a food-coma, utterly heedless of Jessie’ pleas and protests as she was churned into mush along with the rest of the food in her belly. Max and the other Pokemon took their time to explore the mansion while she slept, not wanting to disturb her. They all found some suitable rooms to sleep in, dispute the sorry state the building was in. As the brunette drifted off, her belly kicked into digestive overdrive, gurgling and glorping loudly around its meal and slowly reducing everything and everyone within into an easily-absorbable and highly nutritious goop, perfect for the growing girl. May spent the whole day, and the entirety of the night that followed, napping on the couch while her belly grew smaller and her body grew softer.

“Ooh wow, I’m so big ‘n soft now!”

May stood in front of the mirror in one of the mansions’ restrooms, admiring the effects of her feasting on her body. Overall, she had gained quite a bit of chub, and likely no small part of it was from Jessies’ contribution to her hunger. Her belly had fattened up nicely into a soft and squeezable bit of paunch, just enough for her to squeeze and jiggle to her heart’s content. Her arms grew a tad wider and her bust grew fuller, though it remained just as perky as always. May thought her top felt a bit tight on her now, but it would likely survive at least one or two more feasts!

The most noticeable contribution to her body, however, was to her hips and thighs. All of the calories from her mountainous feast had gurgled up and swirled together to add layer after layer of delicious fat, plumping up her thighs massively. The girls’ backside was absolutely enormous now, two massive and soft cheeks that rubbed together as she walked and bounced with every small step! May absolutely loved the growth, and she spent a good while kneading and jiggling her soft and flabby cheeks, before a sudden grown from her tubby tummy reminded her that it was time for breakfast.

“Don’t worry tummy, I hear you!” she cooed to her stomach, pinching a big of flab and jiggling it. “I’ll fill you up with whatever’s left here, and then we can go find something else to eat! Hehe, I just hope there’s enough food left to fuel the trip. All that food and that tasty girl made me sooooo big and fat! I bet my greedy gut can hold twice as much now!”

Giggling happily, May bounced out of the room and jiggled her way into the kitchen, intent on making good to her claim.

1511131332.content:
THREE YEARS LATER…

Max gave out a yawn as the sunlight poured into his bedroom through the window, the birds chirping and the winds blowing at a gentle pace. HE stretched his arms over his head and sat up, scratching his back. The young boy got out underneath his blankets and put his two feet on the floor, ready to start the day.

He looked himself over in a mirror. Today with the big day. It was his tenth birthday, the day he would be able to start his Pokemon Journey around Hoenn. He hasn't really changed much in appearance since he was seven, save for some minor height growth. He already had Pokemon to battle with, and had already gone around Hoenn once with Ash, so he felt pretty confident of himself. He put on some clothes and walked downstairs to greet his Mom and Dad, knowing it would be the last time he would see them for a while.

“Good morning Mom, good morning Dad!” Max greeted, walking into the kitchen to see them working away on breakfast. But something seems off to him, the tone of the room wasn't as jovial as usual, and the two adults had frowns plastered on their lips. “G-guys, whats wrong?”

Max’s mother signed and put down a frying pan full of bacon to walk over to Max. She knelt down on a knee to get eye level with him and placed a hand over his shoulder affectionately. “Honey, I...I know you were really looking forward to going on a Pokemon Journey, but...it’s your sister…”

“Your older sister is a lot to handle, Max.” Norman butted in. “And we made a decision as a family that...we need you here with us to look after her.

“What?!” Max shouted, recoiling from his mother’s touch. This was a massive blow to him, he had been looking forward to this day for years! But it wasn't as if he didn't understand the situation his parents were in. May had gotten big in the past three years. Really, really big. He thought that when he gave her that size changing ray from jessie Mansion, she would have used it to shrink him down or something. But instead she just used it on food, more eager to fill her gut than anything else. At first, the family didn’t mind because it cut down on food costs. She only ever needed one foodstuff a day.

But that was three years ago when May was still under a ton. Skip to today, where she was now 25 by 25: 25 feet tall weighing 25 tons. In three years, May had blossomed from a mere glutton to an apex predator where anyone can become food for that gut of hers. Currently, she was resting in the backyard, having not woken up yet, filling up the whole space of it with her flabby body and spilling over into the forest behind them.

“But...b-but…” Max tried to think of a solution to all of this. He had to go on a Pokemon Journey, it was practically a rite of passage. If he wouldn't go, than he would forever be seen as a meek little kid in the eyes of society, no matter how mu he trained and no matter how smart he was. “What if...May comes along with me on my journey? I went around the region with her before, and she would love to do it again!”

Max’s mother and Norman looked at each other worryingly before turning back to Max. “Max...your sister's stomach is a black hole. I’m not saying that out of anger of her, i’m saying it as a fact, she is an impossible to satisfy. What happens if you run out of food on the road with her? You know we’ve caught her...eating Pokemon in the past.” She shivered. “You are very mature for your age, and you know May more than evan we do. But we have to keep her here, it’s for her own good.”

“Wh-why don’t we let her decide than?” Max sputtered out. “She’s 21 now, a legal adult. You can’t keep her here if she doesn't want to stay.”

Max’s mother sighed, knowing that Max was right. “Okay sweetie. Go outside and ask her, and will support whatever happens next. Just know that I love you and your sister very much, and that we only want the best for you two.” Max smiled an hugged his mom and dad before heading out into the yard.

15223113.content:
May walked along Route 101 from Littleroot Town happily, her younger her brother Max wedged in between her tits as she did so. She was absolutely overjoyed, she was finally a Pokémon trainer with her own Pokémon! A whole open world for her to explore, it was amazing!

Meanwhile, Max was thinking up ways to make sure he could live out his dream of being a Pokemon Trainer through May. She loved her bigger sister, but he knew that she didn’t really know anything about being a Pokemon Trainer. He could give her tips and tell her which Pokemon to catch, that way it could be his adventure as well as hers.

Suddenly, there was a rumbling in the bushes to the side of them on the road. The foliage kept rustling for a while until out popped a Zorua, looking for something to eat. “Oh. My. Arceus. It’s so cuuuuute!” May gushed, instantly enamored with the little fox Pokemon. “I just have to have it!”

“Okay May, get Treeko out and get ready to catch it with another Pokeball.” Max reminded her big sister. May noded, fishing out Treeko’s Pokeball. Before she threw it, however…

“Wait, what are you talking about Max? I don’t have any other Pokeballs.” May lowered Treeko’s Pokeball in confusion.

“What?! Didn't Professor Birch give you some Pokeballs to start out with?!” Max cried out, not believing how forgetful her big sister could be right now.

“Hmmm, nope! I guess not!” May giggled, while Max just groaned. “Aw, don’t be like that Maxie Waxie, I got this all figured out. Go Treeko!” She threw Treeko’s Pokeball at the Zorua, initiating the battle.

After Max telling May what to do most of the way through the fight, Treeko won. Zorua passed out on the ground, too tired to keep going, while May beamed. “Now, to catch my very first Pokemon!”. Without any Pokeballs, May walked over and picked up the unconscious Pokemon by the scruff of it’s neck and pushed it deep into her breasts along with Max. “I figured since I keep you they're, why not my Pokemon too?”

Max wiggled his way around to make room for Zorua, but couldn't find too many flaws with his sister’s logic. “Uhh...I guess this works for now. You should probably head to a Pokemon Center to heal it now, it doesn't look too good.” Max suggested as the dark Fox Pokemon writhed a little in pain.

“But is isn't it supposed to be in pain?” May questioned, gripping both her boobs and wobbled them around to get the fox to shut up. “I mean, I did beat it, and it could have run away when it saw me, but it chose to stay and now he’s paying the price.”

“Well, you can’t use him in battle if he’s too weak to fight.” Max reasoned, trying to get his big sister to be a good trainer. “And you need to fight to battle other trainers, and if you win that’ll give you money.”

“Money?!” May looked down at Max, surprised by this revelation. “Really? Huh, well I bet there isn't anymore cool Pokemon on this route anyways. I guess we can head to Oldale town, than i’ll think about healing it. The Pokemon Center has food right? I know I just had a big breakfast, but I could eat.”

“Uhh...yeah May, they have free food for trainers.” Max rubbed Zorua’s paw, trying to make it feel better. “But to be clear, we’re going there to heal your Pokemon, right?”

“Huh? Oh yeah, sure sure…” May trailed off, already focused solely on the food that laid ahead. “Maybe after I get some food we can think about healing them. Do you think there is any restaurants in Oldale town Max? We could stock up on snacks at the store if not.”

Max sighed. May was more in love with the idea of being a trainer than actually being a trainer. It looked like this trip was just an excuse for her to fill her gut to bigger levels. Well, that wasn't true, she said something about seeing Dad, but he never got to know him so he didn't pay much attention.

Overtime Robin continued to get bigger and bigger, at the rate she was going Robin had to make a difficult decision. Robin had a massive underwater facility built onto the floating island known as the Aether foundation and moved into it with her husband, Chrom and some others.

Unable to choose another champion Alola the region went back to they’re the previous state. However this time. The trial captains abused their power.

Several years later Robin and Chrom had two children, Lucina and Morgan. Lucina was a fatty like her mother while Morgan was a skinny little thing but thanks to his father’s side of the family Morgan’s body was capable of taking lots of punishment, in fact, he was even immune to stomach acid.

Lucina waddled back into the open streets of the city and began to take in the sights, Morgan now safe and sound. Other than being tied up, he was actually feeling very comfortable, her fat warm and cozy. As she walked on, the vibrations made him feel sleepy and he dozed off. Meanwhile, Lucina happened upon a multitude of locations.

The most prominent feature of the city was the amount of restaurants it had. It seemed to be encouraged here that all women eat and get fat. People were even looking on at the Bluenette with jealousy! Her gut rumbled as she realized she was hungry. Surely it wouldn't hurt to have a little food, right?

Of course, than they're was than just one type of restaurant on the Island. As she walked, she noticed that half of them specialized in serving live Pokemon! At first, she felt disgusted, but than Lucina realized that she was going to have to eat the Island Kahuna and Trial Captain sooner or later. Perhaps...it would be best to practice on something much smaller? No one else seemed to mind it.

But, surely it was a better idea to get a proper lay of the land before she does anything, right? She noticed that the city had a visitor center where people can get information about the Island. She could find out who the Kahuna was, who the captain was, and the history behind how the island turned from a verdant paradise to a smokey slum.

The last option Lucina could think of was to just go to the Captain of the city and get the fight over with...but was it the best idea? What if she was bigger than her, what if she ends up eating her, what if Morgan is…!? No, she would not let that happen, she couldn't. What would she do?
1531121.title: Lucina hides Morgan by having him hide under he...

choices: The Trial Captain Enters the Restaurant
15311211.content:
Lucina had decided to go to the regular restaurant as she had remembered her mother had told her a couple years back how it was only okay to eat live Pokemon if it was in self defense or if someone's life was in danger. Robin had then told Lucina the story she of how she had eaten an Gyrados on her honeymoon when it had almost ended up killing Chrom (who has blue hair just like his children).

Lucina walked around and found a restaurant called "Mama Sofia's" an Italian place probably (While Italy isn't a place in the Pokemon world the explanation here is that the type of food was invented by someone with the last name of Italy... yeah)

Lucina went in and was seated, the bluenette careful not to be too close to the table as to not wake up her brother. "Here is your menu miss, hope you find something you like." A waitress said handing a menu to the woman.

Lucina looked through the menu before ordering a cheese pizza.

After maybe thirty minutes the waitress returned with an incredibly large pizza that had to be longer than Morgan was if he was in jumping jack position.

Lucina licked her lips before starting to eat the pizza, gluttonously shoving each piece into her mouth one at a time. This had to be the best pizza she's ever had! Lucina was tempted to order more but she remembered she had a mission. Lucina paid her bill and got up to leave.

What now?
15311211.title: Go to the regular restaurant

15311212.content:
Knowing it would be good practice for eating actual humans Lucina made her way to the pokemon restaurant. Thankfully Lucina could tell Morgan was asleep. So he wouldn’t have to bear witness to this event, Morgan really loved Pokemon so seeing his older sister eat one would definitely traumatize him.

Lucina went inside of the restaurant and was soon seated, after a bit Lucina chose the Dewgong, off the menu. After a bit a large hefty woman dropped a rather fat Dewgong onto the table before leaving without a word.

Lucina looked at the White Pokemon for a couple of minutes before picking it up and sliding it into her mouth moaning softly at the taste. Eventually Lucina swallowed the entire thing before letting out an earth shattering belch. Lucina blushed as a couple of people stared at her before gong back to what they were doing,

Lucina let out a sigh of relief and grunted a bit as the Pokemon started wriggling around inside her. She weakly lifted her arm to signify she wanted the bill.

What now?


1. Lucina’s wriggling belly wakes up Morgan who is very confused

2. Lucina checks into a hotel and plans her next move
15311212.title: Keep it a secret

In all my browsing on the internet, I have come to notice that there is a distinct lack of Fat, Macro Dominatrixesâ from the Pokemon media. Of course, there is a reason for it: it's a very specific thing to look for that many people donât bother writing.

Years ago, I came across a story on Deviantart about an officer Jenny who used cruel and sadistic tactics t become an immobile blob of a tyrant of the world. The first time I read that story, I got shivers. Not fear shivers or disgust shivers, but some sort of high. âThis is itâ I thought to myself. âThis is what I want more ofâ.

But as I tried to chase after my dragon, I came across a blank void on the internet. Which makes sense: the story was not well known and the content I was looking for just didn't match anyone elseâs style.

So thatâs why I am creating this Interactive. Itâs for a niche group, people who want to see a 10ft, 3,400 lb Misty boss Ash around as he journeys through Kanto, or an obese Serena threatens to eat her Pokemon to keep them in line. This is a story for a very specific type of people, and I want to help those people find what they are looking for.

And if you donât like what you are reading, thatâs fine!! This is just my silly little post on the internet that I personally like. There are hundreds of more stories out there that you might like, even love. But this is mine.


So for the people still with me, I would like to go over what kind of things I will allow and not allow in this Interactive.
